summary: DawnWander is a cold and dark shooter about the survival of a nameless soldier in a rough winter. There is no room for weakness, fear, and doubt. You are a wild animal in the wild environment. You've to find the way out of this cold and empty hell.

name: Damned Hand
summary: You're in the home of a psychopathic art lover. and that isn't happy about this situation.He'll scare you. You have to be careful!

name: Daughter of Essence
summary: The largest and most powerful empire wants you captured at all costs. Their enemies want to control you for their own benefit. The world itself seems to want you dead. You just want to be a normal girl.

name: Dark Tides
summary: A horrifying point-and-click adventure. Cape Fortune, a once-quaint, Victorian town, is in the grips of demonic possession. Their only hope? A fake boardwalk psychic who just found out she can actually read minds.

name: Dab's Not Dead
summary: Buckle up for a hacking rhythm game about saving Cyberspace from a mysterious threat! Move to the beat, groove your way through security systems, and fight the Virus corrupting friendly Cyberfolk (also in local co-op!). Make your own levels using your own music or the official tunes!

name: Daiku no Medium
summary:
A ship by the name of 'Lilith' has been navigating through space for two years with a single goal – reaching Eden, the heart of the Universe. The ship's team, consisting of Captain Lazarus, First Mate Anna and Second Mate Joseph, is constantly fighting through hundreds and hundreds of enemy 'Phantom 4s' that has been chasing them throughout the whole trip.

But the final frontier stands before them: Eden is almost within hand's reach...

name: Daloman Depths
summary: A gauntlet style dos game released for free by Lloyd Pique for MS DOS in 1991.

name: Darkness and Light
summary: Darkness and Light is a single player 2D platformer game about The Soul on its path to the final destination. Explore flying through avenue, mountain range, city lights, and darkness. Experience downfalls and changes, endings and new beginnings, crying and laughter. Solve puzzles and mazes, gather knowledge, fill with love, collect all the keys that open magical doors, and enlighten the soul to ascend.

name: Danny's Mirror Magic
summary: Pinball simulator game for the Atari 8-bit.

name: Darts
summary: Darts is a 1-player skill game for the 8-bit Atari. The player controls a hand, which they must position on a dart board to score points. There are 10 levels of difficulty, which determine the shakiness of the throwing arm. The player also sets the level of the computer opponent. The player counts down points from 1001, 905, 501, or 301. The first player to reach a score of 0 is the winner, and the scoring points must be a double. The player can choose to require a double at the start of the game.

name: Dark Magic
summary: Demons already know about your presence, arm yourself with magic and embark on a dangerous journey!

name: Dark Frame
summary: Simple platformer in a dark setting

name: Dark Edges
summary: Pixelart rogue-like with dice.

name: Dating Life 2: Emily X Miley
summary: Play as Emily as she goes on her second date with Miley, after they unexpectedly hit it off from a strange and wonderful night before. Is love in the air or just a bit of lust between the two. Can Emily find something special or is this just another night of fun among many.

name: Dancing Angel
summary: Dancing Angel is a place where you can select a cute anime character. Lets dance along to hot songs, find your couple and celebrate weddings.

name: Dark Farm
summary: "Dark Farm" is an RPG raid game. You have to take care of your garden, which wants to kill you. Grow killer vegetables. Water your garden beds. Defend yourself.

name: Dark Dragonkin
summary: Every Level is like an old school RPG puzzle.Even the enemies are puzzles of how to avoid or destroy them.Control each character separately and use their unique skills to get past obstacles.You must figure out how to gather the party at the exit portal to advance.

name: Dances and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: DarkAir
summary: DarkAir is a fun action-packed flying shooter racing game where you compete against other players by uploading your top scores on the Global leaderboard and completing challenges

name: Dance Waifu
summary: It's getting hot in here…

name: Dahlia no Wakudeki: Danchi-zuma Akiko ga Ochiru Jijou
Daisy Flies to the Moon
summary: A sci-fi RPG that takes you to the Moon and beyond!

name: Dash Dash Delivery
summary: Welcome to Dash Dash Delivery, a simulation where you play as a delivery person in a nearby mall. Have fun delivering items, exploring, purchasing items, customizing your character, enjoying delicious mall food items, as well as the upbeat atmosphere. Can you find all the easter eggs?

name: Dangerous Lands 2
summary: In this action game, you join the dark side to bring prosperity in the evil ascension.

name: Da! Russian Quiz
summary: A quiz that helps you review words and phrases in Russian. Over 3,500 Advanced phrases, 350 Verbs, 1500 nouns and exactly 33 letters for all your learning efforts.

name: Day of the Dead: Solitaire Collection
summary: Dive into this chilling Solitaire adventure and experience the vibrant Dia de los Muertos as you decorate a cemetery to welcome souls from the Land of the Dead.

name: Dark Solitaire: Mystical Circus
summary: Visit the weird circus now! Open the mystery world to yourself!

name: Dash DE Lei-Lei
summary: Doujin game featuring Hsien-Ko (Lei Lei in Japan) from Darkstalkers.

name: Dating Simulator
summary: Dating Simulator is a simulation game where you meet and interact with different people.

name: DarkFighter
summary: Chaos wakes up from the darkness and erodes Hades of hell. Hades opens the door of hell, and the devil and chaos of hell come to the world. Chaos erodes the earth, and the gods who can fight against chaos are missing. Only the sun goddess and the God of love protect human beings against Hades.

name: DarkCoating
summary: Overcome obstacles and save yourself in a universe subject to darkness. This game with 2D graphics offers a classic platform game experience. Pass the challenging obstacles and complete your story..

name: Dawn of Dynasty
summary: A simulation game which allows the player to choose one of the Three Kingdoms. Recruit War Maidens and reunify China! Forge Alliances to dominate the realm.

name: Dangerous Degrees
summary: You wreck your 4x4 while dune bashing in the desert. As you fight to survive, the desert consumes you and you become its soul. For both man and animal you are the predator.

name: Darker: Episode I
summary: An indie horror game from a first-person perspective where the player explores a mansion through the use of puzzle-solving, finding specific items and trying to avoid unknown dangers. The particular focus of the game is atmosphere, mystery and scares as well as continual story development.

name: Damn Endless Orcs
summary: Damn Endless Orcs is set in a medieval fantasy world, where human heroes battle relentlesly against an (you guessed it) endless horde of orcs. In this game you must survive and gather equipament to fight the horde and become earths mightiest hero.

name: Dark Asteroids
summary: Action PC game with a spaceship. The player's task is to defend the planet Earth from the threat coming from the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter. Will humanity be able to uncover the enemy base and destroy it?

name: Damien
summary: Damien is a first-person Slenderman like game. What happened here and why did people move out in such a hurry? A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story!

name: Dark Threads
summary: Dark Threads is an interactive Drama and sci-fi VR adventure. You play as Dominic Monaghan in this immersive experience where every person you encounter may be an ally or enemy. This cinematic psychedelic experience explores the ideas of consciousness and Artificial Intelligence.

name: Dark Podval
summary: Dark Podval - platformer where you have to go through the basement mazes, solve puzzlesand avoid deadly traps. Can you get out of there alive and take all the coins?

name: Dark Crypt
summary: Dark Crypt is a turn-based horror-themed stealth puzzler. Sneak through an ancient crypt where an ancient evil slumbers. Its shadow is corrupting the crypt, the buried bodies have awaken and haunt the halls. This evil must be sealed at all cost!

name: Darkness Shooter
summary: Darkness Shooter - One-action shooter, where the player controls the sight and shoots at enemies, from time to time shooting bonuses that replenish the hero's health and make it possible to continue his task.

name: Darklands: Awakening
summary: You will control the protagonist to come to a mysterious prison and reveal the horrible secrets unknown here!

name: DayZ: Livonia Edition
summary: DayZ is a hardcore survival game where players must strive to endure a post-apocalyptic world populated by frenzied infected and other survivors. This bundle includes the main game - set on the original map of Chernarus - and the new Livonia DLC, which includes a whole new terrain.

name: Dark Forest: Lost Story VR
summary: In this horror game we will tell you truthful stories about demons and ghosts.

name: Dark Pathways
summary: You wake up in your cell, but this time the door is open and strange creatures will chase you across amazing worlds. You have to look for objects and tools scattered in the labyrinth that can be used to finally stop this threat. Only then you can come back to the peace of your cell.

name: Dark Thrones
summary:
Dark Thrones is a 2D endless runner game. You play as 'Dark', an assassin on his last run to redeem himself and protect those he loves against legions of undead on top of an endless wall.

Jump over and slide under various obstacles. Have no mercy against every last unyielding enemy standing in your way to boost your score while collecting coins to upgrade power-ups strewn all across the wall.

Shop
The player collects coins which allows them to purchase upgrades from the in-game shop. These upgrades aid progression against the trophies.

name: Dark Thrones / Witch Hunter Double Pack
summary: This Dark Thrones/Witch Hunter Double Pack brings you 2 endless runner games in one box.

name: Darkness Hero Rance
summary: Darkness Hero Rance is a total overhaul of Sengoku Rance to create a new and unique experience with the materials provided by the base game. This mod offers a wide range of new mechanics and quality of life changes, as well as local multiplayer.

name: Daytime Drama
summary:
You are Sanya K. Waffles, SSA of the recently de-funded Boredomdai Civil Defence. Your friends are captured by terrorists who storm a local TV station.

You just happen to be the only cop in the area not in on the terrorists' plan. You decide to cut them down, and quickly you find they're not your usual mooks. With deranged dolphin demons, facsimilies of cartoon characters and other denizens helping this seige, you know this isn't a typical coup d'etat.

You were supposed to be on vacation. Now you're gonna make them pay. Plus the government has a lot to answer for in the end, but that's not your place. Your place: make the fuckers who did this attack pay.

name: Daina Airan
summary: Daina Airan is an interactive cartoon for the Sega Saturn made by Game Arts in 1997.

name: Darker Skies
summary: The War is over, but the effects linger. Take control of Jack, a survivor of the War of the Worlds trying to rebuild a working Heat Ray to blow his way to freedom and light the spark that will rebuild civilization.

name: Danger Ahead
summary: You are a lone alien robot lost in some kind of space void where there is only strange signs and nothing but death in front of you.

name: Daedaluz
summary: Daedaluz is a game about maneuverability and obstacle avoidance where your ship breaks apart as you collide with them. Try to reach the end in consecutive increasingly difficult levels or try infinity mode and see how long you can survive.

name: DangerZone VR
summary: Block-based RPG built with love and dedication. Way more fun that it should be to just roam around discovering all sorts of new things in all sorts of new dimensions. Survival or Creative, it's up to you. And then there is nighttime.... because this is DangerZone... in VR.

name: Daedalus: The Awakening of Golden Jazz - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Daedalus The Awakening of Golden Jazz
Special Box
20th memorial tabletop calendar (At the End of the Dream)
OST CD
Art book

name: Danger: Electric Shock
summary: A simple action puzzle game. Carry the rod to the finish line while avoiding the dangerous traps!!

name: Dark Harvest
summary: A stealth-horror game. An extra-terrestrial species has invaded earth. If you are seen, you will die. Armed with only a flickering flashlight and your wits, you must find the supplies and escape your farm before the mysterious creatures find you.

name: DarKnot
summary: DarKnot is a game about the extermination of monsters on the streets of a foggy city. Here you will find insidious opponents, dynamic battles and puzzles of various degrees of difficulty. It's up to you to decide in what style to play the game.

name: Danger Zombies
summary: Put down all the zombies coming towards you! Collect points. A zombie game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

name: Dacey in the Dark: Prelude
summary: It's a game about fate. This chapter deals with the melancholy we cherish towards times long gone. I'm planing to release more chapters. THIS GAME IS THE WINNER OF MAGS NOVEMBER 2010 (even though it was the only entry - still you should play it!) PLOT: After a fight with her father Dacey takes a walk in the garden, where she meets a most unlikely companion

name: Damsel: Chapter One - Stress on the Tress
summary:
Poor Damsel...her life was so perfect back at the castle, riding her pony, brushing her hair and visiting the spa. But now her royal princessliness has been kidnapped by the quasi-evil, fat little middle aged wizard Dorkus, and trapped high in a tower with no doors! She's held out as long as she can, but if she doesn't escape tonight, Dorkus will force her to marry him! What's a girl in distress to do?

Well, wait for rescue, obviously. But when rescues go wrong, Damsels must do it for themselves!

Damsel is a short comedy adventure game, with full voice-acted dialogue. We hope you enjoy it, we had some really talented performers for it. :)

name: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony
- Booklet
- Calendar 2017
- New Monokuma Strap
- Soundtrack & Cast Comment CD
- Original Custom Theme Download Card
- Original Anime Blu-ray Disc

name: Darius Cozmic Revelation: Special Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Darius Cozmic Revelation
- Darius The Omnibus III -Kaiko- CD
- Darius Odyssey -Cozmic Voyager- 128 page Art book
- Dariusburst Another Chronicle Live in O-East -revolt” DVD
- 1/12 Dariusburst Another Chronicle arcade cabinet papercraft

name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: Limited Edition Famitsu DX Pack
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Dark Rose Valkyrie
- Special Booklet
- Soundtrack CD
- Drama CD
- Wall Scroll (B2 Size: 515×728mm)
- Cushion Cover
- Emblem Cloth (Size: 20×20cm)

name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Dark Rose Valkyrie
- Artbook
- Soundtrack CD
- Drama CD

name: Dark Dealings
summary: The only way to rise to the top in this world is the hard way, so get on your bike and get to work!

name: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow
summary: In this puzzle platformer, you will embark on a touching journey through the surreal world of a person's mind as a young Griffin and his faithful bear, Birly. Overcome challenges, avoid traps and defeat enemies to help the man find peace.

name: Daughter of Shadows: An SCP Breach Event - Friend and Foe Expansion
summary: The Friend and Foe expansion adds eight new SCPs to Daughter of Shadows, as well as a mobile task force that has been dispatched to contain SCP-029. Explore the facility once again to acquire powerful allies while avoiding deadly foes. Included in the list are fan favorites SCP-682 and SCP-079.

name: Dark Renaissance
summary: An exciting Interactive History Drama that will let you experience first-hand the real and darker story of Renaissance. Take on the role of an indomitable mercenary captain, fight fearsome enemies, make influential choices and forge your own path to glory.

name: Dad's Monster House
summary: Dad's Monster House is a hand-drawn puzzle game featuring horror and fantasy. It tells the story of Carlos' journey after he receives a distress call from his father, pleading for him to return to his old home and rescue his dad.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals
summary: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals is a multiplayer horror party game with multiple modes where players take on the role of monsters or mortals from Dark Deception's universe (and other universes) and fight for soul shards in nightmarish mazes!

name: Dark Blocks
summary: PC game with 2D graphics. The player controls the bat and must remove all blocks from the level using the ball, which he must not miss. Each of the 96 levels contains one verse of motivational poems. Can you clear all the blocks and get all the poems?

name: Darq: The Crypt
summary: Lloyd's adventure continues. This time he explores a mysterious crypt full of dark surprises.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Night Striker
summary: From the unique arcade machine with an analog joystick and pseudo 3D, comes Night Striker. Pilot Inter Gray in 2D sidescrolling levels, and shoot down enemies with your homing missiles.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Galaxy Force II
summary: An extreme motion game in a fantastic universe, Galaxy Force II was a pioneer in pseudo-3D graphics. Use your evasion roll while shooting missiles to down enemies.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Mahoudaisakusen
summary: A game set in a world pervaded by the smell of oil and steel, where fantasy and steampunk are fused together. In true RPG fashion, your rivals reappear with new gear time and time again!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Soukyuugurentai
summary: A 'lock-on' shooter set in a science-fiction world telling the tale of private armies and a battle for resources in the near future. Featuring a targeting system and widespread use of Japanese lettering at key moments to enhance the near-future setting meant it stood apart from its peers.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Space Harrier
summary: Space Harrier is an all-time SEGA classic and pioneer in pseudo-3D graphics. With Harrier, you can set up fixed bursts and shoot all around.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Fantasy Zone
summary: Fantasy Zone is famous for its free scrolling and shop system. Similar to the original, shooting down enemies will drop coins, which you can use to buy stronger attacks.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - RayForce
summary: The beginning of the lock-on laser series, RayForce! Lock on to multiple enemies, before firing your laser, to get the highest multipliers.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Ketsui
summary: Hyper aggressive game design brought many enthusiastic fans to this side scrolling shooting game. Welcome to special round!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Side Arms Hyper Dyne
summary: Robot shooting with the tagline "Ultimate combination of α and β". The player ship, Alpha (nicknamed Mobichan), would go on to appear in many Capcom titles, including Varth!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - DoDonPachi Resurrection
summary: Dondonpachi, the Cave masterpiece receives Resurrection after a Blissful Death. Feast on firepower in bullet hell!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Battle Garegga
summary: Widely considered as both the origin of the bullet hell sub-genre and one of its standouts, the true joy of Battle Garegga's lies in unravelling the game’s various complex systems.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Metal Black
summary: From its hard-boiled world, comes Metal Black. Gather Newalones to fill up your gauge and use your Focused Beam and Release Beam.

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Deathsmiles
summary: Side scrolling shooting in a Gothic Horror world! That distinctive cave touch wasn't lost with the switch to horizontal scrolling!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Varth: Operation Thunderstorm
summary: Varth had the tagline "The Final Battle. Regain the planet VARTH!!" and was 30 stages of classic, vertically scrolling shooting with bullet-shielding pods and a self-charging bomb. Planet Varth wasn’t the final battle! Saber returns!

name: Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer
summary: Welcome to Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer! The darts game for when you can't make it to the pub.

name: Dance of the Vampires
summary:
With a jolt you wake, reaching from your subconscious mind for a pencil and a clean sheet of paper from the desk. Fumbling about with your fingers, however, you find not stationery, but the icicle-covered sleeve of uncle's coast.

Upon opening your eyes, the puzzle is solved. No longer are you in uncle's study at Koenigsberg University, taking notes and generally keeping busy helping uncle. You are now heading up a narrow track that winds on through gradually deepening woods and snow, on another one of uncle's “field trips”. This time researching a book on vampire bats and their connection with a strange race of humans.

This is of course of little interest to you, being neither of a very adventurous nature or possession of a strange stomach. However, the strange wolf cries coming from the trees around you and the general air of expectancy does grip you in a frightening sort of way.

Dance of the Vampires is an adventure game split into three chapters. The screen consist of the picture of the location that players are presently at, a description of that location, and a prompt where commands are entered. Recognizable commands include EXAMINE, TAKE, DRINK, ASK ABOUT, and directions can be abbreviated (ie: N, S, E, W, U, D).

name: Dark Disciples II
summary:
DD2 is, unsurprisingly, the sequel to DD1. The look and feel is therefore similar to that of the first game. However a number of significant improvements have been made to the game system:

DD2 features a new story line (unconnected to that of DD1). It takes place over 4 continents and ~130 levels.

The game features non linear gameplay - feel free to explore (there are tons of side missions, secret areas and off the beaten track oddities to discover).
There is now a proper skill system. There are 11 skills available from Pick Locks, to Dual Weapons to Curse to Gemlore.
Monster AI has also be greatly improved (DD2 uses the A* pathfinding algorithm).
Monsters now have proper abilities (called 'powers'): they can shoot arrows and cast spells.
Speaking of arrows, missile combat has been implemented in DD2 (there were no missile weapons in DD1).
Also new is mp3 quality music (if you choose to download the 'music pack').
The level editor is more useful and much better laid out. It's now possible to completely design your own campaign using the editor, including importing new item, tile and monster pics.
A Bag of Holding has been implemented - characters can now carry twice as much once they have purchased the bag.
There are also 'super' monsters: 3x3 tiles in size!

name: Day of the Dimetrodon
summary: A short little game about a day in the life of the prehistoric predator Dimetrodon.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Silent Hill
summary: Silent Hill is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 2
summary: The 2nd Chapter of Dark Deception! New enemies await you in the next 2 nightmares. You're still alive, but for how much longer? There's nowhere to hide and nowhere to catch your breath. Run or die - it's your choice.

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 3
summary: The 3rd Chapter of Dark Deception! New enemies await you in the next 2 nightmares. The darkness is growing and your demons are closing in. Can you change fate? Run or die - it's your choice!

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 4
summary: The 4th Chapter of Dark Deception! New enemies await you in the next 3 nightmares. The darkness is growing and your demons are closing in. Can you change fate before your time runs out? Run or die - it's your choice!

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Monstrum
summary: Monstrum is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. It includes 2 playable monsters (Brute & Fiend), 1 playable mortal (Prisoner Borisov), and a new map (Monstrum Madness).

name: Danger Zombies
summary: Danger zombies is a game with plenty of suspense and plenty of action, where the character will have many challenges to complete the objective of surviving, we've already started armed and ready for battle, we'll have a long-range rifle, a short-range pistol and an ax for hand-to-hand combat.

name: Dark Deception: Complete Edition
summary: All 5 Dark Deception chapters are included in this bundle package. The package will be updated with new chapters as they release in the future.

name: Dalruan: World of Magic
summary: Dalruan is an Action Adventure RPG set in a Fantasy world filled with Magic, Monsters and Treasure.

name: Dawn of the Falkonir
summary: In this online cooperative action-adventure game, two players are tasked with overcoming a wraith-infested mountain while utilizing their personalized kits. Play either as Aella, a spunky Falkonir with her multi-purpose crossbow, or Horu, the brave Falcon with his essential mobility.

name: Dangerous Zone
summary: Dangerous zone - a game where you need to survive passing dangerous levels, where different traps are waiting for you, in the form of mines, broken geysers, evil enemies…

name: Dark Forest Project
summary: You are a military man who was sent on an assignment to investigate in a dark forest due to the frequent disappearance of people. After spending a little time, you realize that ancient prisoners are being revived in this forest, and the longer you are in it, the more and more of them.

name: Danger Forever
summary:
Danger Forever is 3D Shoot'Em Up with RPG elements. Lone human rides her mecha-dragon through a hostile world of mechanoids and techno-demons.

Unlike most scrolling shooters, you fly through a 3D environment — use it to your advantage, and beware of bumping into walls or ground. Also, instead of traditional showering enemies with bullets, you must think ahead a bit - the fuel/heat system adds more depth to combat.

name: Days After
summary:
Days After is a survival shooting game in which you have to face the most terrible consequences of the zombie apocalypse.

You have no right to make a mistake, because everything in this zombie apocalypse world is hungry for blood and brains. Choose your hero and pump him to the maximum. Survive in a harsh environment and collect resources. Create weapons and build your base. Fight against wild animals, bandits and zombies. The main goal is to survive at any cost.

The following awaits you: zombie hunting, quests, several dozen different locations, treacherous bosses and pets. The bravest will be able to meet their love, but everything is not so simple. You will have to fight for her and make every effort to save her life.

The journey will not be easy. In this survival simulator, you will have to deal with hunger, thirst, unthinkable conditions and a mysterious virus. Various types of zombies will constantly keep you on your toes. Not everyone is to be fought with, maybe sometimes you'd rather run away. Don’t forget, your life and the lives of your loved ones are at stake, be careful!

Explore a variety of locations, complete quests, follow the rules of survival, kill zombies, and fight bandits to uncover the story of the infection that led to the zombie apocalypse.

name: Danplace
summary: In Danplace, you are trapped in an unknown and dangerous place, to escape you need to lower bridges and fight to survive the dangers of this terrible place.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Bells - Collector's Edition
summary: An author has vanished, and someone’s enacting the terrible events of his latest novel!

name: Danger Gazers: Next Stop
summary: A new path stop has appeared! Mr. Honest invites all the risk takers to spin the Baraban. It might be your lucky day if you've got the crystals or... it could leave you empty handed as it usually happens.

name: Dark Days
summary: The team that created White Night has gathered once again to offer you a hauntingly unique VR experience. Somewhere between Twin Peaks and The X-­Files, Dark Days is a new fantastic virtual reality adventure. You will have to discover what’s going on with an eerie desert motel and its surroundings by solving a number of puzzles. Immerse yourself in the rich environments you will come across, but be careful and smart! Something is roaming around you...

name: Day of Dragons: Acid Spitter Drake
summary: The Acid Spitter Drake is a fast, agile, and hardy pack hunter with an acidic bite that applies decay to its victims.

name: Dance of Cubes
summary: A casual logic puzzle in the style of cellular automata. Features a 3D top down view and casual music. The objective is to place automaton cubes, hit play and by simulation of the cubes crush all the glass mushrooms.

name: Dawnbreaker: Aeon's Reach
summary: Dawnbreaker - Aeon's Reach is an erotic visual novel that puts you in the heels of a jaded bounty hunter looking for fun, causing her to embark on a very hot cosmic adventure with a bunch of outlaws. Will you be able to find what you desire in this universe?

name: Damage Inc. Pacific Squadron WWII: F4F-FM2 "Panther" Wildcat
summary: The FM2 variant of the Wildcat sacrifices two guns in exchange for a significantly more powerful engine.

name: Damage Inc. Pacific Squadron WWII: P-61 "Mauler" Black Widow
summary: The P-61 Black Widow was a capable and deadly night-fighter. The Mauler trades in its bombs for rockets.

name: Danny Fisher Kills the Government

name: Das Überleben: Dem Großen Sprung
summary:
Skydiving is dangerous, especially when the flight path is full of obstacles. Survival lets you put your skydiving skills to the test.

Das Überleben is a multiplayer skydiving game, with 8-bit retro graphics. The story is that you've gone skydiving, but your plans have gone horribly wrong!

This means you have to skydive through lots of obstacles, trying to reach your landing point. Your plans have gone so wrong, that you may be skydiving through a mine, a molten volcano, or even Star Wars' Death Star!

Controls are via keyboard, mouse or gamepad, and if you have enough controllers, can handle up to seven players! There are lots of options, which is pretty cool: difficulty settings, spin settings (which can be very disorientating!), multiplayer fighting and more. The sound is limited to rushing wind and a little ambient noise, like rain on the tree level. for such a simple game, it's quite engrossing and hypnotic.

Das Überleben is also quite hard! The levels seem to be randomly generated so you can't learn them, and you really have to concentrate to stop yourself from being splattered into a wall. However, the random levels give you more longevity along with the difficulty settings and the insane spinning effect! Collected rings increase your speed as you dive.

You can invite up to six other players to pop by on a split screen, pushing them away to be the solo survivor!

Das Überleben is an atmospheric and exciting retro looking game, great for solo and multi-player games alike.

name: Davis Cup
summary: Taito's fifth game and the second developed in house. The game is another ball-and-paddle variation, like three of Taito's previous four releases, but with the added functionality of four players being able to play doubles. This was an important innovation during the 1973-1974 Pong craze first introduced in Allied Leisure's Tennis Tourney.

name: Damocles Gaze
summary: 12 minutes to gaze into your soul and go as deep as you can into its landscape - just how far will you go? What will you find? Damocles Gaze is a radically tight roguelite top-down shooter where every run takes 12 minutes. No matter how many times you die, no matter how good or bad you are, the run ends only after the 720 seconds went out.

The world’s coolest and craziest stuntman is back! Get ready for insane stunts and bone-crunching crashes with Daredevil Dave 2: Motorcycle Mayhem! The sequel to the top 10 game from 2010 is finally here!
If you’ve ever dreamed of being lit on fire and blown up, chopped into pieces, breaking bones, being run over by vehicles, ground up into hamburger or cooked in a pool of toxic sludge, this game is for you!
Steer through oncoming traffic, take on a horde of Zombie Clowns, crash your way through 9 holes of Motorcycle Golf, jump over cars and helicopters, and cause major destruction to the environment around you!

Dance Central also features the franchise’s first dive into synchronous online multiplayer. Customize your look, take an in-game selfie and then meet up with friends in the multiplayer lounge to party, chat, and dance your hearts out. With cross-play, you can compete against your friends on both the Oculus Quest and Rift Platform in free-for-all or team dance games to see who's the best in the crew.

name: Dark Souls III: The Convergence
summary:
The Convergence mod grants a whole new Dark Souls 3 experience with plenty of new systems, spell schools, weapons, bosses, map designs and more.

The game maps have been extensively overhauled and feature new surprises and challenges, hoping to reignite the excitement of a first playthrough.

The three basic magic schools of vanilla have each been split into four distinct sub-schools, making 12 in total. Each new spell school has its own distinct playstyle and progression, as well as custom spells, catalysts, vendors and armour.

Infusions for all weapons have been completely overhauled, making every weapon viable.

All bosses have been revamped somehow, and some are even completely new.

name: Dark Souls III: Ascended

Ascended is a community mod that adds:
- New enemy types and placements
- Changes in enemy physics and AI
- New armour set effects on each piece
- New rings and weapon effects
- New enemy debuffs
- Changes in boss fights

name: Dark Souls II: Augur of Darkness
summary: Dark Souls II: Augur of Darkness is a comprehensive overhaul mod for Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin. This mod aims to significantly alter the gameplay experience by introducing new enemy placements, rebalancing combat, and modifying item locations. It enhances difficulty by adjusting enemy AI and attack patterns, creating a more challenging environment. The mod also adds new weapons, armour sets, and spells, expanding the game's customisation options. Additionally, Augur of Darkness includes changes to level design and boss encounters

name: Dark Souls Ascended
summary: Dark Souls Ascended is a popular mod for the original Dark Souls game, created by the modding community to significantly alter and enhance the base game, providing a fresh and challenging experience even for seasoned players. This mod introduces rebalanced gameplay with changes to enemy placements, attack patterns, and AI behaviours, making encounters more unpredictable and difficult. It adds new weapons, armour, and items, some of which have unique abilities and effects not found in the base game. Boss battles are made more challenging with altered move sets and increased difficulty, requiring new strategies to defeat. The mod often includes improved textures and visual effects, enhancing the game's overall aesthetic. Some areas in the game are redesigned to offer new exploration opportunities and hidden secrets. Additionally, new narrative elements and item descriptions are introduced, enriching the lore of the Dark Souls universe.

name: Dandi World
summary: The world of the arts has been invaded by a villain who hates artistic expressions and wants to destroy them. Embark on this adventure to save the world of the arts and rescue the Danditos from the clutches of Dr. Hate!

name: Darkness of the Coast
summary: Your in a third person character view playing as an 18- year old boy called Anders whos scared of the world and his fate. The game is action-packed as the character can attack the enemies in the third person, swim, and even drive. The game is filled with cutscenes as it gives the story good balance.

name: Darold the Doomer: Psychedelic Lucid Dreams
summary: 3D Psychedelic Story Based RPG

name: DangerousIsland
summary: DangerousIsland is a barrage shooting game, which requires rational use of skills and dodge to avoid barrage. The game has only 5 levels in total, but the difficulty curve is a little steep. Sometimes the small soldier is more terrible than the boss, but I believe it won't be difficult for you.

name: Date of Death: Origin
summary: The mysterious man's laboratory is secretly carrying out this biochemical experiment, but this move directly alerted the government. They went to the laboratory to stop all this, but accidentally, the virus on the table was broken, and the virus was released and spread to the whole world...

name: Davey
summary: DAVEY is a fun, addictive platform puzzle game in anime styled 3D with realistic jumps and movements using motion capture and voice acting. Help Davey escape the facility after being kept prisoner for his unique invisibilty ability.

name: Dark Dimension
summary: Do you feel that some current horror games are scary but without action, while others have action but not scary? Do you miss the classic survival horror where fear and action were in perfect harmony? Now this full experience is back in the Dark Dimension!

name: Days with Ophelia: The Girl From Wind City
summary: This is a pure love RPG. As a popular writer, Jayne went to the refugee area where he was born and found the catgirl "Ophelia" who fled as a commodity.

name: Dacholer
summary: A game where the player controls an ostrich and must kick soccer ball shaped tortoises into enemies to complete levels.

name: Damoria
summary: Build, settle, trade - 'tis time to claim your throne in this medieval world. Saddle up for adventure now!

name: Dank Subs
summary: The combat is kind of like a Souls game and the gameplay is kind of like Fall Guys.You must find the level end first and avoid getting stun-locked and damaged by enemies! Gaming is back in a big way! That's right, daycare is open, and there is a new game for all the gaming frogs!

name: Dairantou Kanoair Smash 2002
summary: A doujin fighting game using characters from visual novels Kanon and Air.

name: Datascape
summary: Traverse the Datascape, hack ICE to explore their programs and make a run on the SimulaCom corp! If that's not your thing just explore a section of the Datascape. A compact experience with a message to discover.

name: Dark Sheep: Master Chapter
summary: Want more challenge? Then you'll love Master Chapter for Dark Sheep! The Master chapter combines the unique puzzle elements of the original game and the free content update Aftermath into 30 challenging but fair levels that will test your wits.

name: Dark Hood
summary: 2D Platformer. Combination of cyberpunk and magic.

name: Dashing Orange
summary: A 2D precision platformer about a little Orange that can dash and jump around this abstract world to avoid all the traps in the way to reach you goal.

name: Dark Woods Haunted Quest: Hidden Objects Game
summary: Join the Creepy, Fun as you journey into the Dark Haunted Woods to locate precious Magical Potions.

name: Dangerous
summary: Dangerous is a Console-Quality.

name: Date Knight
summary: An upcoming comedic visual novel where you're a knight dating other knights in your local area.

name: Dastardly
summary: A frenetic local multiplayer arena combat game for 1-4 players. Jump, dash, and shoot your way to victory, making use of an array of powerups like shields, cloaks, and jetpacks.

name: Dark Swords Firelink
summary: Dark Swords: Fire link is a 2D metroidvania game with a large locations to explore, fight with a lot creatures and epic bosses, and greats skills and power-ups to acquire. Have some of the better features that defines the 8/16-bits era, games like Ninja Gaiden, Super Ghost and Ghouls, Megaman, Castlevania and Super Metroid. Also, it gets inspired by the Dark Souls series, Hollow Knight and Blasphemous.

name: Dayshift at Freddy's
summary: Dayshift at Freddy's is a satirical visual novel game parodying the franchise Five Nights at Freddy's

name: Daytona USA
summary:
The handheld version of Daytona USA is an LCD game released by Tiger Electronics based on the arcade release of Daytona USA. It was released as part of Tiger's short-lived "Vrt-X" range, in which the game would be projected as a pseudo-hologram image onto the screen.

Daytona USA stands as the only Sega game to receive the Vrt-X treatment, although there were others for Street Fighter II, Mortal Kombat 3, franchises such as Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers and Congo: The Movie. The range did not exist for very long.

name: Daily Dungeon
summary: A randomized dungeon crawler with puzzles that changes every day.

name: Dale Earnhardt Winner's Circle: Pacesetter Games
Dadish 3
summary: When his kids board a bus for a suspicious field trip, Dadish sets off to find them before they're turned into radish soup!

name: Dark Cravings
summary: Dark Cravings is a collection of pixel horror adventure titles to satisfy your deepest and darkest cravings.

name: Dash Around Madly
summary: Dash Around Madly is a casual game with rogue-lite elements. In the game you will incarnate as a beautiful warrior, control the chess pieces on the board to fight! Mow thousands of enemies until dawn.

name: Dashing Mariachis
summary:
Dashing Mariachis is a Mexican culture inspired game, situated in early 20th
century and heavily relying in Mariachi music with a subtle 8bit treatment, puts the player inside a 3D side-scrolling runner adventure with a gameplay shift at the ending of every stage where now the player has to hit musical notes accordingly in order to keep the Serenata (musical performance) running.

name: Dark Hyrule Fantasy
summary:
Dark Hyrule Fantasy is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with the goal of telling a new story, in which a new threat emerges in Hyrule, plaguing the survival of all that lives. As this threat emerges, a light will shine bright in darkness.

Development on the mod was cancelled and the game started being reworked into a new original game called "Dark Haven Fantasy" using the Godot engine.

name: Dash and Slash
summary: Slash and Dash through your enemies in this pixel-art, one-button, hack and slash! Cut through the city, break into its' heart and descend to its' depths.

name: Dandelion
summary: Dandelion is a psychological horror adventure game focused on exploration. Navigate through a cute town, get to know others, even if the world you live in doesn't make sense

name: Dark Mist
summary: Dark Mist is a card game that combines elements of the roguelike deckbuilding genre. with monsters that appear in waves. defeat monsters, level up during mid-battle to keep yourself going.

name: Dadi
summary:
The cube has to reach the goal, but this is only possible if the gate is active.

So it’s push, connect, disconnect - and above all: act tactically wise. The functions of DADI are simple, but the puzzles will make your brain sweat.

From level to level, the puzzle worlds become more complicated, the challenge gets bigger, and often there is not just one correct solution.

name: Dampftraum
summary: Made by Jitsu

name: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2
summary: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2 is a cancelled sequel of Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix that was planned for the Nintendo Wii. It's existence was confirmed when documents relating to the Wii hardware were leaked as a part of the July 2021 batch of the gigaleaks. It's currently unknown if development ever officially started.

name: DayDream
summary: DayDream is a traditional Yume Nikki Fangame, with the main focus being on exploring the dream world and collecting effects. The game stars an emotionally unstable girl named Sadatsuki and has you explore her dreams.

name: Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure
summary:
Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure is an urban stylized rhythm game RPG, based on the titular character, Damn Daniel!

Daniel was invited to the Ellen show. While Daniel was asleep, his evil twin cousin Dark Daniel stole his white Vans! Now he must catch Dark Daniel before he gets on Ellen, and throws the whole world into Damnation with the power of the white Vans!

name: Daydream: When Butterflies Dance
summary: The girl woke up in a dark wasteland and couldn't think of anything. It was a terrible world, full of dangers and full of wandering dark shadows. Be careful not to get caught by them.

name: Dark Desire 2
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Davy's Debris
summary: Davy’s Debris is a fast-paced action beat ‘em up where you pick up trash. Launch your long arms to grab your enemies and fling them across the screen on your mission to clean all the trash off the beach.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Black Cat - Collector's Edition
summary:
Go on an adventure with Inspector Dupin! Monsieur Mark Davies has reported his wife, Sara, missing and now it’s up to you to track her down and solve the mystery! Follow a mysterious black cat, who seems to be purposely helping you, and discover helpful clues in Dark Tales: Edgar Allen Poe’s The Black Cat. Use your Hidden Object talents to tackle the case, and discover the evil culprit behind Sara’s disappearance.

Collector's Edition includes:
Bonus gameplay
Stunning soundtrack
Wonderful wallpapers
Integrated Strategy Guide

name: Dashing Adventurer
summary: A game for Mobware Minigames

name: Date Ariane Remastered
summary: The original western dating sim updated and bigger than ever before. The first dating sim made with 3D rendered graphics became a viral web classic back in 2007. This new "remastered" version allows players to play as a male or female for the first time.

name: Dark Slime
summary: Go through a huge number of caves, solve many puzzles, and fight against the strongest enemies!

name: Dakar Desert Rally
summary: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest and most epic off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from the world’s top makers, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: Dat Boi 2048
summary: Do you like memes? are you dank enough to take the Dat Boi challenge?

name: Darling II: Backlash
summary: The Koi no engine: A racing themed love/relationship simulation game, Darling Special Backlash: Ai no Exhaust Heat follows the exploits of a team of young male drivers, who compete for the racing group Team Angstrom.

name: Dark Frontiers
summary:
“Dark Frontiers” is the newest, gamified space realm governed by a Gamestarter produced DAO. As NFT standards and values are shifting towards promoting use-cases, Dark Frontiers’ goal is to drive mainstream adoption by enhancing the usability of NFTs through staking, item ownership, and the creation of real-world value through in-game items.

Embarking on the gamified metaverse, players will pilot their own spaceship and conquer new planets, defeat oppositions, form guilds and capture new and unique NFTs that can either be built on or sold on the open markets.

The $DARK token in Dark Frontiers will cover an array of opportunities. For players interested in dominating entire sections of a universe, say, by owning a moon, or a planet, they can use this digital plot of land to earn interest on their $DARK. The token will not only be used for staking, but players can also purchase and upgrade their starship Galactica’s using $DARK. After upgrading your ship for universal domination, you are prepared to stand head-to-head with other opponents that are in your way!

name: DarkSelf: Other Mind
summary: DarkSelf: Other Mind is a first-person psichological horror game about the growth of darkness over time. Explore the house, life and mind of John Parse. Complete puzzles inside the mind of John Parse to unlock his memories, and don't let the DarkSelf catch you.

name: Dave the Diver
summary: Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

name: Dancin' Divas
summary: A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back!

name: Darker Than Space
summary: Darker Than Space is a survival horror game.

name: Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday
summary: Get ready to swing your arms and run through an immersive horror shooter adventure in VR!

name: DarkTide
summary: You will lead a three person team to take risks in dense forests, snow, caves, deserts and other places to protect outposts in those places. Eliminate the enemies you meet, understand the local strange animals and plants, and acquire powerful weapons and equipment.

name: Dating My High School Bully
summary:
High school isn't easy, especially when it comes to making friends. At Matsubara High, fitting in is harder than the schoolwork itself! Luckily, a popular girl invites you into her friend group, but you quickly learn she may have had ulterior motives.

Your new friends seems more interested in treating you like dirt for their own amusement than getting to know you. You struggle to appease her and her friend group, but is the struggle worth it?

name: Dappou Undead Factory
summary: A dark simulation where you work immortals to make flesh, fight off enemies, and build factories! Events and biohazards may occur...?

name: Dark Angael
summary: Dark Angael is a 2D run-and-gun platform game with a mystical fantasy theme. In this game you play as Carina, the Dark Angael. Thanks to Azrael the world has been plunged in total chaos and the end is near. It is up to you to defeat Azrael and his army of demons. Carina has to fend off the demon's with the various weapons she finds or she can rely on her superpowers.

name: Dare to Stay
summary: In the town of Redstone, Pennsylvania, an evil returns striking chaos that once targeted families in the 1950s. Detective Alasdair, a successful investigator is reassigned and is forced to relive the haunting cases of his past.

name: Danmaku Amanojaku Gold Rush
summary: Danmaku Amanojaku Gold Rush is a one-stage danmaku mini game and publicly-unreleased installment of the Touhou Project, featuring Seija Kijin as the sole playable character and Reimu Hakurei as the sole stage boss. The game was created for Digital Game Expo 2014's "Doujin Shooting Game Caravan" contest, where it was available to be played.

name: Dark Jungle
summary: Dark Jungle is a 2d fantasy adventure where you play as the great magician Dorian and find yourself in a fairytale forest.

name: Dance Dance Revolution: Hello Kitty
summary: Dance Dance Revolution: Hello Kitty (DDR Hello Kitty) is a Bemani Pocket Hello Kitty/Dance Dance Revolution game.

name: Dark and Darker
summary: An unforgiving hardcore fantasy FPS dungeon PvPvE adventure. Band together with your friends and use your courage, wits, and cunning to uncover mythical treasures, defeat gruesome monsters, while staying one step ahead of the other devious treasure-hunters.

name: Dash Rider
summary: Dashrider is a fast-paced 2D shooter game, in which you fight your way through countless waves of enemies to earn coins. Purchase new skills or stunning boss battles. Defeat the three guards to face the final boss and complete the game.

name: Dalo
summary: Dalo, a combination of dot and halo. A fun and simple puzzle game where you should find a path that goes through all lines only passing through the same line once.

name: Dango!
summary: Dango! is a casual liquid puzzle game. You need to pass a variety of levels, draw a path through which the liquid will flow and fill the vessel.

name: Darklings
summary: Darklings stole all the stars from the world which is an essence of light and brought Darkness. Join Lum to purge the Darklings. Experience unique gesture driven gameplay blended with awesome noire artwork carrying the touch based games to a whole new level. Save the stars, save the world. Darkness is coming!

name: Dad and Me: Super Daddy Punch Hero
Darkrise
summary:
Darkrise is a classic hardcore game that was created by a small group of indie developers in nostalgic pixel style.
In this action RPG game you can get acquainted with 4 classes - Mage, Warrior, Archer and Rogue. Each of them has their own unique skills, game mechanics, features, strengths and weaknesses.
Homeland of the game hero has been invaded by goblins, undead creatures, demons and neighbouring countries. Now the hero has to become stronger and clean the country from invaders.

name: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse
summary: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse is an open world gambling simulator. You must help ‘Daguri’ pay the debts he racked up during an unintended gambling spree. Roam the world, bet on gambling mini-games, and make some money!

name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2
summary: Dave Mirra returns along with 14 pro riders including Ryan Nyquist, Mike Laird and Collin Mackay. 8 levels are on offer, with a total of 1,500 tricks to master. You can create your own BMX park thanks to the Park Editor mode.

name: Daybreaker VR
summary: Scavenge loot to survive in this zombie infested post-apocalyptic sandbox VR shooter. Piece together your own guns from the loot you find, or go toe-to-toe with nothing more than a sharpened stick.

name: Dance Praise: The Original
summary: Dance Praise: The Original is a Christian dance video game developed and published by Digital Praise.

name: Dance Praise 2: The ReMix
summary: Dance Praise 2: The Remix is the sequel to Dance Praise, with more songs and support for up to 4 players, as well as several single-player mini-games.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's Murders in the Rue Morgue - Collector's Edition
Dark Hermetic Order
summary: A cancelled first person action adventure game planned as a sequel to Azrael's Tear. Players would take the role of a secret agent with magic powers, who infiltrates a strange cult to eliminate their leaders.

name: Dark Hour
summary: A commercial add-on for Quake that adds new custom levels.

name: Dark Lord's Maze
summary:
DARK LORD'S MAZE is a 3D dungeon crawler made in 8-bit style.

Jump right into this colorful, pixelated world full of traps, enemies and different environmental hazards and enjoy a true classic gaming experience, fueled by the sounds of Commodore 64's SID and a fair amount of difficulty!

name: Dark Deity: Suns Out, Swords Out
summary: Step into the world of Terrazael…and get tanned! In this DLC package, explore additional stories from before and after the events of the base game to learn more about some of your favorite characters and see how well they can rock those board shorts!

name: Dark Romance: Vampire Origins - Collector's Edition
summary: When the dead return with a vengeance...

name: Daughter of Reyn
summary: Avenge your father. Reclaim your throne.

name: Dance Around
summary:
A dance game that anybody can play! Dance Around is the newest dance game in Bemani's arcade lineup, following in the footsteps of DanceEvolution Arcade with a full motion capture dance game, featuring choreographed routines for all levels of play.

Dance together in real-time with the AI on screen as the camera captures your movements.

By following the timeline at the top of the screen, players can see what moves are coming up next.

Select from light, standard, or training mode, and even capture motion data of the moves you did on screen, exported as your selected avatar following along on your mobile device.

name: Darkwing Duck
summary: Darkwing Duck is a bootleg port of the NES version of Darkwing Duck for Sega Genesis.

name: Dancing Onigiri
summary: Dancing☆Onigiri is an open-source Japanese web browser rhythm game that is currently written with Javascript, HTML and CSS, and was formerly made using Flash. This game contains charts of various keymodes such as 5key, 7key, 11key, etc. that are either played static or dynamic, all community made! You can even create your own charts and even keymodes, provided that you know how!

name: Dance of Cards
summary: A tactical gambling RPG where you must survive seven days of a deadly cruise playing poker.

name: Dark Blue Warriorr
summary: A portal from Deep Blue appeared, and the protagonist of the warrior decided to walk into the portal to find out. Come on, warrior.

name: Dan the Inmortal
summary: Dan wants to reach the top to drink the fountain of mortality, will he be able to reach his goal?

name: Dash Shooters
summary: Dash Shooters is a multiplayer, fast paced racing game, where the main movement mechanic is dashing! You can race through a randomly generated map, gather powerups, fight your friends, go through objectives, shoot crystals, and much more! Play with up to six of your friends for endless fun!

name: Dayshift at Freddy's 2: Electric Boogaloo
summary: Dayshift at Freddy's II or DSAF 2, is the direct sequel to the infamous DSaF 1! Once again, you must survive a week as a suited worker at Freddy Fazbender's Pepperoneri in the year of 1987 (months after the events of DSaF 1!) Once again, you must wear ridiculous-looking suits, give out cake to screaming toddlers and get through the week without being killed (or worse: fired!) This time though, Freddy's is bigger, has more possessed, mucus-dripping robots, and has even more choices and consequences. Powerful forces are at work and Freddy's has one last chance before they're shut down for good. This is your last chance to make things right. Or kill more kids and hang out with aubergine-man. Whatever sounds the best to you, heh.

name: Dash FPS
summary: Dash FPS is a fun-filled Multiplayer First-Person Shooter with all kinds of new mechanics. Players have the option to utilize Jetpacks, Super speed, and much more. Play against our High Quality AI or battle against others on an online server.

name: Day of the Dino Survival
summary: In this alternate timeline, German Scientist found a way to make a door way into a different reality. By doing so managed to bring dinosaurs into our world. Being Germany's last hope to push the Red Army out of Reich the scientist unleash the dinosaurs upon the world.

name: Dagger of heroes
summary: Dagger of heroes - Are you able to resist the forces of evil? That captured the peaceful outskirts and destroy their inhabitants. Try your luck and find out what awaits you on the battlefield? Or will you put up with it and take it for granted?

name: Dance Hime: Rhythm Matching
summary: “Dance Hime: Rhythm Matching” is a VR game that combines match-3 with music and dance. It focuses on match-3 and girls' hot dance. In addition to the sense of achievement after a successful match-3, players can also enjoy the immersive dance of elven girls.

name: Daring Academy
summary: You move to a new futuristic college in Olis with your best friend, Amelia Sweet, and meet others. Create trust, relationships, explore the deepest parts of Olis, etc. Will you grow close or drift further apart? Welcome to the crazy world of Daring Academy!

name: Dark Past
summary: Dark Past is based on psychological horror by paranormal activity occurring during your investigations. Play solo or up to 4 players to try and solve the mystery of what entity is left behind.

name: Day of Pixel
summary: Top Down open World/ 2D Platformer Wild west, Farm, Restaurant, Explore, Shoot!

name: Dark Notes
summary: Dark Notes is a dark suspense plot puzzle game. You will play the two protagonists, traveling through time and space, to explore the secrets hidden in the happiness mall!

name: Darkness Inside
summary: Darkness Inside is a first-person atmospheric horror game. The game takes place in an old house. You will be playing the game as James, who is a paranormal investigator.

name: Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2022
summary: In this, play as someone who has the most basic understanding of golf. You can't tell how far the hole is or where the ball goes after you hit it, but you can keep trying and eventually get the ball through the entire course.

name: Dark Maidens
summary: Dark Maidens is a side scrolling action game where you fight through hordes of enemies to test your metal against the strongest of foes. It has an advanced combat system in which you can light attack, heavy attack, block, fake out, and dodge. Don't expect an easy win as the enemies fight back!

name: Dad's Coming
summary: Meet Dad's Coming, a fast paced co-op game about cleaning up your mess before your parents come back home! Help Kate and Bob cooperate to get items across rooms and hazards to get rid of the mess in time! Careful not to break anything and be aware of Jack, a kitty that loves knocking things over!

name: Darkion
summary: Welcome to The First, The father of all dimensions including yours. Fight for me entity, You are here for a reason. Eliminate our mutual enemy and make yourself some room in this superior world.

name: Daimakaimura
summary:
The PC-Engine SuperGrafx port of Ghouls 'n Ghosts.

Players progress from left to right (from bottom to top in level 3), and have to hack down the aforementioned monsters with a sword. The journey includes ledges, ladders, lava pits and slippery slopes. Different weapons can be collected, by finding suits of armor inside chests. Each of the five stages has its own setting and a final boss.

name: Dark Atlas: Infernum
summary: If Hell is a state of the soul, this story is the descent to the inner abyss. Atlas Negro: Infernum is a disturbing first-person story , where the end of the world is combined with psychological terror in a survival horror experience with a strong narrative component.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Deluxe Edition
summary: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: Dark Lands
summary: Run through enemies and dangerous traps! Dark Lands is an epic battle runner action game. Develop your hero to survive this infinity battle and run as long as possible!

name: Dark Egg
summary: A surrealist text-based RPG. You will explore an island, solve puzzles, and fight enemies, all in your attempt to get the Dark Egg.

name: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type
summary: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type is a Role-Playing game, developed by Global A and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Dabble Worlds
summary:
Dabble Worlds is a maker-style platformer focusing on a wide set of mix-and-match level pieces and a variety of gadgets and enemies to play with. Get creative and build a level unlike anything seen before, then unleash it for other players to try their hand at it. Take a look through other levels out there to see if you can manage to improve your personal best, and maybe find some inspiration for your next masterpiece.

Dabble Worlds aims to improve on the maker genre by removing level themes altogether in favor of full customization of how your background looks, which rules are in play, and more. No theme-locked tiles, backgrounds and music. Everything can be mixed together however you want.

name: Daydream Mosaics 3: Shards of Hope
summary: Help Juliette in her new venture onto foreing lands.

name: Date Us, You Won't
summary:
You're at the University's annual festival and somehow got dragged into participating in a dating booth. Since you're here now, might as well go for the ride, right?

Join our wacky OCs for silly jokes and simple chit-chat.

This game is meant to be a small interactive experience for you and these characters. There is no big arching story, just a conversation between two people who have just met!

name: Danmaku Juuenka: Danmaku Card Battle
summary:
Players place "characters" from their own "deck" on a 6x6 "map."
The player "moves" his or her character across the field, shooting barrages of bullets with "spell cards" and avoiding barrages of enemy characters with "graze".
Even if your character is destroyed, you can "replenish" your deck of cards to regroup and fight until the enemy's "remaining" units are reduced to zero in this thrilling strategic duel game.

name: Darts
summary:
Darts is based on the classic 501 dart game, starting with a score of 501 your goal is to 0 with the minimum number of dart throws and just like the classic game you can score doubles and triples. There are 15 rounds and in each round you throw 3 darts, the player to either reach 0 or has the lowest score wins the game.

Play against family and friends or play against the computer’s smart artificial intelligence (AI) player, either way, winning won’t come easy.

name: Darkness Revenge
summary: Choose between a male or female character and take revenge on your killers as a vampire!

name: Day of the Shell
summary: Day of the Shell is a “one-click, one-turn” tactical rogue-lite. In a shattered and flooded world, travel from island to island with only hope and a revolver, challenging and appeasing the gods.

name: Darksiders II: Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition includes free access to the "Argul's Tomb" DLC pack, when it becomes available.

Wield the unstoppable power of Death, the most feared of the legendary Four Horsemen. Battle forces of heaven, hell and beyond, in an epic world unlike anything you have seen before.

name: Dayshift at Freddy's 3
summary: Dayshift at Freddy's 3 is the third and final game in the series.

name: Darkest Abyss
summary: Darkest Abyss is a platform/action game inspired by the Classic-Vania genre.

name: Dash the Fox & Three Dreadful Pigs
summary: Do you know how hard is to be a teenage fox among the three crazy pigs trying to get power in the dark forest? Explore the story in action adventure platformer in Beat'em up style. Join Dashe's crazy adventure, run jump, dash & smash, bring the forest peace and solve the most fascinating mystery.

name: Daily Dungeon Club
summary: Crawl a new dungeon every day, competing against the world in this bite-sized turn-based strategy game. Start fresh each run and use your wits and strategic shop rolling to score as many points as you can.

name: Danghost
summary: Danghost is an arcade puzzle game, inspired by fighting games, in which you play an exorcist who needs to hoover up small ghosts. Make combos, use unique spells and beat your opponents! Playable in single-player, it’s with the local multiplayer mode that the game will reveal all its spice!

name: Dark Old Sun II: Unspace
summary: A calamity that imprisons everyone in a dying earth, the unspace. Explore the uncharted space in random generated maps, get new weapons in a diablo-like weapon drop system and upgrade them, level up, and also chilling inside your spaceship listening to amazing synthwave tracks. Conquer the unknow.

name: Darfall
summary: Darfall is a strategy survival city-builder with RPG elements. You lead your hero with a band of warriors to defend your settlement, explore the corrupted land and craft new items. Expand your settlement and defeat the darkness coming from everywhere.

name: Daomei Village
summary: You have been banished to Daomei Village for your offense. In order to return to the Emperor's favor, you must make an effort. Repair, build, cultivate fields and fight various adversities. Meet new friends and learn their stories. Do whatever it takes not to be banished forever!

name: Darxwift
summary: Look for supplies, fight monsters, and try to get out of the infected underground shelter before time runs out!

name: Dangerous Community
summary: Welcome to Sterling Hollows... Play as Jacoby Paccs and explore the town to learn about Jacoby and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobys life, and optionally use violence against other residents.

name: Daybreak
summary: You are a rogue gun-for-hire that has been contracted to deploy into an outbreak zone to uncover the truth of a widespread pandemic. Armed with just your wits & determination, you must fight your way through the horde, befriend local survivors, and fight off the scavengers that lurk in the shadows.

name: Days of Despair
summary: Explore the Wall who divided civilization and take it down.

name: Dash Out
summary: A music-based game where you dash through the levels and complete rhythmic challenges

name: Data Break
summary: Data Break is a darkly humorous RPG, inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale and LISA: The Painful. You play as an office drone who lives a seemingly ordinary life, but something isn't right... A mysterious stranger will soon set into motion a series of events that gradually reveal the horrifying truth...

name: Dad's Dice: History of Legends
summary: Once, a DnD session went out of control. The kids found themselves in a magical world of tabletop adventures. It's time for Dad to step into the game! Become a hero, roll the dice, and save the children from the clutches of the tabletop monsters. Every roll shapes your destiny!

name: Dad by the Sword
summary: Dad by the Sword is a First Person Swordfighting game with a heavy focus on tactical dismemberment, dynamic slicing, giant spraying fountains of purple blood, and dad jokes. Play as YOUR DAD in his quest to fight evil hot dogs, Wizzards, things hatched from eggs, and other vile Anti-Dads.

name: Darq: Ultimate Edition
summary:
DARQ tells the story of Lloyd, a boy who finds himself in the middle of a lucid nightmare. Unable to wake up, Lloyd has to face his fears and decipher the meaning of the dream.

The Complete Edition includes the base game + 2 DLCs + Graphic novel + Artbook + Soundtrack + Stickers

name: Datura Time
summary:
Datura Time is a third-person action-adventure game that catapults you into a realm swirling with mystery, suspense, and dynamic action. This captivating world is a tribute to the 90's console games era, handcrafted with love and passion by a single-developer, Vladeta Stojanovic, with an infusion of post-Soviet and Eastern European aesthetics.

You, the player, are plunged into an enigmatic alternative reality known as the "Zone" after an accidental encounter with a peculiar drug - "Datura". Here, you'll cross paths with a host of characters, some allies, some foes, all delivering a singular message - you are an outsider and the unfolding reality is more than meets the eye.

As you navigate this perilous world, you'll unravel the Zone's hidden truths - it's a metaphysical limbo, home to the souls of Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union, currently under the control of malevolent entities. This sinister realm is in desperate need of a true hero - a role YOU never expected but must now embrace. Your mission? Survive, defeat the wicked forces, restore balance, and return home.

name: Dark Moon Motel
summary: Dark Moon Motel is a horror comedy game set in a run-down motel in the middle of nowhere, where the guest are a little bit monstrous. Gather clues, solve puzzles, avoid monsters, take out the trash, and try not to die while doing it.

name: Dangerous Fists
summary: This is dangerous fists, the real experience of fighting in VR, the video game when you can fight to the end, there is no rules, no limited time to beat your opponent, fight to win!.

name: Danger Ducklings
summary: Cautiously navigate 2 cute but not-so-bright ducklings through dangerous puzzles. You'll need to keep track of both ducks' movements at once in over 100 asymmetrical levels. Collect stars to unlock new modes, costumes, and levels. Complete jobs on construction sites, in castles, and even in space!

name: Da Vinci Cannon 2
summary:
Capture the enemy's castle!
Destroy everything around with the aid of an ingenious invention of the great scientist Da Vinci.
His gun is ready to bear the destruction!
But do not forget! There are prisoners who should free Au. And the treasures that will help you go to victory.

name: Dawnlands
summary: Dawnlands is an Open-World Survival Crafting cross-platform game with a massive world and epic lore. A variety of biomes, relics, and puzzles dot the landscape... an ancient land, lain dormant for centuries, is waiting to be awoken. New stories are waiting to be written.

name: Darold the Doomer: Back 2 Reality
summary: The sequel that takes place in the real world.

name: Datasight
summary: will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. Your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

name: Dawn of Arba
summary: Become a new adventurer in a massive online multiplayer adventure. Explore the new Dawn emerging over the horizon of a new world, ARBA. Although beautiful at first sight, ARBA's history harbors a hidden secret and a much deeper and dangerous truth.

name: Dawn of Kagura: Maika's Story - The Dragon's Wrath
summary: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Maika's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! To save the villagers, Maika decides to take up her pike and go into battle once more...

name: Dasshutsu Game: Neko-sama no Karakuri Garden kara no Dasshutsu
Dark Flow
summary: Three bandits kidnaped a girl, bring her to an abandoned building and wait for a ransom, they chose the right victim but chose the wrong place.

name: Dark Throne: The Queen Rises
summary: Exhilarating Attacks and Thrilling Battles!

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Audi RS Q e-tron Hybrid Car
summary: Get your hands on the off-road futuristic prototype with an innovative drivetrain concept and Dare to Drive into the future of rally racing with the all-new Audi RS Q e-tron.

name: Dark Desire 4
summary: This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Dance Rail 3
summary: A Free Mobile Rhythm Game!

name: Dance of Decapods
summary: A minimalist single screen bullet hell where your space insect must survive waves of enemies. Evolve to fight back with more than 30 different parts, from bio weapons to bullet enhancement.

name: Daikaijuu no Gyakushuu
summary: An overhead run-and-gun game in which a kaiju terrorizes an island.

name: Days of Memories: Ooedo Renai Emaki
summary: Top SNK fighters are involved in a new romance. The attractive female warriors in SNK's fighting games are here as pop idols and sports stars for you to date. Plan the best school trip for them and in this semi-casual setting, get to know them better.

name: Days of Memories 2: Boku no Ichiban Taisetsu na Kimi he
summary: The second Days of Memories game.

name: Days of Memories: Boku to Kanojo no Atsui Natsu
summary: Female warriors and other girls from SNK games make their appearances in this dating simulation game.

name: Days of Memories: Koi ha Good Job!
summary: In Koi wa Good Job!, the protagonist is a professional photographer who is searching for the next big model or scoop for his studio.

name: Days of Memories: Junpaku no Tenshi-tachi
summary: Junpaku no Tenshitachi takes place in a hospital and is a mystery-romance story. The protagonist is a patient, injured due to being trampled by a horse in the beginning.

name: Days of Memories: Kare to Watashi no Atsui Natsu
summary: An otome game featuring the guys from King of Fighters.

name: Days of Memories: Boku to Kanojo to Koto no Koi
summary: The protagonist is a member of Iori Yagami's band and is attending a special private school.

name: Days of Memories: Kaze Mau Miyako de Tsukamaete!
summary: This game concludes the previous two titles and is staged at a place similar to the last two entries.

name: Days of Memories: Sekai de Ichiban Atsui Fuyu
summary: Released in December 1, 2008. This game is very similar to the first Season 365 no Omoi and concludes the previous two titles and is staged at a place similar to the last two entries. The protagonist is a third year kendo student who is energetic and reckless. He has to decide who he wants to spend his Christmas party with this year. The title parodies a popular Japanese phrase and TBS drama, One Hot Summer. The girls are Athena Asamiya, Mai Shiranui, Hibiki Takane, Hotaru Futaba, Rose Bernstein, Reina Takida, and Nintendo DS-only Athena Hatsushiro.

name: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen G
summary: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen G, officially translated as Super Robot Wars II Gleam, is a Strategy game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Day at School My Teacher Game
Danzai no Maria: The Exorcism of Maria La Campanella
summary: A port for PSP.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Raven Collector's Edition
summary: The renowned archaeologist Alan Dillinger is dead, seemingly by his own hand. At his side is a note detailing his love for a woman named Lenore. It seems to be a simple case of romance gone wrong. But the mysterious client who summoned you isn't so sure. He believes Alan was murdered! And he's not the only one. Join the brilliant detective Dupin and dive into a world of lies, betrayal, and revenge. You'll soon find yourself on the trail of the enigmatic White Crow, who takes a more deadly approach to solving the case. Can you uncover the truth? Find out in this chilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Dasshutsu Adventure: Dai Nana no Yogen
Dasshutsu Adventure: Shuuen no Kuroi Kiri
Dasshutsu Seijin!? Deru Deru Deru de
Dasshutsu Adventure: Shiawase no Akai Ishi
Dasshutsu Adventure: Majo no Sumu Yakata
Dasshutsu Adventure: Akumu no Shinigami Ressha
Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Core + Taito & Sega Packs
summary:
Burst into the depths of parallel space!
New combatants join the fray!

name: Day Hard
summary: Day Hard is a single player adventure set before the events narrated in Half-Life 2. You play as Gordon’s brother, Morgan Freeman. One day Morgan finds the Combines knocking at his door: from then on, it will be a constant fight for survival (We hired Wilbur Smith to write this script).

name: Dangerous Ji-San to 1000-nin no Otomodachi Yokoshima
Dakkan Shirei Majo Dungeon: Nushi to Tamenara Yaraneba Narumai
Dark Souls II: Black Armor Edition
summary:
