Dark Souls II: Black Armor Edition is a special edition released in March 2014. It includes the base game packaged in a collectable steel bookcase and comes with a bonus soundtrack CD. The steel bookcase features unique artwork, providing a more premium presentation for the game.

It also provides early access to the following weapons and shields:

- Black Flamestone Dagger and Black Flamestone Parma
- Bound Hand Axe and Bound Wooden Shield
- Homunculus Mace and Homunculus Wooden Shield
- Transgressor's Staff and Transgressor's Leather Shield
- Yellow Quartz Longsword and Yellow Quartz Shield

name: Dance on the Water
summary: Dance on the Water is a collection of 10 boom-compatible maps featuring challenging combat and platforming. Most of the maps are short to medium in length, except map 3 which might take more than 10 hours to beat on UV.

name: Dark Tales from México: Prelude. Just a Dream... with the Sack Man
summary: An Handmade 3D Survival Horror based on true Mexican Folk Tales and Clay Sculptures.

name: Dark Escape
summary: A micro RPG

name: Darkest Fear
summary:
Darkest Fear is a puzzle exploration game containing switches, boxes, doors and various dynamic light sources (like flashlights and lanterns) that the player uses to solve puzzles. In this game Thomas Warden searches for his lost family members (his wife Susan and his daughter Helen) through fifteen missions in a monster-ridden old hospital. He has to talk to other patients and find ways to travel deeper into the hospital.

Thomas' most important enemy is darkness. Venturing in the dark deals damage, so he has to open windows to let the light in, find light switches or carry lanterns and flashlights. He is also able to lit fireplaces, carry mirrors and talk to other characters. There are multiple endings and the plot continues in the sequels Grim Oak and Nightmare.

name: Darkest Fear 2: Grim Oak
summary:
Grim Oak is the second game in the Darkest Fear trilogy. It takes place five years after the events of the first game. The game now takes place in the town Grim Oak and features Thomas Warden again in the most important role.

The gameplay is still shown from an overhead view and consists mainly of small puzzles, usually based on light. This time there are more light sources, three hidden mini-games (a darts game, a worm game and a Pong game) and the whole town of Grim Oak to explore instead of just the hospital. The player can revisit places, battle monsters and solve item puzzles.

name: Darkest Fear 3: Nightmare
summary: Nightmare is the third and final game in the Darkest Fear trilogy and features two playable characters instead of just one in the previous games, Thomas Warden and his daughter Helen with cooperative gameplay. The game mechanics remain the same: survival horror mainly based on light sources and lots of puzzle solving, all shown from an overhead view. The game has a hidden Pong-like mini-game, 15 different endings, and Helen can obtain three unique monster abilities.

name: Daemonum
summary:
A Heart To Reclaim
Call for help and horror

name: Daddy
summary: Sabotage a cult and their schemes in this Mystery, Horror, FPS. Explore a mansion while massacring the creepy followers and their foul abominations. Find various weapons to slay your enemies with and uncover the cruel secrets of the organization.

name: Darken Derek: The Last Fallen
summary: Play the role of an insane being apish looking and face a new threat. Arm yourself to the teeth and prevent aliens to kidnap our beloved woman. Kick back invaders to their own galaxy or kill them all! Will you be able to save all girls bringing peace again in Club City?

name: Dagdrøm
summary: Dagdrøm is a classic point-and-click adventure, where you travel across desert dunes towards The Great Tower to find questions, answers and most importantly: something to drink.

name: Dan's Odyssey
summary: An arcade arena top down shooter. fast paced action with a great sound-track. shoot your way through the approaching enemy shapes, upgrade your character and beat the high score.

name: Darkness Reborn
summary: Short and very dark Medival-Fantasy themed Single-Player RPG

name: Dark Steel
summary:
Shatter your chains, fight, and seek revenge against those who kept you enslaved for years. Knight, Warrior or Assassin, choose your class wisely and face hundreds of enemies in this fabulous medieval combat game with impressive 3D graphics and realistic physics.
Make the most of your mobile device and fight as if you were playing on console in an over-the-shoulder 3D perspective that will make you feel like you’re inside the game. Control your character with extremely simple gestures on your touchscreen, moving your character as you see fit and executing different attacks and combos.
Confront other players in multiplayer mode to obtain exclusive weapons and armor or work with them during the temporary events to defeat the Guardian of the Tower.

name: Darkdire: The Advanced Set - Greencastle Expansion
summary: The kingdom of Union Port long ago built a large stone wall circling the kingdom, but the wall wasn't built to keep out invaders. It was built to seal off the center of the kingdom. Anyone that knows why it was built isn't revealing any secrets.

name: Daemonum
summary: Detective Andrews is called to a residence after a message is placed to dispatch regarding a disturbance. Not everything is as it seems, leaving you to question your own sanity whilst figuring out how to escape with your life.

name: Dark Harvest: Ascension
summary: Reconstruct yourself from the corpses of your fallen enemies wielding their power as your own. A dark fantasy sci-fi action adventure game.

name: Dark Days: Devil Hunt
summary: Fight with many demon goblin golems that invaded all over the Middle Ages Use your special powers.

name: Dahliphoria
summary: When the player comes across a bridge in the darkened forest, they have an option to either cross it or turn back. A cryptic romance-horror creepypasta-esque game with many hidden layers and a story to piece together, recommended for a community to solve.

name: Dark Mist
summary: Alan is a young knight apprentice descended from the guardian clan of Nardin, Nardin is a peaceful city, that is invaded by cruel ones that cause fear and panic to the local citizens.

name: Dark City: International Intrigue - Collector's Edition
summary: An urgent message brings a world-renowned detective to a New York City engulfed in flames, but the deadly infernos are just the beginning!

name: Dark Corridors
summary: Explore, survive and report! A horror-based exploration game. Experience a story of betrayal, hate, and human rights violations as Jake Swanson. Bring the truth to the public.

name: Dark Sweeper
summary: Dark Sweeper - a shooter about a soldier, which takes place in the wastelands filled with various creatures and marauders. You are a young corporal sent to a military operation, your task is to defeat the enemies.

name: Dancing Stage MegaMix
summary:
Dancing Stage MegaMix is the fifth home release in the Dancing Stage series, a European version of the Dance Dance Revolution series of music video games. MegaMix was the first Dancing Stage game released on the Sony PlayStation 2 game console.

Based largely on Dancing Stage EuroMix 2, MegaMiX was separated from the arcade game by a completely different track list of songs. The game was marketed by Konami as a family game and an exercise tool in an effort to make the niche series more mainstream.

name: Darling of the Sea
summary: Darling of the Sea is a short romance thriller game about the protagonist, Ivy Blue, who wished on a shooting star on her lover's death anniversary; and her resurrected lover. There are slight horror elements and 4 endings in this game.

name: Darksite
summary: Darksite is a first person single player horror experience. Explore different locations and find out where your friend went off to. Use puzzle elements, exploration and audio cues to reach the end goal.

name: Dark Desire 6
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Dark Desire 5
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Darwake: Awakening from the Nightmare
summary: A 2D puzzle platformer set in a dark eerie world. Our melancholic hero Darwin, accompanied by a mysterious Owl, must find a way out of a maze by solving environmental puzzles and fighting spectacular bosses.

name: Dark Tree
summary: In a world where virtue considered a relic of the past, something is changing. Tormented by omen-dreams six heroes going to the distant kingdom of Hevalos. Fight hordes of enemies and the machinations of fate to uncover the secret of the Dark Tree.

name: Dark Adaption
summary: Dark Adaption is a 5 player co-op scifi horror game. You and your team board a mining ship in distress, to identify and capture the alien organism, that has entered the ship. Work together to identify the alien's unique traits, to produce an effective tranquilizer and capture the alien.

name: Daily Life With My Succubus Boss
summary: With the lewd succubus, start a cohabitation life without shame and impatience. Master artist Tamada Heijun, super crazy full Live 2D!

name: Darksiders III: DLC Bundle
summary: This DLC Bundle contains The Crucible and keepers of the Void.

name: Dasshutsu Game: Komorebi no Aru Hou he
Date A Live: Rio Reincarnation - Deluxe Edition
Dark Riddle
summary: Find out the scary secrets of the neighbor.

name: Dark Siren
summary: Be careful not to be captured by the Dark Siren, find the note left by the sailors, uncover the truth, and escape.

name: Dark Deity: Complete Edition
summary:
Command legendary heroes to reshape a land fractured by broken oaths, reckless war, and a secret search for arcane power. The ancient artifacts and powerful weapons you discover will empower your cast of 30 playable characters as they form bonds and battle their way into legend.

Dark Deity: Complete Edition includes:
• Dark Deity - The Game
• Dark Deity - Suns Out, Swords Out
• Dark Deity - Digital Artbook
• Dark Deity - Soundtrack

name: Dashing Dinosaurs & Sexy Centaurs: Winter's Tale 2
summary: The Elves are once again in need of proper leadership in order to save the holidays AGAIN. But these Elves.... are a little different.

name: Danganronpa: Resort Killing
summary: A new killing game begins as you and 15 other participants enter... A resort? You play as Yu Narukami from the persona series. Things seem off right from the start but things only continue to get stranger in this crossover fan game based off of the Danganronpa series by Spike Chunsoft. Featuring characters from Persona, Re:Zero, Yugioh, Super Mario, Touhou, Konosuba, River City, YiiK, Katawa Shoujo, Danganronpa, as well as Gordon Ramsey. Try to survive and uncover the truth inside this deadly resort.

name: David Get Keen
summary: Get Keen for fast-paced 3D platforming built around momentum. Run, dash, and spin through abstract levels, smash up robots, and improve your best times.

name: Dance Assembly
summary:
A 3D sandbox game in which the player can create their own characters using simple shapes, and then make them dance.
It's a game focused on creativity, and having fun, with zero stakes whatsoever. There are endless possibilities, with the game allowing the player to create literally anything they want. And there's nothing more fun than seeing your epic creation (or monstrosity) dance like there's no tomorrow!

name: DarkWind
summary: DarkWind is a text-based role-playing game with in-browser access.

name: Dango Dash
summary: Dango Dash is a platformer adventure game that combines fast-paced action with an engaging story about growing up and fighting for what you believe in. Help Dango in his quest to save his village and defeat the evil Hanami ninja clan threatening their peace.

name: Dawn of Dark Blood
summary:
Dawn of Dark Blood is a psychological Thriller puzzle game inspired from old ps1 games like Silent Hill and Resident Evil, with a pinch of VHS for effect.

Michael, son of a poor maid, gets a letter from his mother asking him to visit, as the person for whom she works, has a job for him. But when he arrives troubling and horrifying secrets about the Mansion are uncovered.

name: Daze
summary:
A Yume Nikki fan game made for the Dream Diary Jam 2018.
A game by the name, Daze or Da-Ze which follows the 'story' of someone called Nio. Go to sleep and get effects.

name: Dawn of Dreams
summary: Dawn of Dreams is a 3D fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A woman by the name of Doakeru is our protagonist, a lone being living in the middle of a desert. Nevertheless, she manages to reach other people through her dreams, exploring theirs instead.

name: Darkest Wave
summary: A mod with 3 maps.

name: Dark Duel
summary: A collectible card game that combines chess with cards. Extremely strategic with dark fantasy themes.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Poppy Playtime Panic
summary: The Poppy Playtime Panic DLC is a limited time new level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. In this content you can explore and try to survive in the Playtime Co. toy factory based on the original Poppy Playtime game. Characters in this DLC include Huggy Wuggy and Kissy Missy based on the original Poppy Playtime game.

name: Datenshi Kyouko Part 1
summary:
A part of "Sexy voice" series.

Three esper fallen angels are sent to Kyoko to play with her.

name: DaisyPop
summary: iOS game based on Every Extend.

name: Darumeshi Sports Store
summary:
The original Japanese version of the game known in the West as Rusty's Real Deal Baseball. This version has differences from the overseas port, including a very different design for the main character.

The title was officially translated in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Dark Shrine
summary: Dark Shrine is a short horror game set in a japanese shrine.

name: Dawn Apart
summary: Mine resources, maintain a growing settlement of fortune hunters and defend it against the fierce native population. Or flip the script - and start a rebellion against the greedy corporation exploiting your new home…

name: Dagon Ball Super: Lost Episode
summary:
Dagon Ball Super: Lost Episode is part of a series of Dragon ball Hentai games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters in this specific case, focusing on Broly and Cheelai, and their adventures.
Let's just say that, Saiyans love strong women, and Cheelai loves strong saiyans especially one who's constantly with her without his shirt.

name: Days Before the Festival
summary: A fan made Genshin Impact dating simulator.

name: Dark Eden
summary: It is a cancelled Nintendo Game Boy Advance games from Rival Dreams, a short-lived studio created by three employees at Acclaim. As one of the developers, Kynan Pearson, stated, they were highly influenced by Symphony of the Night and Metroid. You journey around a castle collecting four different power ups: the run, the wall jump, the fire sword, and the super jump. A prototype was released in Oct 2022. It is a metroiodvania style game, there is about 6 to 8 minutes of gameplay.

name: Dance Fever HD
summary: Dance across 16 cool places around the world. Life is music… welcome to Dance Fever!

name: Dalek Mod
summary: Dalek Mod is a mod that brings the world of Doctor Who into your Minecraft! With this mod, you can travel the universe using a fully functional TARDIS, travel to Minecraft's past, battle Daleks, Cybermen, and more!

name: Dante's Inferno: St. Lucia Edition
summary:
The St. Lucia Edition is a “Game of the Year Edition” release and in addition to the game and manual the St. Lucia Edition includes the following:

exclusive artwork
The dark Forest DLC
Trials of St. Lucia DLC

This Version was only available in Italy.

name: Dark Night Maze
summary: "Dark Night Maze" is a very challenging maze adventure game, the biggest feature of the game is super difficult to clear the level, players need to collect various equipment, improve their abilities, find the exit to win.

name: Dardeep
summary: A brave miner falls into an endless stone cave, taking with him only a pickaxe. The only chance to survive is is to dig and find keys to locked doors.

name: Daily Dadish
summary: It’s an adventure that lasts a whole year! Daily Dadish is a retro platformer that features over 365 handcrafted levels - one for every day of the year! Face challenging foes, unlock cool characters, and help reunite Dadish with his missing kids all over again!

name: Daytona Rush
summary: The official Daytona game now on mobile!

name: Dante's Quest
summary: Darkness has fallen on princess Emilia’s castle. The evil king has sealed away all life and locked everyone in the castle walls. In her moment of need, Emilia calls to Dante, her loyal knight, to save the castle and defeat the king! Do you have what it takes to defeat the darkness and save Emilia’s castle?

name: Dawn in the Air
summary:
Become a Grand Master capturing ornithopters.
You have no idea which are the ornithopters?

name: Data Link: Cyberpunk Racing
summary: Data Link is an adventure arcade game with storyline made in the cyberpunk style like data wing.

name: Dagon: The Little Glass Bottle
summary: Join Captain William Jones and his party of men on a treasure hunt adventure! The Little Glass Bottle is the second official DLC for Dagon, based on the first surviving story by the master of weird fiction, written when he was… 7 years old! Take some rest from cosmic horror and eldritch underwater beings and experience the other, more humorous, side of young H. P. Lovecraft!

name: Danger Cliff
summary: It's a 2D Collectathon! Pull of crazy stunts with the directional cone rush and other moves as you blast through huge levels with unique sets of mechanics and visual style!

name: Dawn One
summary: Fight to survive till Dawn One in the most accessible hardest top-down action game ever (Self proclaimed). Mouse only.

name: Dance World
summary: A sea of communication - talk with friends, join clubs, take a walk through game chats! New acquaintances - find friends, create relationships, play a magnificent wedding, become the most stylish couple! More than 5 thousand musical compositions to choose from, more than 10 dance modes!

name: Darkenstein 3D
summary: A retro shooter inspired by the older Wolfenstein and Doom games. A tribute of sorts, if you like, where I aspire emulate the games I love the most and that requires a certain amount of skill to complete, while adding a few personal and more current-day touches.

name: Dawn of Yokai
summary: This single player RPG takes place in Japan. This game involves a level of strategy, a mix of healing and damage is most effective. The game is meant to be replayed after the final boss but which path will you choose? This game was built using RPG Maker. Please leave comments and report bugs.

name: Dawn of Griseo
summary: A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists. The encounter between a boy living in a rural farming village and a girl who is a dark wizard leads to the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed.

name: Dawn of Hell
summary: Explore the cursed village and discover the sinister secrets it hides. Survive a terrible night and solve challenging puzzles as you try to escape the curse that plagues the place. Experience tension and fear at every step in this horror game.

name: Damn Birds
summary: An addictive and elaborate game where your gaming and strategic skills are put to the test as you aim to take down the birds and wisely invest your earned cash into weapons and defenses. The game is also equipped with high scores, play now and compete for the best score!

name: Dancing Pandas
summary: Not a dancing game! A chill, relaxing Indie adventure game. Roam around different islands helping out the villagers and animals. Rescue the islands from catastrophes with different collected tools, trade resources for upgrades and solve simple mysteries.

name: David Haye's Jungle Rumble
summary: David has his jungle holiday interrupted by his arch-enemies. Take control of the former Heavy Weight Champion and apply the noble and gentlemanly art of boxing to the faces of all in his way!

name: Dawn of Shadow
summary: Evil lurks the realm! An ancient force is awakening from it's ashes. Dawn of Shadow set in a Low-Fantasy Medieval World. Choose your path and dive into a tale of epic fantasy in this action RPG title!

name: Dark Box
summary: You wake up on an island trying to remember your identity. The only thing you can do is: explore the island, and try to solve the puzzles one by one, leading to the ultimate truth.

name: DarkMatter: The Strange Messenger
summary: Explore the Earth that has been transformed by dark matter. Listen to the stories of life told by those who survived the harsh environment. You may not be able to hear their story. Why? You may find it hard to survive in this harsh environment. Don't give up! Your abandonment will make us sad.

name: Daidassou
summary: In this super-deformed sendup of WWII action tales, you're an Allied soldier infiltrating Axis prison castles to rescue your squaddies. Sneak and shoot your way through each level to releases your friends from their cells and then escape. You're armed with a pistol and limited ammo, facing a variety of Nazi-like guards patrolling the alleys and quarters you must also traverse. Disable these enemies, steal jail keys from them, and finish your prison break without a hitch!

name: Dark Night with Floppa
summary: Dark Night with Floppa is an emotional horror from the first person about searching for pictures in a dark forest. The gameplay is simple – You found yourself in the wilderness and now you need to explore this place to collect 8 pictures of cats that someone hid somewhere nearby. Find all the pictures before the Big Floppa finds you. There is no complicated pumping, complicated plot or expensive special effects in this game. Only your lonely character, the night forest, a spot of dim light from a flashlight and a Big Floppa.

name: Dark Paradise Nigelopia: Mini Mix
summary: A 2D action game that takes place in the Dark Paradise of Nigelopia, where girls are large and in charge! The guys are pretty cool too, but the big butt is the ULTIMATE weapon! Also there’s an optional Fart Mode, which gets very noisy! Zip across the colorful Dark Domains to take on your opponents!

name: Dark Dungeon Warrior
summary: Become a warrior and fight bravely to defeat the oncoming monsters!

name: Darker Tides
summary: A beast of unmeasurable power is rising from the depths of the sea, it seeks to engulf the world with it's dark tentacles, it's up to Aala to stop the Kraken.

name: Dark Burial: Enhanced Edition
summary: You play as a sentinel who needs to fight first squads of the enemies and light signal fires. The sentinel can shoot arrows from his crossbow and use shot arrow as a platform.

name: Dare to Spread
summary: Dare to Spread; It is a turn-based strategy game in which we shape the course of the war by making important choices. In this strategy game you control rebel armies. We occupy enemy countries with our armies. We do illegal work to finance the army.

name: DarkBlood Gaiden
summary: At the end of the world, there was a tower soaring high into the sky. The tower was said to hold treasures that could grant wishes, attracting many adventurers, but none of them ever returned. The king sent a group of knights to investigate the tower.

name: Dark Souls II: Seeker of Fire
summary: An overhaul mod for DS2 SOTFS that adds an entirely new experience to your next playthrough. This mod will rebalance the game mechanics and difficulty, as well as decorate and fill in objects in areas that feel a little empty, expanding upon the work of Tales of Drangleic.

name: Dangerous Seduction
summary: Dangerous Seduction is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You're a freelance writer who gets caught up in a group of most-wanted fugitives, involved in a conspiracy, and on top of that, fall in love with a fugitive.

name: Date or Ditch 2
summary: A Java-based dating sim by Gameloft, Date or Ditch 2 spans 22 chapters in New York City, featuring eight romanceable characters, three mini-games, and multiple endings. Gameplay centers on conversational choices (via icons) and building up (or tanking) relationships. Its lighthearted storyline, stylish presentation, and replay value make it feel like an extended romantic dinner rather than a fleeting encounter.

name: Dance Fight
summary: Dance Fight is a Beat 'em Up Brawler Game, Also with Cool Dance Moves !

name: Damien: The Game
summary: Damien: The Game is a game based on Markiplier's Damien YouTube Video.

name: Dalek: Dissolution Earth
summary:
A shooting gallery game where the Daleks have invaded Earth and you must defeat them to make your way to the river to escape to the north of the city.

Illustrated by Matt Parish, programmed by Phil Cox with original music by Ian Renshaw.

name: Dark Age Empires
summary: Dark Age Empires is an open world survival game that can be played in single player mode or as an online multiplayer game on a dedicated server.Do you have what it takes to not only survive in this dark age, but to rise up, fight back and create your own Dark Age Empire?

name: Dark Rune
summary: Dark rune - A story about a bounty hunter who decided to serve the local sheriff. The area is full of dangers, and you will have to deal with them alone. Find the dark rune stolen from the local vault!

name: Daiz
summary: Simple game based on Othello.

name: Dark Rooms
summary:
Dark Rooms is an engaging, very addictive puzzle game. With a chilling atmosphere and beautiful design, the game offers an entrancing mix of intriguing puzzles with a simple user interface.
The purpose of this game is to solve riddles to open doors and get out of all the rooms. You may also use the items found in the room to open the door and advance to the next level. Think out the box, can you escape the doors on your own?

name: Dash King
summary: Run and dash your way through danger in this super-fast action game!

name: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen
summary: A remake of 2nd Super Robots Wars released first in Super Robot Wars Complete Box, which was later released as a standalone title.

name: Dai-3-ji Super Robot Taisen
summary: A remake of Dai-3-ji Super Robot Taisen for the PlayStation, first released first in Super Robot Taisen Complete Box, then separately as a standalone release.

name: Datiddle
summary: A Wordle clone using data and analytics terms.

name: Dassouchuu: Tousou Shita Hannin wo Sagase!
Dark Desire Mute 3
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: DashZ
summary:
You need to avoid the walls, follow the rhythm slither forward.
Be careful, don't lose your combos.
Try how many scores you can get.

name: Dawn of Mages
summary:
Dawn of Mages is a new PvP Battle Arena that lays down the classical guns and the sword&board in favor of reality shaping spells.

Start a match and fight against other players (or AI) and show your skills in this fast-paced magical 3rd person shooter.

Skills and reaction time combined with strategy and fast-thinking in a fascinating and spectacular setting.

name: Dark Walk
summary: Close your eyes, let the sound guides you cross the adventure. In this app, you need to draw the correct path according to the different sounds. Try it!

name: Dark Traveller
summary: Dark Traveller is an action-packed puzzle game with multiple storylines and open endings. The game tells the story of a world on the brink of apocalypse in the distant future. In the world, you travel through quantum space-time to rescue your homeland on the rocks with the help of your partner!

name: Data Delivery Agents
summary: An edutainment puzzle game about the principles of ubiquitous connectivity. Help Ebi deliver packets across the world wide web; build paths using directional tiles across over 30 different levels.

name: Daisenryaku III '90
summary: Daisenryaku III '90 is a turn-based war strategy game.

name: Dango Thief
summary: Kazuki awakes one morning to find that he no longer exists. Play a game of hide n' seek in this psychological horror RPG game in order to reclaim his existence. You only have 7 days to win. Explore the town by day, survive fatal nightmares by night, and discover the mysteries of the Dreamscape.

name: Daemon Masquerade
summary: An anime-inspired supernatural detective game. Uncover the identities and powers of your adversaries using a conspiracy board full of evidence.

name: Darksy's Adventure
summary: Darksy's Adventure is a 3D platformer with furry characters and abstract 3D worlds. Tail whip and pounce your way to victory!

name: Dark Fiber
summary: Adventure science-fiction game developed by SolidState, Inc and NEC Interchannel.

name: Darkfate
summary: Darkfate is an exploration platformer that follows Chris Freeman, a man whose memory has failed him. He has no idea why he’s wandering around a snowy mountainside in freezing weather and decides to venture into nearby caves to seek out answers. During his odyssey, he keeps a record of his thoughts in a journal.

name: Day at the Races
summary: The aim of this "light-hearted" horse racing game is to win enough money to purchase, maintain and enter your horse in the prestigious Day at the Races Cup, held on the 5th race of the final day. Good luck!

name: Dangerous Dave Champion's Edition
summary:
The entire Dangerous Dave collection is here! From the 1988 original to the 1990 PC classic to the final 2021 remaster, all nine of Dave's adventures are here in this Champion's Edition! Here is the treasure locked within:

1988 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1990 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1991 Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
1991 Double Dangerous Dave
1992 Dangerous Dave Returns
1993 Dangerous Dave's Risky Rescue
1993 Dave Goes Nutz!
1995 Dangerous Dave Goes Nutz!
2021 Dangerous Dave Remaster
Pirate's Treasure Map Hint Guide for Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
Contains BOTH Windows and MacOS versions

name: Danganronpa: Lapse
summary:
10 students find themselves trapped in a luxurious mansion and soon discover there is only one requirement for escape — to kill each other.

Follow the story through Echo Pine’s eyes, unraveling the secrets of their enclosure and the secrets of their fellow students.

Danganronpa: Lapse is a not-for-profit project based on the series Danganronpa, by Kazutaka Kodaka, and bears no affiliation with Spike Chunsoft.

name: Darkside
summary: An online hacking game with no limits in a multiplayer only world. The objective of the game is to increase your wealth by any means necessary and upgrade your gear but beware, people will rip you apart

name: Dark Dead
summary: Dark Dead is a hardcore 2D action-platformer in which you have to fight an ancient evil and try to understand how and why you ended up in this place.

name: Day of the dead
summary: A multiplayer low-poly styled zombieshooter game

name: Days of the Divine
summary:
Long ago, in a valley where a small village lay, two deities fought each other. One was imprisoned, the other vanished. Yet some time ago, an unnatural mist began lingering in the village, dissolving people's memories.

Biyu, a young shrine maiden, is now working her hardest in the shrine of one of these deities in the faint hope the mist will one day dissolve. Even though her good friend also lost his memory, not all hope is lost; she meets a stranger who seems to be recovering from his memory loss, and rather quickly as well...

- Description from the games original post on the Lemmasoft forums

name: Dark Prisms
summary: In this strategic gem puzzle, drag your finger across unwanted gemstones so that the rest can fall into place and make complete horizontal lines. Make a row of red gems for added time and points, or match blue and green gems to receive special gem-busting items! Purple gems can't be removed by touching them, so you'll have to use your special items to clear them from the playing field! Time drains faster as you progress through the levels!

name: DarkSwarm
summary: DarkSwarm is a online+local CO-OP, top-down tactical shooter. Play SOLO or together as a TEAM of elite operators in procedural-generated semi-destructible levels. Use your skills, wits and teamwork to destroy the alien DarkSwarm in daring operations deep inside the infested colonies.

name: Dare to Speed
summary:
'Dare to Speed' is the top new addictive racing game.
Drive as fast as you can and doge through traffic, road works and clear jumps.

name: Date Time: Melissa, Morris, Anna
summary: Date three cuties through your hi-tech 8-bit computer! Uncover each of their mysteries, survive what lies underneath, meet goofy and friendly characters along the way! Play your cards right and you can smooch your dates!

name: Dark City: International Intrigue
summary: A magical mystery across three of the world's largest cities!

name: DataJack 2020
summary: Take contracts from sinister megacorporations in this stealth action immersive sim sequel to DataJack. Choose your approach: hack defenses, take down the guards, or blow a new entrance with explosives. Use your rewards to buy weapons, cyberlimbs, hack software, and ninja gear.

name: Dave the Bird
summary: Tired of Metroidvanias? You can't longer see roguelikes? Then Dave the Bird might just be the game for you! Fly through a park with Dave in this sidescroller/endless runner/highscore game, collect food and poop everything.

name: Day In Day Out
summary: Day In Day Out is a varied collection of mini-games inspired by events of daily life. The game offers a unique gaming experience that allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Mr. Lüneberg.

name: Dark Age Dinos
summary: Dark Age Dinos is a tactical roguelite. Travel alone or with friends through a medieval world of sword wielding dinosaurs. Strategize your way through short adventures where teamwork is the key to success!

name: Dark Age Legends
summary: The necromancer has brought the dark age to the world, and the realm's mightiest champions embark on a journey to defeat him and become legends. Build your team right, craft items, hone your skills, and bring an end to the dark age.

name: Darkzan Arena
summary: Challenge the greatest legends and creatures in this epic coliseum! Collect your treasures and upgrade your gears until you become number one in the entire multiverse. The game is an Arcade based on waves of enemies, each enemy has a unique behavior and a list of specific rewards.

name: Dam Busters
summary:
Dam Busters is the eleventh game in the NES version of Action 52.

You play as a creature that looks like a beaver, shoot objects that look like tomatoes. Your goal is to go through often linear mazes and exterminate enemies.

name: Dauntless
summary: Dauntless was one of the many games bundled in Action 52, an unlicensed multicart video game compilation developed by Active Enterprises.

name: Dawnfolk
summary: Minimalist and relaxing survival builder perfect for short gaming sessions. Rebuild and manage your realm, collect resources and decide the fate of your people. Explore the darkness and unveil the secrets of the black monoliths to bring back light to the world.

name: Dash & Swing
summary: A fast-paced action platformer, use your acrobatic skills to navigate through challenging levels. Swing and dash through a variety of obstacles to reach the end of each stage. With intuitive controls and thrilling gameplay, Dash & Swing offers an exciting experience for players who love platformers.

name: Dark Desire Mute 4
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Darts
summary: Port of Smart Dart from the Sport Vii.

name: Dangan
summary:
Dangan is a action multiscroll game that is set in a near future and puts the player in control of 2 counter-terrorist agents (Jack & Kate) that will have to defeat different enemies during 8 different operations.

The game features a top down view and different weapons to choose and use.

name: Dark Quest 3
summary: A rogue-lite tabletop that mixes card based exploration with turn based combat. Create your party, draw adventure cards, roll dice and fight monsters to defeat the sorcerer and his magic.

name: Dart
summary: A basic darts game for consoles with VT3xx chip.

name: Dancing
summary: Port of Fever Move from the Sport Vii.

name: Day Of Dead
summary: 'Day Of Dead' is a casual game with the theme of terror. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.

name: Daydream: Prologue
summary: Little Griffin is trapped in an ominous new world with his only friend, Birly the teddy bear. Solve clever puzzles and encounter terrifying creatures as the pair embark on a journey to discover what lurks beyond their nightmares.

name: Dance Party
summary: A Snake-like game where the player controls a girl, and must group together people on the dance floor to form a line behind her.

name: Dancing Challenge
summary: The Dance Dance Resolution clone seen on the DDR consoles. The game steals countless actual songs from well-known artists (not cover versions), with their music videos playing in the background. It is divided into two modes: "MTV Mode" (featuring more general music, and using the MTV logo), and "Cartoon Mode" (which seems to solely feature Hatsune Miku songs). ["DDR" hardware only]

name: Dark Seed
summary: Dark Seed (黑暗之蛊) is an unlicensed port of the DOS and Amiga game of the same name, made by Mars Production and published by Yancheng around 2001 or 2002.

name: Daemonium
summary: Daemonium is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Demonic possessions are running rampant. Grab your equipment and your team and get to work locating and removing the source of the demonic presence. Enter the portal to the demons home and stop the possession once and for all.

name: Danger is Near
summary: Danger is Near - sessional hardcore multiplayer shooter that includes several genres: FPS, survival, weapon and combat simulator, RPG with MMO phenomena. The game will immerse you in a realistic gaming environment imbued with a gloomy post-apocalyptic atmosphere...

name: Dating Izzie
summary: Dating Izzie is a charming adult-only puzzle game that follows the story of Izzie, an intelligent and curious woman with a love for all things geeky.

name: Danger in Body
summary: With vivid and exciting graphics, a pulsating soundtrack, and addictive gameplay, "Danger in Body" is a game that will keep you entertained and hooked for hours on end. You are the last hope of the human body - so get ready to fight for your right to live!

name: Damn Zombies
summary: First-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic overrun by flesh-hungry zombies. Roam a city devastated by a mysterious virus

name: Dangle Dash
summary: Deke, chip, and toe drag through a fun hockey experience like no other. By using one touch controls, this is a new fun way to play hockey on mobile. Swipe-up to chip the puck in the air, swipe-down to perform a toe drag, and tap the screen three times quickly to go on fire, which adds a temporary multiplier.

name: Darkblade Ascent
summary: Darkblade Ascent is a fast paced First-Person Melee Roguelike RPG with randomly generated weapons and upgrades, unlockable new classes and persistent leveling. Hack and slash your way through atmospheric dark fantasy locations, unique monsters and bosses.

name: Danger Darrel: Airplane Rush
summary:
"Danger Darrel" is here and needs your help to test his new airplanes in this fun 3D arcade action adventure game! He loves the thrill and pushing his beloved planes to their limits, flying through the narrowest paths and fulfilling his desire for adrenaline in a race against dropping fuel levels in a challenging canyon environment.
Fly as far as possible in the hostile and ever-changing endless canyon valley, confronted with dangerous obstacles you might not expect. Make sure to collect various items and that you do not run out of fuel as you manoeuvre through the valley and avoid scratches on you wings! Do you have what it takes to race to the top and become the master?
Your goal? Get as far as possible with the individual planes to become the master on the global leaderboards where you will race against your friends and compete against pilots, racers and aviation masterminds worldwide!

name: Date with Foxgirl
summary: Have you ever wondered why you don't have a girlfriend? Or have you ever wondered if you will ever find a girlfriend? Sometimes it doesn't take much to meet a beautiful foxy girl... Just go to a cafe for coffee in time, and have a little perseverance and desire...

name: Dark Desire Mute 5
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Dance Dance Revolution
summary: A Tiny Arcade port of Dance Dance Revolution.

name: Daymare Stray
summary: Help Daymare Folk find the stray. Who is the stray? Well, see for yourself.

name: Daedalus Versus Minotaur
summary: An asymmetric multiplayer maze game of fast-paced building and solving!

name: Damn Daniel
summary: See how far you can run while helping Daniel get different pairs of vans!

name: Dawn of Tank
summary: Dawn of Tank is an action-strategy game made in Greenfoot.

name: Dangeresque: The Roomisode Triungulate
summary: Join Dangeresque, the world's greatest private eye/crooked cop, as he puzzles his way through 3 bite-sized roomisodes in this classic-style point n' click adventure.

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion
summary:
From Marvelous First Studio comes an action-packed new entry in the Daemon X Machina series. Fly into battle in your customized Arsenal, unleashing a variety of attacks tailored to your playstyle. Feel the exhilaration of fast-paced combat as you freely explore a deadly and dangerous open world on land or in the air. After taking down your foes, collect their weapons and equipment, and upgrade your skills to expand your options on the battlefield. Suit up for a dark sci-fi story where you can face the titanic boss battles alone or with up to two other players online. New and veteran Daemon X Machina players alike will find a worthy adventure here.

Created and produced by Kenichiro Tsukuda and featuring stunning mechanical designs from Shoji Kawamori, Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion takes the franchise in a dramatic new direction.

Humanity’s fight for liberation begins now!

name: Dark and Light
summary:
Dark and Light was a pay to play fantasy MMORPG developed in Reunion Island by NPCube and published by Farlan Entertainment. It was released on June 6, 2006, to largely negative reviews. Though there was never an official announcement regarding discontinuation of service, the servers have been offline since 2008, ostensibly due to a lawsuit by VWORLD, LLC.

Snail Games acquired the rights to Dark and Light in 2008 and developed a "fantasy survival sandbox RPG", which was released as early access in 2017 with the same name.

name: Darkland 3
summary: DARKLAND is a fun retro-style platform game! Our protagonist, the shadow hero, must cross the valley to find the key to open the portal. There are dangers along the way, pay attention to the traps on the head and the spikes under the feet. Step on the enemy and destroy them, being careful not to fall off the cliff. The game has 50 levels. Wish you have a good time!

name: Days of Doom
summary: Gather your heroes and fight to make it to Sanctuary in this tactical RPG roguelite. Did we mention the zombies, raiders, and mysterious monstrosities that inhabit this post-apocalyptic wasteland? Welcome to the world of Days of Doom.

name: Dark Hours
summary: Dark Hours is a co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your heist has been disrupted by a supernatural event, and your team of robbers is now trapped with an evil entity. Forget your plan, your mission is to survive. Explore and cooperate to find a way out or hide and pray for daylight.

name: Dark Tales: Mirror and Mad Princess
summary: A dark mobile RPG based on classic fairy tales.

name: DaiPyooon
summary:
Daikon radish jumps.
Avoid obstacles and aim for the high score.
A new action game with simple controls.

name: Dark Deity II
summary: Verroa is a peaceful continent on the brink of war as the Asverellian Empire seeks to expand - at your homeland’s expense. Command unlikely heroes, fight challenging turn-based battles, and watch hardship forge iron into steel. Dark Deity is back, bigger and better than before!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade Edition
summary: This DLC adds Arcade Mode, new playable character Meteor Temujin, and more!

name: Damn Daniel: Basket Game
summary: Damn Daniel! Back at it again with the white vans. See how many points can Daniel do playing basket with his white vans.

name: Darksword: Battle Eternity
summary:
Darksword is an exciting, original non-stop VR action RPG. Venture deep into the world of the Twisted Corridors and defeat your enemies in style. Develop your own style of combat, exploit enemy weakness, and collect materials to get more powerful weapons!

Play the story mode and compete globally through the leaderboard system! Show off your skills, build teamwork, and get even more rewards in the multiplayer Co-Op mode!

name: DanSparkling
summary: Music/Rhythm/Dance game play with just one PC camera. Of course, you can also use your phone camera.

name: Dance Dance Revolution A3
summary: Dance Dance Revolution A3 (pronounced Ace Three) is the 18th installment of the Dance Dance Revolution arcade series in Japan, and the sequel to Dance Dance Revolution A20 Plus. The game was released as an update on golden cabinets in Japan on March 17, 2022, including those imported in the United States. An upgrade for older cabinets was released in Asia (including Japan, South Korea, and several other countries), Australasia, and the United States on June 22, 2022, with a larger U.S. rollout on August 19th, 2023.

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files 2 - The Riverside Slasher
David Slade Mysteries: Case Files - Definitive Edition
summary: Take to the dark and violent streets of downtown Riverside, where you investigate gruesome and violent homicides using a range of Forensic tools and your wits! Inspired by the classic Police Quest adventure series, reborn & reimagined for VR.

name: Damned 2
summary: Damned 2 is a asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where a group of survivors must come together to solve puzzles and escape an immersive environment while another player takes the role of a unbeatable monster ready to slay all trespassers.

name: Dan Factory
summary: You are reincarnated into a valley full of spiritual energy, using the Eight Trigrams Formation to complete the automated production of elixirs, and exploring the past stories of this continent in the world of monsters and monsters;

name: Daedalus: You Have Been Chosen
summary: Go on a scary adventure, whether you decide to face the dangerous path alone or team up with your friends. This intense game guarantees a mysterious experience every time you play. Get ready to solve tricky puzzles, avoid a terrifying monster, and fight your way out of the intricate maze.

name: Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari '95
summary: A revision of Bayoeen Wars that features balance and aesthetic changes while also restricting the manner in which the player can select opponents.

name: Dawn of Man + Planetbase
summary:
Planetbase:
Guide a group of space settlers trying to establish a base on a remote planet.

Dawn of Man:
Command a settlement of ancient humans, guide them through the ages in their struggle for survival.

name: Danger Drop
summary: Defy gravity, conquer challenges, and reach new heights in this thrilling platformer. Do you have what it takes? Can you overcome the trials, avoid deadly falls, and prove your platforming prowess?

name: Danganronpa: Checkmate
summary: Fangame made for the one month Fanganronpa challenge.

name: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai
summary: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai is an Action RPG set in the Sengoku era of Japanese history. War is raging as Oda Nobunaga is determined to depose the weak shogun on his throne, engulfing the kingdom in flames and it is your fate to craft your legacy.

name: Daddy Moto Racing
summary:
Dare to drive through the traffic in Daddy Racing Moto
Drive the fast motorbikes between the traffic, collect coins, obtain the highest speed with the nitro and make the highest scores in the exciting Daddy Moto Racing game.

name: Dark Past Darker Future
summary: Step into the grim and dystopian world of "Dark Past Darker Future," an intense single-player arena shooter that will push your skills to the limit. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled FPS experience.

name: Days End
summary: Horror First-Person Short Shooting Game

name: DarkBase 01
summary: You are all alone in this dark and foreboding military installation. Trapped and surrounded by hundreds of disturbing creatures that are all too eager to kill you, you must find a way to cancel the quarantine lockdown and escape this hellish place.

name: Daredevil Rider
summary:
Only the most daring drivers (or the craziest) are able to pull of these amazing stunts. They need to be one tough cookie in order to get behind the while of a motorcycle and launch themselves off a ramp without any safety net. In DareDevil Rider you can attempt these awesome stunts from your mobile device…without risking your life or a lot of serious injuries.
In DareDevil Rider YOU are the ultimate acrobatic stuntman! Test your skills and overcome intense obstacles to pull off the stunts. You’ll be expected to jump through rings of fire and over obstacles like trucks, cars, airplanes, helicopters...and few other surprising objects. Your goal is to land on the braking ramp that marks the end of the level.

name: Dark Table CCG
summary:
Dark Table CCG is multiplayer card gaming re-imagined: Free-to-play, online 4-player, cheaper and easier deck-building, more customization that matters, and a focus on social atmosphere and building friendships. We listened to everything card gamers desperately want, that AAA is not providing, and built it into an experience that will be unparalleled.

Set in a grim Lovecraftian theme, Dark Table brings a unique strategic experience with up to 4 players battling in a free-for-all, using temporary alliances and mutual interest to get ahead. Select your leader and build your deck around it to survive the onslaught and claim your world.

name: Days in Hill
summary: A role-playing game,you need to survive in barren hills.Collect, grow, hunt.

name: Dancing Lights
summary:
Dancing Lights is an abstract, minimalistic puzzle game.
The stated goal is to illuminate all of the lights, but getting there is another story—putting your observational and cognitive skills to the test.

name: Dash.io
summary: Are you the Survivor that everyone needs? Or the hero that everyone wants? Shoot your way through Legend of Heroes, a roguelike action RPG game beyond your wildest dreams! Equip mega powerful crossbows, hunt enemies with your greatsword, max out your stats and shoot monsters in this thrilling, high-octane soul style action RPG game!

name: Days Bygone: Castle Defense
summary: Join the Defender in this endless Castle Defense with endless hours of non-stop action! Grow your castle against the endless waves, clashing against mobs, Titans and bosses in infinite stages and a competitive leaderboard.

name: Darkest AFK
summary: Welcome to Darkest AFK, a colorful RPG offline game with an amazing turn-based strategy adventure. With lots of mobile levels in fantasy IDLE games, this game will keep you entertained for hours. Summon a team of heroes and champions and embark on a journey among monsters and enemies in free offline games. In the RAID, you will encounter dangerous gnomes, unfriendly orcs, bands of pirates, raise elves, bloody vampires, and fiery demons! Hundreds of legendary monsters, a huge map, survival, interesting quests, and much more await you in our free RPG adventure games offline. Combat in the PvP arena with multiplayer and powerful brawls. Explore all the edges of the dungeon where you will encounter PvE role-playing offline games.

name: Daughter of a Scoundrel
summary:
In this free Otome visual novel, you play as Danielle Scarletta (Name Changeable), living a relatively comfortable life until the loss of your parents.

After moving in with your grandfather, your life takes another turn - ending up with a man trying to kill you after just discovering your name.

Now staying in a mansion with six strange and dangerous men, who will you trust to be your bodyguard? Will you uncover the real reason behind your parents’ death, make new friends, and potentially a lover along the way? Or will poking your nose in places it doesn’t belong just make you end up like the rest…?

name: Days End: Becoming Blackbird
summary: Becoming Blackbird is a story about how the player joined the blackbirds when has no where else to go to.

name: Dark Universe
summary:
5 maps for GZdoom/Doom2.

Small to Medium sized maps. Maps can be completed rather quickly (just find the switch that opens the exit and then find the exit), with lots of secrets, switches, scripted events, and hidden areas full of the stuff you might need to survive the next map. HMP and UV difficulties available.

No jumping/crouching. Mouse-look encouraged.

name: Daycare Descent
summary: Daycare Descent is a co-op shooter inspired by Left 4 Dead. Take control of our four trepid adventurers as they battle toys throughout the daycare in search of snacks. Tighten your diapers, grab your pacifiers, and fill up your water guns. Playtime's just begun!

name: Dawn Destiny's Child
summary: Dawn Destiny's Child is an RPG turn based storyline game. Players will play the role of tribal leaders, creating different storylines and endings in their interactions with various NPCs. Ultimately, players will learn the truth about gods and humans under the Tree of Life.

name: Date Z
summary: "Date Z" - a captivating mix of high school drama, romance, and mystery. As a transfer student, your challenge is to navigate relationships and secure a date by Friday to survive a deadly virus outbreak. Unravel the hidden secrets. Every choice you make counts.

name: Danny Phantom: Ghost Frenzy
summary:
Help Danny Phantom stop Vlad Plasmius, his arch-enemy, and his evil plan. Halt the ghost invasion with Danny's full Fenton Ghost-Hunting arsenal!

Very similar game mechanics to the developer Wildfire Studio's other game Tumblebugs (2005).

name: Daymare Town
summary: DayMare Town – can you escape the nightmare of the day?

name: Daymare Town 1
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Daymare Town 2
summary: Can you escape the nightmare of a day…again?… In this game we return to the oddities of the daymare town. Meet more characters, solve puzzles, try to get out… if you dare…

name: Daymare Town 2
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Daymare Town 3
summary: Didn’t we just escape from that hellish town in a hot air ballon at the end of DMT2?… Well. It couldn’t be THAT easy, don’t you agree? So as we return to the daymare, one question arises: what the hell happened???

name: Daymare Town 3
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Daymare Town 4
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Daymare Cat: 10-year Anniversary
summary:
Daymare Cat is a gorgeously sketched exploratory platformer that feels like a simple adventure game.

Things that are new in this Anniversary Edition:

– The game is in glorious 60 fps and plays in full screen.
– Most noticeably the game has new background texture. This might be a bit controversial take, but in my opinion this improves the vibe.
– Interactive items have a color. Yes. A color.
– Cat now runs like a ballerina, not a raptor. Thank god.
– Platforming is a bit easier thanks to hitbox tweaking but also by redrawing platforms in few places, for reference check the main gate.
– I added a new pathway for you in case you have a fear of being eaten alive by a cosmic horror monster and really don’t want to do this part. So now you can go around it.
– No changes were done to the music, since it’s already perfection.

name: Daymare Invaders
summary: If you’re biting your nails waiting for Daymare Town 4, you can spend some time defending the town from invaders. Invaders from…. umm… from the mistfog. Or fogmist. Fogmist sounds better. So, the fogmist invaders are attacking daymare town and you have to protect it. Go!

name: Daymare Kite
summary: Avoid the birds for as long as possible

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Black Cat
summary: Go on an adventure with Inspector Dupin! Monsieur Mark Davies has reported his wife, Sara, missing and now it’s up to you to track her down and solve the mystery! Follow a mysterious black cat, who seems to be purposely helping you, and discover helpful clues in Dark Tales: Edgar Allen Poe’s The Black Cat. Use your Hidden Object talents to tackle the case, and discover the evil culprit behind Sara’s disappearance.

name: Dash For Your Life
summary: Dash For Your Life is a clever mix of the platformer and horror genres. Your multitasking skills will be brutally tested as you attempt to jump through levels while avoiding startling jump scares from the monsters chasing you.

name: DanDan
summary: It's simple, but it needs some ingenuity! ? An action game where bullets keep bouncing! If you attack to defeat an enemy, the bullets you fire will continue to bounce off, so you will continue to avoid your own attacks. Proceed through the stages by adjusting the timing and position of your attacks.

name: Dark Life Excalibur
summary: Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human who is linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur.

name: Danger Close VR
summary: A VR Mil-Sim by Rockedge Studios

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 5
summary: Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.

name: Dante's Cowboy
summary: A Neo-Western town is simmering with conflict: mysterious forces fight for power, and you're the lynchpin that can save or destroy it. With a novel dynamic text system, you can say and do anything to the NPCs, then they generate personalized actions and speech in response.

name: Dark Watcher
summary: Embark on a pixelated journey of exploration, platforming, and intense battles in Dark Watcher. Unveil the secrets of a dark realm, unlock abilities, and confront formidable adversaries.

name: Dance Dash
summary: Dance Dash is a thrilling VR rhythm game where you move your full body to the beat and become one with your avatar. Bring the arcade home and feel the music as you nail sick combos with independently tracked feet movements.

name: Dark Bunny
summary: You are the Dark Bunny. You want carrots. You kill farm animals to get carrots. That's it. That's the game. In this roguelite, topdown arena, semi autobattler you will use various skills and items to create unique, powerful builds to defeat all the mega evil farm animals. And get all the carrots!

name: Dark Data: Zero
summary: A toxic catalyst has spread throughout Lower-Detroit, plunging the metropolis into a mutant infested nightmare. Can you uncover the origin of this heinous act? Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.

name: Dare to Desire: Season 1
summary: A young man working a dead-end job decides he wants something greater out of life. He quickly finds himself chasing toward bigger and better things, through amazing discoveries and terrible heartbreak. Follow his journey to try and become rich, loved, respected and magnetic to women everywhere!

name: Dashgunner 0
summary: Dashgunner is a single player FPS with stylized graphics and high mobility fast-paced gameplay. Player can grapple, slide, dash and traverse freely across various levels while engage in high-speed combat.

name: Dart Racer
summary: Dart Racer is an immersive VR arcade racing game set in a futuristic galaxy obsessed with speed. Master the intuitive controls, fine-tune your dart, and compete in thrilling races across a variety of strange environments.

name: Da Paper Boy
summary: Get locked and loaded as 3 Teens run through the town delivering mail in a whole new modern way! As you generate points on the leaderboard while dodging OG granny and the neighborhood watch. Only one question remains... Are you the best paper boy or paper girl? Let your score tell it all!

name: Daybreakers
summary: On that day, you finished your work and returned to your apartment as usual, but unexpectedly, you involved in a large-scale conspiracy. Horrifying explosions, mysterious virus, and encounters with unfamiliar beautiful girls one after another...

name: Dawn of the Damned
summary: Anxious to attend your job interview at Aurora Antiques, you arrive to discover a room full of melancholy mannequins. One, in particular, captures your interest, drawing you closer.

name: Dawn of Marionette
summary: An android suddenly comes to the player who was leading an ordinary life. A thrilling life with battles and adult activities.

name: Dair
summary: A platform fighting game with only one attack, this sequel to Nair focuses on edgeguarding and off-stage play.

name: Daba: Land of Water Scar
summary: Daba: Land of Water Scar is a new title from Dark Star. It tells the story of a humanoid clay puppet. When the world is on the verge of collapse, the puppet traces the whereabouts of the water fragments within the ancient city, and throughout their journey of defeating enemies and seeking answers, unravels the story of the world and oneself. The game features various landscapes including abandoned ruins, a magnificent ancient city, gloomy prison, vast rift valley, expansive snowfield, deadly forest, and a floating city. Non-linear levels are interconnected, distinct, and intricate.

name: Data.Expand
summary:
A procedural player-controller multimedia sculpture driven by fast-paced arcade gameplay.

Survive as long as you can while avoiding enemies. As you do, your hits will generate glitch-like visual and enticing sounds.

name: Dark Eyed Angels
summary: Dark Eyed Angels is a story based survival horror game. A darker vision of the Grey Alien phenomenon. You play as Casey, when sightings are reported to occur around a strange weather phenomena and now it's on track to his home. He decides to stay and meet THEM

name: Dark Desire Mute 6
summary: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Darker Skies: Remastered for PC
summary: Darker Skies comes fully remastered to PC. Incorporating new graphical features and gameplay enhancements for the definitive way to play Darker Skies. Survival Horror set after the War of the Worlds.

name: DawnOfCombat
summary: "DawnOfCombat" is an indie game I'm developing, due on Steam this year. Players navigate a vast universe, battling foes, modifying spaceships, and strategically upgrading with collected coins. Decisions shape each fresh challenge. The game beckons thrill-seekers towards cosmic glory and victory.

name: Dark Tartarus
summary:
Dark Tartarus is a Doom II megawad designed for ZDoom-based ports, created by lihanchi. It is a set of very challenging maps, many veering into slaughter map territory on higher difficulties, often with novel, eclectic concepts and themes that set it apart from many other challenging wads.

Development for Dark Tartarus began in late 2012, with the first version of the mod, containing 32 maps, released on December of that year. This was followed in January by a patch, tartarus-sns, which added minor tweaks and fixed some compatibility issues with the software renderer, and later by version 2 which included significant map overhauls. Version 3, besides having even more changes to the original 32 maps, saw the addition of a new episode called Dark Tartarus: Dead Tonight. While the lineup of original maps remained unchanged over the next two updates, Version 4 and 5, the set of maps for Dead Tonight changed between each version, with the latest, Version 5, released in April 2015, having a total of 43 maps.

name: Darkest Room
summary: Boom compatible (cl9) single level for Doom 2. Tech-bases installed into black, gray and green caverns. This map is designed to be difficult (harder then my previous maps). I suggest to start on HMP and, eventually, give UV a try when you know well the map.

name: Dark Tide
summary: A sprawling coastal castle swarming with Hellspawn

name: Dark Galaxy
summary: Dark Galaxy is an action based rogue-like top-down shooter. You pilot a space drone to oppose the insectoid like species called Minaripods and get stronger by travelling to different star systems. Can you free our galaxy from the invaders?

name: Day_000
summary: Today might suck, because you and your childhood friend, are the only things standing between humanity and it's extinction. Choose your Hero, Bonnie or Klyde, and experience the same story, but from two completely different perspectives, in this Third Person Action Adventure Game

name: Damn Little Town
summary: Damn Little Town is a tactical board game for 1-4 players. The game is divided into two phases.

name: Darkness Road
summary:
Darkness Road is an immersive survival horror and psychological horror game that will plunge players into a chilling and nightmarish experience. Set in the year 1996, within the foreboding town of Dar Al Hai located in the Arabian Gulf, this game offers a unique blend of suspenseful gameplay and captivating storytelling.

Playing from a third-person perspective, you assume the role of Hamdan, an ordinary 34-year-old resident of Dar Al Hai. Suddenly and inexplicably abducted, Hamdan finds himself trapped within a cursed place. With every ounce of his being, he strives to escape the clutches of this malevolent force, only to discover that his efforts seem to lead him deeper into the darkness.

name: Darkness Flaw
summary: This map was created to test my skills in vanilla mapping. I liked how results turned out and decided to submit it here. Map is short and quick and it shouldn't take too long to finish.

name: Daemon X Machina: The Witcher Costume Pack
summary: Gearlt And Ciri from the Witcher series arrive in Daemon X Machina as outfits

name: Dawn of the Dead
summary: Dawn of the Dead is an episode replacement for Doom created by Jan Van der Veken in June 1997, and was the first PWAD released by the author. It replaces the first episode, though E1M5 is considered by many to be missing, with the slot occupied by a map with one tiny room containing no monsters.

name: Dangerous Ivan
summary:
Action-arcade with adventures, zombie, vodka, bear and other cool stuff. Join, comrade!
Be fast and smart - defeat your enemies in two dangerous game modes.

name: Dark and Forgotten
summary: This is a simple, fast WAD with a little higher difficulty than usual, but it shouldn't be too punishing. The environment focuses on darkness, dark tech-bases and a lot of acid.

name: Day Off Simulator
summary: Unwind and have a blast in the "Day Off Simulator"! Give your boss a slap, relax with interactive musical instruments, and enjoy various leisure activities. A unique blend of excitement, relaxation, and creativity awaits you!

name: Daughter of Crone
summary: Take the role of a young witch named Eyfrid and master the ways of magic. Learn to cast spells, brew magical potions, and explore the mystical kingdom of Ervein. It is up to you to shape the destiny of Eyfrid, the Daughter of Crone.

name: Day 11
summary: The 11th link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is extremely anomalous and is known to cause psychosis and paranoia among the staff who play it or otherwise come in contact with it. They are typically then reported either missing or dead. There is no known way to handle this game safely.

name: Dark Astral
summary: Dark Astral is a 2D action-adventure platform game with fast-paced combat, world exploration, multiple levels, and addictive gameplay set in an underworld filled with demons and all sorts of creatures.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Legends Pack
summary: Featuring two exclusive in-game timeless Dakar vehicles to make you return to the old days: Jan De Roy's DAF 95 X1 TurboTwin and Ari Vatanen's Peugeot 405 Turbo 16 raced to history in 1988 and now both vehicles can be yours.

name: DanMachi Battle Chronicle
summary:
Experience the world of Danmachi in 3D with fully voiced dialogue! Relive the story of Danmachi in 3D together with your favorite characters brought to life via anime-style 3D graphics! You can also enjoy game-exclusive movies and scenes drawn at totally different angles from the anime!

Monsters await you in the Dungeon where you can make use of a variety of methods of attacking and evading in exhilarating battles with simple controls!
Perform your favorite deadly attacks, including Firebolt and Lil Rafaga, in spectacular fashion. Go adventuring with your favorite characters!

Take on other adventurers in Magic Stone Contests, free-for-all battles where everyone is an enemy! These are battle royales fought between 8 different players.
Gather more Magic Stones than anyone else to become number 1!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade + Character DLC Pack
summary: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Full Game plus Arcade + Character DLC Pack Bundle
summary: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Dalton: The Awesome!
summary: Do you love run n' jump games or do you hate them? Whatever the case, Dalton - The Awesome is made for you! Be sure that you think twice before clicking buy this game cuz it's insanely addictive!!!

name: Dance Trips
summary: Collaboration between Otomate and voice actor Kenjiro Tsuda. Otomate's first mobile game centering on a dance group.

name: Dataminers
summary: Dataminers is a fast turn-based roguelike where you climb and clear highly secured towers full of data. Outsmart guards and hack terminals in this unique combination of strategy, stealth and Minesweeper.

name: Dark Year
summary: Dark Year medieval fantasy game with a dark air, embark on this adventure as Marius, a commander of the army of the northern kingdom, who must return to the castle his journey will be full of enemies and an evil that never sleeps awaits him... You will be able to face them.

name: Daikon Creatures
summary: Fight against endless hordes of creatures in this survival roguelite in vast unexplored lands where you will find treasures, secrets and many challenges, but with great rewards.

name: Day of the Toys
summary:
80s horror movie mod. Find your son and escape a murderous toy holocaust.

The toys are relentless. Blast ’em, maim ’em, and set ’em ablaze!

name: Darkless
summary: Nameless embodies a mischievous ghost who after a terrible curse has been placed on him, locking him in a lamp. It will be your purpose to recover your ghostly body by traveling through all the corners of the Silent Mansion in a platform and puzzle game.

name: Dagger Directive
summary: Dagger Directive is a tactical FPS that allows you to approach each mission in your own way. Select equipment, decide the time of day, then move methodically to complete your mission. Enjoy the modern mechanics and old school graphics as you fight across a variety of missions and environments.

name: DanceDouDoou
summary: DanceDouDoou is a rhythm /Beat/Dance Simulation Game where you,and your fellow animals can practice dance move By Mouse Click and Drag.Players will witness how goofy Fellows can move theire body,and Smashing variaty of Items to make Noises. Just Dance around on Stage and,Have Fun!

name: Day 10,909
summary: One day, a light falls from the sky! For 10909 days, everything in your life seemed completely normal, until suspicion suddenly arose. You decide to escape the set and journey to Fiji to find your first love, who said that everything is a show.

name: Dark Auction
summary: The game is a mystery adventure centering on the idea of a historical figure having surreptitiously bequeathed a fictitious estate, following the drama that plays out among the characters faced with an enigma extending all the way into their modern world.

name: Daisy Grotto
summary: Daisy Grotto is a cozy, retro. and clever 2D role-playing adventure. Explore a magical world - Meet interesting characters, collect fun items, and fight fierce monsters in interactive turn-based combat! Develop your party and leverage their unique abilities to uncover the secrets of the Daisy Grotto.

name: Dark Lovers: Extended Edition
summary: Dark Lovers is a short pixel art teenage romantic mistery visual novel game about a highschool prom night in 1979 which contains multiple endings and secrets.

name: Dave's Fun Algebra Class: Remastered
summary: Return to Dave's school in this brand new version of Dave's Fun Algebra Class! Solve math problems, meet Dave's friends, and uncover the secrets of Dave's school.

name: Dashbounce
summary: Dashbounce is a 2D Speedrunning Puzzle-Platformer about going fast and intentionally abusing physics quirks! Seek the goal in each level before the clock hits zero - but watch out, you can't jump! You'll have to use your surprising speed and bouncy body to turn every object and obstacle into an advantage!

name: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs
summary: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs is an online multiplayer snake and ladder game with superpowers and lots of mischief! Change the course of the game with various skill cards. Push your enemy to their demise. Really, don't be nice while playing this game.

name: Date One Direction
summary: Do you love One Direction? Have you ever dreamed of dating them? Well now you can! Start charming your favourite One Direction star today!

name: Dadlympics
summary: Engage in physics-based fun! Conquer hilarious dad-worthy challenges with friends in the DADLYMPICS. Are you ready to claim the title of ultimate dad?

name: Dark Theme Bundle
summary: Face your fears with this spooky bundle!

name: Dark Age
summary: Dark Age is a futuristic 3D action game with refined low poly design. Enjoy this frenetic Beat 'em up.

name: Das Geheimnis von Lakeshore
summary: A 2D Point and Click Adventure in Pixel Art

name: Dark Pages
summary: Descend into the depths of the Blocker Library, a place where darkness and terror intertwine. Solve puzzles, confront unique and horrifying monsters, and uncover the chilling story of this establishment. Will you find a way out, or will you become another dark page in this twisted tale of horror?

name: Daymaker: Release From Doomsday
summary: Daymaker: Release from Doomsday places you in the shoes of Daymaker, a fictional, friendly AI created by Nintendo during the development of Super Mario Bros. 3 to aid in level creation endeavors. After a routine day of aiding the development team, Daymaker takes a trip through the electrical cords to the residence of a close friend- and finds that her life is in great danger.

name: Dawn of the Wizards
summary: Dawn of the Wizards is a grid based dungeon crawler RPG. The game that puts its focus on live melee combat. Fighting monsters in a dungeon, solving puzzles and exploring the world and events that led to the dawn of the wizards and the downfall of all who opposed them.

name: Dash x Survivors
summary: Defeat endless hordes of demonic robots in this hack n slash action roguelike. Use 100+ unique upgrades to create your own game-breaking build and claim victory.

name: Daris Venture
summary: Daris Venture is a half-Saturn/Advance-style fan-made game that will tell you an alternate history of Mobius that ended not in the best way for the Robotnik Empire.

name: Dark Odyssey
summary: Dark Odyssey, an epic online rpg game that features idle playing, dungeon challenges, boss fights, character enhancing and customizations. Get ready to embark on a dark and thrilling journey, increase your power, team up with other players and save the world!

name: Dagon: The Railway Horror
summary:
Have you ever wondered what the master of weird fiction and cosmic horror might have dreamt about?

Now you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in one of H. P. Lovecraft’s nightmares, which he described in 1927 in a letter to Donald Wandrei - a co-founder of the famous Arkham House publishing house.

So validate your ticket and find a comfortable seat - the motorman will be arriving shortly.

name: Dance Of Death
summary: Polygonal top-down beat'em up game for Net Yaroze.

name: Dark Killing
summary: We venture into forbidden lands in pursuit of wealth, plundering the treasures of tomb, defeating evil creatures, and even eliminating fellow adventurers who dare to enter this place, looting them entirely. Then, before darkness completely engulfs us, we seek hidden portals to escape,

name: Dark Conflict
summary: Welcome to "Dark Conflict"! This is a game full of strategy and war elements, allowing you to play as a leader, constructing buildings, assembling armies, and developing resources to compete for the glory of victory.

name: Days of Haze
summary: Days of Haze is a puzzle filled climate simulated action RPG where your actions affect the weather and temperature. Coated in the exakt NES palette. it's insides reveal a deep survival lite action RPG

name: Dawnshard
summary:
Dawnshard is a multiplayer fantasy card game for pc and mobile devices. Focused on eSport and competition.

Dawnshard is the first digital card game that integrates procedural generation in deck building, with the intention of removing the meta-game.

Playing Dawnshard feels like exploring a Jungle. In the Jungle, you have the tools you have.

You can’t just look up what the best strategies are. You'll have to adapt during each game to your opponent's strategies!

name: Dancing Sword
summary: Fast-paced game for Sharp X68000.

name: Dancing Block
summary: Unlicensed game for the Famicom.

name: Databugs
summary: Net Yaroze game.

name: Dark Zone
