summary: Immerse in an infected world. As a soldier, seek the truth of a zombie epidemic. Explore dark landscapes, uncover secrets, and fight for survival. Unravel the origin before it's too late. Ready to face the truth?

name: Darts Wii DX
summary: Enjoy authentic darts with Darts Wii DX. Grasp the Wii remote by holding the darts arrow and swing the Wii remote toward the screen. You can experience a realistic darts game like throwing darts. The game has five modes: zero one, cricket, cut throat, count up, and rotation. In addition, there is a free throw mode where you can practice freely. Nintendo Wi-Fi connection allows you to participation and browsing of national ranking.

name: Dark City: Kyiv - Collector's Edition
summary: Gather your courage for a journey into a mysterious world beyond our view in this hidden-object mystery!

name: Daydream Mosaics 4: Shades of Blue
summary: Join the Twin World saga's latest chapter as you dive into the mesmerizing underwater kingdom of the Azure World. Solve nonograms to restore submerged sanctuaries, and explore the tranquil beauty of the deep blue. Enjoy added challenges with hidden object, spot-the-difference, and jigsaw mini-games.

name: Daydreamy
summary: Explore the imaginary worlds of Nela in Daydreamy, the indie first-person narrative adventure that takes you back to those years when everything was possible. Discover how she lost her imagination and let yours soar. Are you ready to embark on a unique adventure?

name: Dactylus
summary:
In Dactylus - a parallax-scrolling fantasy shooter - you slip into the role of Yarin, a dragon-rider. Evil forces destroyed his village and killed his family. Now it's up to you to take revenge.

Awaiting the player are 6-level-parallax scrolling, animated enemies, huge bosses, special weapons (like dragonfire and magical lightning) and multiple-choice conversations.

name: Dark Mountain
summary: A graveyard is being harvested of corpses to create undead warriors. Fight your way into the caverns beneath the mountain to destroy the evil inhabitants.

name: Dark Mountain II
summary: Sequel to "Dark Mountain" (darkmtn.wad). This is a very large level with more detail in many places than the original Heretic engine can handle.

name: Dance Dance Revolution 2nd Mix: Dreamcast Edition
summary: This is the second rendition of the popular dance simulation. You follow the arrows as you step on the appropriate direction along with the beat. With a wide range of difficulty settings, the game is a challenge for veterans while being easy enough to enjoy for beginners. 2nd mix comes back with some new songs and some new remixes of old favorites. Challenge your friends head on or work together. For an added challenge try doing Double which puts you on both dance pads (provided you have two).

name: Dark Deity's Bastion
summary: A replacement for E1M1 of Heretic.

name: Dark Decline
summary: Dark Decline is a horror game about exploring the town you live in to figure out what happened to everyone. Play against unique enemies that will do whatever it takes to stop you.

name: Dance Fest
summary: Dance Fest takes the standard 'bemani' formula - arrows appear rhythmically on screen and the player must hit the corresponding button (on either a dance mat peripheral or the standard controller) in time with these arrows and the music. Points are awarded for accuracy with bonus multipliers awarded for making certain 'combos' (mini-routines within a song which are deemed especially difficult or long). This is a game for one or two players with three difficulty settings, easy, hard and medium. The player selects their difficulty level and their track and then attempts to score points by hitting the correct buttons in sequence. During the song the player is treated to an distant view of an animated disco dancer on a stage and illuminated with coloured lights. Once the track is over the player can enter their name, assuming they have achieved a high score. The game holds eight scores for each of the three difficulty levels but no scores are recorded for Workout and Recorder modes. The game has a workout mode in which the player first enters their weight, in kilograms, and then selects a track. Gameplay here is basically the same as the main game but instead of points the game calculates the number of calories burned. There is no difficulty setting for this game mode and the arrows come thick and fast. The Recorder option allows the player to create and save their own dance, there is no high score for this and while the dance moves are preserved from one game to the next only one routine can be saved. Songs included in this game are: Merry Christmas Everyone: Shakin' Stevens Don't Cha: Pussycat Dolls The Grid: Diablo Movin' On Up: M People Atlantic Ocean: Waterfall Killin' Time: Tina Cousins Push the Button: Sugarbabes Dancin: Aaron Smith feat. Luvli Flowers: Sweet Female Attitude Pink is the Colour: K&M feat. Joy Last Goodbye: Attic feat. Julie Thompson Stomp: Steps U R The Future: Busface Merry Christmas Everybody: Steps

name: Danger Express
summary: Unfinished arcade game blending sprite scaling and digitisation.

name: Daito Giken Koushiki Pachi-Slot Simulator: Ossu! Banchou Portable
Daito Giken Koushiki Pachi-Slot Simulator: Ossu! Misao + Maguro Densetsu Portable
Daito Giken Koushiki Pachi-Slot Simulator: Hihouden - Ossu! Banchou: Yoshimune DS
Daredemo Kantan! Watanabe Akira no Tsume Shogi
Daredemo Kantan! Chou Chikun no Tsumego
Dark Mirror
summary: "Dark Mirror" provides a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. The dark and gloomy environments attract players to a deep world of mystery, while the sound design of the game also increases the tension and excitement.

name: Daily Thread: The Sewing of Discontent
summary: Henrietta is a seamstress in early industrial Manchester, enjoying Victorian age manufactory work. Relive your favorite moments from Dickens, Zola, and Marx, learn about the history of working conditions and worker rights and how they got where they are today, and think of where they could still go!

name: Days Of My Life
summary: What is human destiny? Do our actions decide much in our fate? What if I told you that life can be lived in different ways? What if you had asked that girl out on a date and your life would have been different? Well, nothing can be returned…

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Yandere Simulator
summary: Yandere Simulator was the third crossover chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - UK Creators
summary: UK Creators is the 2.5nd chapter of Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Danganronpa: Live or Die
summary: Follow Megumi and 15 other people locked inside a luxurious mansion. An evil mechanical bear known as Monokuma forces them to play a killing game. Will they start killing each other? Who will survive?

name: Dale and Peakot
summary: Play Dale And Peakot, a great action platform / puzzle game. Take two roles as Dale the farmer with a shotgun as well as Peakot his sidekick chicken with an attitude. Use Dale to take out bad guys, but the twist is you control Peakot at the same time to fly around and hit levers and switches. Try to solve your way out of eggy situations, and get back the stolen hens that have been captured by the coyotes.

name: Dateless Love: Love Story Behind the Restoration
summary:
Time slipped during a school trip in Kyoto,
it is a love game at the end of Edo period with handsome guys.

name: Dark American Horror Stories
summary: Discover American horror stories that fuse the unexplained and the sinister in haunting settings, revealing the dark secrets of American society.

name: Day of the Lords
summary: Large ancient castle with custom textures, great details and atmosphere.

name: Dawn of Eternity
summary: Large Metal/gothic lava fortress with a bunch of modified and new monsters, as well as a medium sized, hard secret map. Very high monster count in both maps, compensated by slight changes to some weapons and ammo system.

name: Dawn of Insolence
summary: A top-down roguelike with a deck-building system. Create your own unique deck of weapons, passive items and other upgrades. Each time you level up, you will be given random upgrades from your deck. Unlock new upgrade options to personalize your deck and survive the hordes of enemies.

name: Darkness and Fear: Eerie Shadows
summary: "Darkness and Fear: Eerie Shadows" is an exciting horror game that will make you nervous. The game takes place in a deserted city shrouded in darkness, and immerses you in a nightmarish world filled with creepy shadows and evil spirits.

name: Dash Arena
summary: A tiny arcade game built for crank controls. Crank to aim your movement around the arena. Attack incoming monsters, or dodge them to build up high scoring combos.

name: Daredevil's Descent & Cryogenic Crypt
summary: Two large levels in Medieval/Metal/Wizard/Hipchurch style.

name: DaemonClaw: Origins of Nnar
summary: Defend humanity from a surprise attack by the mystical creatures of the world of Nnar in this high speed arcade/console style action game coming to modern and classic retro platforms.

name: Daikarin
summary:
An episode with 7 new levels and new art replacing the 2nd episode.
Earth Defence Forces leader has been killed just when a strange artifact has been uncovered. Therefore Duke goes to investigate this at the EDF center. In the meantime, experiments on the artifact reveals its ability to teleport in space and time.

name: Dark Place 1
summary: Dark Place is a huge level with plenty of atmosphere, wonderful ambience, detail and puzzles

name: Dark Place 2
summary: This sequel to the first Dark Place is just as large and involved, with not so many enemies

name: Dark Place 3
summary: This third in the series takes place in some icy setting - a healthy mix of light industrial and ski park themes.

name: Dark Place 4
summary:
Dark place 4 takes place in a grey and rocky planet full of lightning, rain and strange
noises

name: Dark Place 5
summary: Dark screens and gloomy corridors.

name: DawnCraft
summary: DawnCraft is an RPG Adventure Modpack for Minecraft created by bstylia14. The modpack uses almost 300 mods to make an amazing new fantasy world for you to explore.

name: Day After Forever
summary: A large city map

name: Dare to Dream
summary: Two small maps, a classic-style base themed intro and a castle themed conclusion. Uses custom music by Angryfrogs, custom skyboxes by Makkon / Sock, and some id1 and mg1 textures.

name: Dashes & Squares
summary: Squares? Ready. Dashes? Ready. Random level generation? Ready. Be prepared to this endless survival game where you need to dash into your enemies and upgrade yourself to survive.

name: Day of Judgment
summary: In Day of Judgement, a dark fantasy management roguelite, lead a guild of heroes, wield enchanted swords, craft elixirs, and safeguard villages from a demon invasion. Your tactical mastery in combat and resource allocation will shape the fate of the realm.

name: Dancing Duelists
summary:
A 3-week game jam by the Mega Crit team to explore the Godot engine due to "recent events". It happens to coincide with Jump Ship Jam: https://itch.io/jam/jump-ship-jam ✨

A deckbuilding autobattler dance off with a BUMPIN' soundtrack

name: Data Garden
summary: A text-less comic-game hybrid about data, interaction and digital identity playable with only one button.

name: Daemon Sigil
summary: Defend your village from an eldritch invasion in this creature collector, turn-based card battler. Train your favourite characters through a Roguelite upgrades system. Assemble a formidable daemon squad and journey to an otherworldly realm to close the last portal!

name: Darkworld
summary: In Darkworld, you’re a snailf living your best life in the shop of a blacksmith. Listen to his clients to learn more about their stories, do your best to clean their weapons and improve your snailf’s business in this cosy video game when even hammers are cute!

name: Dark Covenant
summary: 12-level episode for Doom 2, with new graphics and music. Starts out in a small suburban neighborhood and takes you from demon-infested cityscapes to deep inside the earth, and finally into space...

name: Dark Side: Moonbase Mayhem
summary: Reimagination of space map E2L8 "Dark Side"

name: Daemonus
summary: A large medieval-ish castle set in the middle of the sea

name: DarkLight: Platformer
summary: Welcome to the world of DarkLight: Platformer, where adventure and fun await you at every step. This exciting 2D platformer promises you an unforgettable journey through 150 unique levels and five diverse biomes.

name: Danny's Debt is Eternal
summary: Danny's Debt is Eternal is a short, humorous adult game with fantastical H-scenes and plenty of eye candy. Help him replay the princess, and see how well he is rewarded!

name: DAC 20
summary: Erik Alm's map designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 20

name: Data Center
summary: The UAC's primary data center has been invaded by the monsters of hell in order to steal some intelligence and ultimately wipe out the human race. The center's population has been wiped out and you are the only hope of reclaiming the UAC's secrets from the demons. Find the source of the infestation before the monsters are able to use our secrets against us.

name: Dark and Deep
summary: A conspiracy podcast drags you into a world of mystery and terror. Reveal secrets and horrors with mystical frames given to you by a strange observer. Dark and Deep is a first-person cosmic horror game with a focus on puzzles and exploration.

name: Dance Killer Trick!!!: Boys, Be Dancing
summary: Dance Killer Trick!!!: Boys, Be Dancing is an otome breeding game for mobile.

name: Da Will
summary: A first wad from B0S (Best Of Survivors) clan. The B0S clan has sent you on the task to find out what happened to "Object 33", with which the contact has been lost. It is located in remote district of the Central America so be prepared for a tough way.

name: Dark Fate
summary: Dark Fate is a fast paced single player level for Doom II, inspired by the style of the original Doom's third episode, "Inferno".

name: Dawn of Anarchy
summary: In Dawn of Anarchy, your skills, determination, and combat prowess will be put to the ultimate test. Will you be the hero the world needs to quell the uprising and bring an end to mechanical tyranny? Prepare for the battle of a lifetime amidst the dawn of anarchy.

name: Dark Gem Tower Defense
summary: Atmospheric tower defense. How many waves can you defend? Basic tower defense in a fantasy setting with gems.

name: Dark Age Gladiator
summary: Dark Age Gladiator is a dark fantasy world where you live as a gladiator fighting in the arena for wealth and fame. The opponents are not limited to humans, but also include a variety of monsters.

name: Dangle
summary: Extend your thread and swing around obstacles to reach the floor.

name: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator
summary: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator is an epic 125,000-word interactive fantasy novel by Mike Walter, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: DarkGems
summary: DarkGems is a cartoony mining rogue-lite game set in the deep gemstone caverns. Journey through three randomly generated map kinds filled with zombies, ghosts and demons. Keep an eye on your rapidly ending energy supply - one cannot survive in the dark dungeon without a light.

name: Dawn of Darkness
summary: A fantasy themed total conversion for Quake II, developed around 1999, never officially released but surfaced somewhen in 2016.

name: Darkland 2
summary:
A cosmic cloud has shrouded the land in permanent darkness. Red death rains like blood. Monsters from beyond lurk in the shadows, spawning their evil offspring. Fight them with light and fire, find a sanctuary. Survive this unholy night.

The controls guide the player character, and a flashlight that illuminates the ground ahead. Press fire to use the gun. Gunfire will only strike an illuminated spot, or at close point-black range near the player character. If you let the monsters or their firepower hit the player character you will lose a life. A bonus life is awarded for every 10,000 points.

name: Dahlia: Lasciatemi morire
summary:
A short RPG questioning the meaning of human life in a world crumbling to death.

Dahlia, a girl with aphasia, whistles gloomily as she proceeds down a cold, dark path for a certain purpose.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: The Binding Blade
summary: A fearless fencer, a lost knight. One waits at the crossroads for redemption, the other, adrift in the sprawling wilds of the Kingdom. Master the ruthless Duelist, battle through barricades, and seek clues that will lead you to...the last of the Crusaders. This DLC adds 2 new heroes, The Duelist and The Crusader, with their own unique trinkets, signature items, and fully voiced backstories including playable flashback encounters. It also adds a new roaming mini-boss, The Warlord.

name: Dampf: The Cozy Tower Defense
summary: Cozy tower defense meets stylistic futuristic steampunk. Manage resources, buildings & towers. Unlock perks to further specialize yourself. Plan your defense & survive all enemy waves.

name: Dark Lord
summary: Unleash your power in Dark Lord, a roguelike RPG filled with strategy, adventure, and sardonic wit. Rule your growing realm with an iron fist, fortify the stronghold, and avoid getting stabbed in the back by your advisors!

name: Danny's Descent
summary: Pedal through the looping halls to find Room 237 - Hand tracking VR horror game

name: Dave.exe
summary: Dave.EXE is a third-person low-poly stealth horror game loosely based off of the video game "Dead by Daylight", which the creator has a love-hate relationship with. You play as Dave Microwave, an everyman trying to live his life, until one day being pulled into warfare by the Berrys against Edgy Dave. You'll travel through timelines and collect soda from five machines while avoiding whichever of Edgy Dave's ranks is hunting you that round.

name: Danjigoku
summary: Danjigoku is a retro-styled classic arcade twin-stick shoot 'em up game. Shoot through hordes of aliens and collect 7 different kinds of upgrades to survive as long as possible!

name: Damsels in Distress
summary: Damsels in Distress is an interactive adventure. You will play as a lustful paladin who’d have to choose between sex and duty all the time. All this is accompanied by awesome sex animations and Japanese voice-over.

name: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing
summary: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing is a Sci-Fi immersive-sim and racing hybrid. Race futuristic jet racecraft through tracks across multiple planets. Step out of the cockpit to explore the racing world, find, purchase, tweak and modify new parts and ships.

name: Dark Times
summary: An abstract and somewhat cryptic episode. Only six levels exist now due to being seemingly abandoned.

name: Dating after becoming Vtuber
summary: This is a love simulation game that has Vtuber elements. Players are required to do appropriate poses to serve their fans in live broadcasts.

name: Dark is the Void
summary: Dark is the Void is a combat focused JRPG-inspired roguelike, featuring fast paced, menu-driven battles. Build, customize, and optimize your party of four from a mix of 24 unique classes, spanning a range from Tanks, Healers, DPS, and every hybrid in between.

name: Dark Dive: The Last Tropic
summary: Join the ranks of skilled duppy detective in a Caribbean town where danger lurks at every corner. Catch or fight monsters, build your deck, and uncover the secrets of the town's mysterious mines in this captivating RPG with turn-based combat and gripping story elements.

name: Dark City: London - Collector's Edition
summary:
Collector's Edition of Dark City: Loudon includes:
- Solve a new case in the exciting bonus chapter!
- Collect hidden dominoes and morphing objects as you play.
- Never get lost with the strategy guide!
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games!
- Enjoy exclusive screensavers, concept art, and music!

name: Da Da Daungo
summary:
A combination of Doubt and Bingo!
Use your brain to win!

name: Dance Cube
summary: Arcade rhythm game.

name: Day of Night
summary: Map takes place in nighttime. Duke has to roam through sewers, a subway station and city streets.

name: Dark and Evil
summary: Dark & Evil is an Open World Action RPG game where players take on the role of a young and inexperienced Dark Lord. Fresh from a humbling defeat at the hands of humanity, the Dark Lord is fueled by the burning desire to conquer the human world and reclaim his rightful throne.

name: Dandelion Planet
summary: A heartwarming atmosphere,SF novel adventure game. Let's relax on another planet! You enjoy going to different places, interacting with space people, and trying part-time jobs.

name: Daldzah
summary: Daldzah is an adventure inspired by the Nart Sagas, following the journey of a child and a deceased deity to the top of a mountain. Warm your surroundings, burn obstacles in your path, and help the North Caucasian deities on your way to reunite child with his parents.

name: Dark Inquisition
summary: Dark Inquisition is an action RPG dungeon crawler where you play as Inquisitors, wielding forbidden arts to purge the land of unholy inhabitants. Embark on a perilous journey through procedurally generated dungeons, confronting formidable foes, and uncovering ancient prophecies.

name: Daredevil Dave: Motorcycle Stuntman!
summary:
Play through motorcycle stunt scenarios as Daredevil Dave.
Released for iPhone OS 2.2.1+ in 2010.

name: Darklands
summary: Darklands is a role-playing game divided into chapters, in which you are a Cowboy who invades computer systems, and a young college student looking for answers.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: SnowRunner Cars Pack
summary: SnowRunner Cars join the world of Dakar! Drive five new vehicles in Rally Raid competition or Free-Roam mode and level up your off-road experience.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Hybrid Vehicle Pack
summary: Race across the desert with these future-facing Hybrid Vehicles. Featuring the GCK Motorsport, the Hino 600 Hybrid, and the Riwald Renault C460.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Classics Vehicle Pack #2
summary: Two legendary vehicles from 1982 and 1985 return to Dakar. The vintage Lada Niva 1600 4x4 and the iconic Honda Africa Twin pave their way across the desert.

name: Danger Drone
summary: Return the world to humanity by destroying the evil aliens

name: DarkwebStreamer
summary: You? An occult streamer on an alternate 90s internet. Your goal? Become #1. The problem? The supernatural is REAL. Manage your stream, do weird rituals, make weird friends and experience a different story every time in this procedurally-generated psycho-horror RPG streaming sim.
developers: We Have Always Lived In The Forest

name: Dangerous Coins
summary: Dangerous Coins is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a character who is obsessed with collecting coins.

name: Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock
summary: Damaaz The Barbarian Warlock is a single player fast-paced Beat 'em Up action game with unique, comic style line art. Inspired by Sword and Sorcery, plunge into the dark fantasy world of Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock.

name: Dark Cavern
summary: Dark Cavern is a maze-based shooting game by M Network for the Atari 2600 console. It is a port of the game Night Stalker for the Intellivision.

name: Dai Sengoku Rance
summary: Japanese mod which expands the main story of Sengoku Rance, giving an option to 'continue' onto the main continent after uniting JAPAN.

name: DavBot
summary: Welcome to Paragon City! DAVBOT's Home... or that's what they want you to think. Help DAVBOT Escape and finally set him free, remember the MOP Company won't let you go without a fight. Are you willing to risk everything for freedom?

name: Dawnsbury Days
summary: Lead a group of childhood friends through their first adventures in a turn-based tactical RPG played under the rules of PF2E, the second edition of a powerful OGL ruleset. Customize their builds, acquire loot and level up, and ultimately defeat the sinister enemies who threaten your hometown.

name: Dark Sun
summary: Accompany a wanderer through their dying world while they prepare to sacrifice their life to save it.

name: Dark Laws
summary: Dark Laws is a third-person medieval fantasy extraction looter (PvPvE), where you combat with melee, ranged weapons and spells. Choose one of 9 mercenaries, mount a Dragon alone or with a friend and survive the brutality of enemies on Telos Island.

name: Daymare Town
summary: Daymare Town is a hand-drawn puzzle adventure game. You find yourself in a heart of a strange city populated by peculiar Metamorph creatures. This town is full of nooks and crannies, puzzles, secrets and items to collect to help you along the way. Can you escape the nightmare of a day?

name: Dark Samurai
summary: Dark Samurai is a roguelike horde survival game with permanent progression, a persistent open world, quests, and online co-op, set in feudal Japan overrun by demons.

name: Danger Zone Bomber
summary: Danger Zone Bomber is a survival defense roguelike game where you have to defeat waves of zombies and protect your base. Drop bombs from the plane to kill zombies and protect your base.

name: Dark Forest
summary: You searching for secret treasure.You being confronted by mysterious creatures, guards and gods.The only way to get away is to destroy everything stands against you.A forest in darkness which had been kept secret, protected and laid the in middle of internal conflict. You ready for the adventure?

name: Danger City
summary: Videojuego retro 8-bits

name: Dave the Diver: Dredge
summary: Dave the Diver: Dredge is a DLC that adds content themed around the fishing horror role-playing adventure game Dredge.

name: Dangan GB2
summary: Dangan GB2 is a short simplistic boss-rush, bullet-hell, shoot 'em up released for the Game Boy Color to celebrate the console's 25th anniversary.

name: Dawn of Demons
summary: Become a medieval monk and confront the demon that has haunted the Boar Lake village.

name: Dark Gaze: Curse of the Black Nazar
summary: It is night time at the occult museum. As curator, you have acquired a strange artifact. Unaware of its dark nature, you place it on its reserved spot between other artifacts. You notice that strange events starts to occur. Eventually realizing that you, might not be the only living creature inside.

name: D.A.M. Champion
summary: Assemble a team of monsters to use during turn-based battles in this Non-Linear RPG. The world of D.A.M. Champion takes an original approach to the concept of being a protagonist in a monster-taming game.

name: Date With the Night
summary: Ben O'Hara and his new assistant Yuhiko Kosuke have a Date With the Night in this Noir Survival Horror. Choose your character to investigate a new thrilling case in the sequel to the critically acclaimed cult hit Ghost at Dawn. Navigate your way through unspeakable horrors in an abandoned apartment building while piecing together clues to solve how so many people suddenly went missing.

name: DarkAndLight
summary: Use clues to power up generators, find weapons to kill zombies, and utilize items to escape the bunker maze!

name: Dandy VR,NR
summary: Dandy Boy Adventures Special!​ spin-off hidden-object game

name: Dani and Evan: Dinosaur books
summary: Read, play and learn about dinosaurs with interactive and educational books!

name: Dandy Boy Adventures
summary: Dandy Boy Adventures is a high-quality adult adventure game with sim dating & RPG elements!

name: Damned House
summary: "Damned House" is a horror game set in a scary, abandoned house. Explore the abandoned house, while trying to escape from very hostile creature and various dangers. There will always be a constant danger of death. Do you dare to explore the house and escape from it?

name: Data Worm
summary: Data Worm is a modern take on the classic video game "Snake." Set in a circular map, players navigate a digital worm that grows longer as it consumes data scattered throughout, picks up an array of power-ups and avoids obstacles in the form of viruses Unlike the traditional linear movement of the original Snake game, Data Worm offers free movement within the circular environment.

name: Daedalus
summary: Choose your champion and enter the Labyrinth, survive if you can. Hades has taken over the Labyrinth, forcing souls through an arduous trial to reach the afterlife. Do you have what it takes to succeed, or will you be doomed to guard the Labyrinth for eternity?

name: Danger Ramps
summary: Danger Ramps is a 3D platformer driving game. Master the control of your vehicle to advance through colorful environments, collecting stars without flipping over or falling into abysses.

name: Dance Hero: More Jiggle
summary: Dance Hero: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. Twerk through the story, hire many interesting characters to dance with, explore a huge city and even customize your main character with clothes from real-world fashion brands!

name: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony Demo Ver.
summary: The demo version of Danganronpa V3. Having a completely original story from the full game, it features characters from previous Danganronpa games having to solve a murder case together.

name: Davy Jones Dating Simulator
summary: Davy Jones Dating Simulator is a comedic dating sim where you date the man who posts seven videos or more per day, Davy Jones himself.

name: David Jones: Merry Christmas CD-ROM
summary: David Jones: Merry Christmas CD-ROM was a promotional PC game sold at David Jones during the early 2000s. The game is a compilation of Christmas themed games, alongside an ecard creator.

name: Day of the Sandwich
summary: Day of the Sandwich is a short graphic adventure in the visual style of Lucas Arts titles Day of the Tentacle and Sam & Max: Hit the Road. A very short and simple puzzle adventure where the player is required to make a sandwich.

name: Dark Space
summary: this small game was made from the idea of 3 friends for a school project, the game is a boss battle that starts when you reach 100 points, in it you are the last hope of protecting the planet from an alien invasion, so be careful !

name: Dare Demo Shodan ni Nareru Igo Kyoushitsu
Daughters of the Stars
summary:
Evelyn Lima is a 15 year old sophomore who's simply trying to get by in high school. All she wants is to spend time with her best friends in peace, not be bothered by bullies, and get through high school without any incident. That all changes in the new year of 199X, as she awakens to magical powers from the cosmos, and now has to figure out why she of all people has them.

Daughters of the Stars is an episodic visual novel starring Evelyn Lima, which takes place in New York in 199X. Play as her as she navigates school, daily life, hanging out with friends, and going against bullies and bad guys.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 1: When A Star Burns Out, A Flower Blooms
summary: Evelyn Lima is starting the second semester of her Sophomore year of high school. When she discovers magical powers and has to fight a monster, everything she thought she knew changes.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 2: Face the Setting Sun: A Fierce Flower Stands Strong!
summary: It's been a week since Eve first transformed into her magical girl alter ego, but she hasn't been able to transform since. When a fierce enemy attacks her and her friends after school, one she can't stop on her own, a new magical girl stands up to stop it.

name: DarkScape
summary: DarkScape was a variant of RuneScape, announced on 16 September 2015. It was a fork of the main RuneScape code as of late May 2015, featuring an open PvP environment without "safe zones". Furthermore, only Legacy Mode combat was available; everyone started at combat level 3; and progress in RuneScape did not affect DarkScape in any way.

name: Darkcean
summary: Darkcean is a survival horror videogame settled on a luxurious cruise ship. Influenced mostly by modern horror movies and famous survival horror games, Darkcean emphasizes the tension and anxiety in an original and exclusive environment.

name: Day Dream
summary: This is a pixel style puzzle game, including a certain micro-horror elements. Truth is blind love. Retrieve your memory and escape from this horrible hospital.

name: Dark Lord: Peacemaker
summary: A dark fantasy classic RPG. Customize your race, gender and class. Gather a party with your favorite companions. Change the fate of the characters and the world with your choices.

name: Dance DeLight
summary: Dance DeLight is a preloaded game on the Nokia 3220 and Nokia 2220 devices, running J2ME.

name: Dasha Vasilyeva: The Personal Case of Catwoman
summary:
“Dasha Vasilyeva: The Personal Case of Catwoman” is one of the brightest projects in the quest genre of 2009 from CreativeDream Studio. A fascinating detective story, based on the work of the same name by the most popular Russian writer Daria Dontsova, well known to players from her literary bestsellers and numerous television adaptations.

A request for help from a desperate friend becomes the beginning of the incredible adventures of Dasha Vasilyeva. On the eve of the New Year, she will have to unravel a mysterious family intrigue. The unexpected return of deputy Mikhail Medvedev's daughter, who disappeared more than 10 years ago, leads to the most unexpected consequences during Dasha's private investigation.

name: Dave the Diver: Godzilla
summary:
Dave the Diver: Godzilla is a free DLC update that adds the following content to the base game:

- New missions: Three new Godzilla DLC-exclusive missions have been added.
- New dishes
Discover new dishes inspired by Godzilla and Ebirah
- New Godzilla figures scattered through the ocean

name: Dark Memories: Prologue
summary: Rent a cabin for a serene weekend, only to face a series of eerie puzzles in 'Dark Memories: Prologue'—an FPS thriller where every clue is a step towards escape.

name: Damn it!
summary: Climb to the top with the help of marshmallows.

name: Dangerous adventure
summary: Dangerous adventure is an adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. You have to take on the role of a traveler who was shipwrecked and ended up on an unnamed island. Arm yourself with a magical staff and explore mysterious locations, get out of the maze, fight monsters in a dark dungeon!

name: Dangerous Fight
summary: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping adventure "Dangerous Fight" - an online shooter that will take you to the heart of the action in the atmosphere of the city of Yerevan, Armenia. You will go into epic battles where the technology of the future and the cultural heritage of the ancient city mix.

name: DangoVerse
summary: Play as your favorite Vtubers from DangoFam! Engage in battles, explore, and clear your way through armies of mobs.

name: Daniel Pintado's Land of Silence
summary: Land of Silence is a Survival Zombie post-apocalyptic open world and open ending game, bringing back old school survival horror with modern touches. Managing scarce resources such as food, drink and ammunition.

name: Dark Bows
summary: Embark on a mesmerizing journey through breathtaking landscapes and uncover the mysterious story of Princess Heila, which revolves around her quest to uncover the long-buried secrets of her family and kingdom.

name: Dark Energy
summary: A 2D space action RPG with a slow and deliberate style, reminiscent of the Soulslike genre.

name: Dark Lessons
summary: Can you survive your teacher in this psychological horror game? With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.

name: Darklight
summary: Are you ready to investigate a mysterious occurrence at a remote lighthouse? Solve all mysteries in this dark and eerie puzzle game.

name: Daikoukai Frontier
summary: A pirate themed social game for mobile devices starring Ruby Heart from the Marvel Vs Capcom series.

name: Dash or Die
summary: Climb to the top of the world using your special double jump and dash abilities and more !

name: Days Like A Nightmare
summary: Who is infected with the parasite 'Rubyuk'? Place sensors, observe the readings, and build your deductions. Then confront the nightmare - mostly in a physical manner. This is a short, scary game that combines reasoning with mini-action.

name: Dance Fabulous
summary: Dance Fabulous is a dancing game where you have to keep the right rhythm while creating unique dance choreographies with your personalised avatar. Unlock new clothing, sceneries and dance styles as you play.

name: Dark Warrior
summary: Fixed screen space shooter

name: Daisy Quest and Daisy's Castle
summary: Daisy Quest is an educational game intended for young children. The goal is to find the titular dragon Daisy in a magical game of hide-and-seek. While you explore the world, you come across various simple mini-games intended to test your knowledge of vowel and consonant sounds. When each mini-game is completed, a treasure will be collected which reveals part of Daisy's hiding spot. After all of the treasures have been collected, the player wins the game by finding Daisy at the revealed location.

name: Dash & Roll
summary: Dash & Roll - Magic in Motion. Jump, dash, dodge, and discover the secret behind this magical marvelous marble adventure!

name: Darkness: Prince of Shadows
summary: The world is on the brink, the only hope for humanity lies in you. Defeat hordes of demons, solve puzzles and use your skills to save all of humanity. Improve your skills, choose the right path to avoid falling into corruption and recover the only object that can save the world.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: USA Tour
summary: Explore a massive new open world with new landscapes inspired by iconic North American landmarks, from the Grand Canyon to the Nevada Desert and Yellowstone, in both Rally Raid competitions and Free Roam mode.

name: DarkStorm
summary: Play as MARS (Machine of Absolute Retaliation and Safeguard), a robot programmed to exterminate the treacherous aliens who have taken over Razor City. As MARS, you must free Razor City from its domination in order to save the survivors from their doom.

name: Danmaku Shimai: La soeur de barrage
summary: La Soeur de Barrage is a freeware bullet game developed by Tocoroten featuring characters from the Maria-sama ga Miteru light novel series. Unique within the genre, the player controls their character using mouse input instead of a joystick or keyboard.

name: Darts Club
summary: Join the Darts Club and compete for the dart throwing championship cup!

name: Daylight District
summary: Daylight District is a Vanilla-Compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring remixed textures from Moonlit District.

name: Daughter
summary:
Daughter is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame starring Edel, an old lady who lives alone and refuses to enter the rooms of her home besides her own. You may explore her dreams while she waits for her family to visit her.

As you explore her dreams, you can collect Edel's power fantasies (effects) which are "better" versions of her that will help you go deeper, and the deeper you go eventually you'll be able to open the doors and find what is Edel hiding.

name: Dawn of Gray
summary: Dawn of Gray is a single-player visual novel with a distinctive style, in which you play the role of a young man discovering himself and his feelings.

name: Dating Simulator 2025
summary: Dating Simulator 2025 is a dating simulator that offers you the skill of seduction and improving your dating skills. This game allows players to immerse themselves in a world where they can meet, socialize and win the hearts of virtual girls.

name: Dancing Game
summary: A Dance Dance Revolution-inspired game released in Brick Games.

name: Dayshift at Freddy's: Doggo Location improved
summary: Almost 1 year after Jack and Dave made Freddy's Bakersfield location close down, A new location was opened. Apparently, Freddy Fazbender's decided to bring the Idaho location (#45) back. Now, this is where the fun begins.

name: Dave the Diver: Anniversary Edition
summary:
Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

This edition, released exclusively in Japan in physical format, features an exclusive Guilty Gear: Strive crossover with content including boat skins of the various fighters, cosplayers appearing as customers at Bancho Sushi, May's theme song The Disaster of Passion in the rhythm mini-game and May's anchor appearing as a melee weapon during dives.

name: Dabman: When The Haters Dab Back Remastered
summary: Relive this 2018 classic from Kimulator's Films in a remaster of one of their first game ever!

name: Dark Color
summary: This is a casual game where players use directional keys to control character movement

name: Dark Days
summary: A Supernatural Thriller from the indie creators of "White Night" and “Under The Waves” now remastered for PC gamers.

name: DACHStudio Jigsaw Puzzle Box
summary: Beautifully drawn artworks from the DACHstudio members for you to puzzle. Multiple difficulties from 4x4 to 28x26 pieces for everyone to enjoy.

name: Darkness Ritual: Impasse
summary: You witnessed a dark ritual taking place and nothing will go wrong from now on. You are stuck in an unknown place, can getting out of here and solving the secrets save you from this impasse?

name: DACHstudio Jigsaw Puzzle Box: Vanlau's Tinybuns
summary: 20 beautifully hand drawn tinybun paintings from vanlau to puzzle.

name: Darkness Machine
summary: Darkness Machine Game is a sword fight and shooting. Shoot by auto gun and Missile. Players will control a character that can use sword , auto Gun or missile to destroy enemy. Player can change to power body. Makes the attack harder. Can fly and shoot rockets. Age 18+ Only

name: Daiku no Medium Megumi
summary: This small game was made right soon after Daiku no Medium back in 2019 to show its ending from a different point of view.

name: Danchi-zuma no Yuuwaku
summary: Koei’s erotic RPG about a condom salesman visiting an apartment block, where he must knock on doors trying to “sell his products”, while battling Yakuza and ghosts who roam the halls.

name: Day: Dream
summary: A linear visual novel about memories from long ago, taking place in the distant future.

name: Dark Sky
summary: Lead a party of unlikely heroes as they uncover the truth behind a planetary catastrophe in this immersive turn-based RPG. Craft and upgrade character cards into powerful combos while you battle your way through this beautifully hand-drawn alien world!

name: Dark Ride Simulator
summary: Blue Squid Theme Parks presents the VR simulator of their most popular ride The Dark Zone. No need for long trips, now you can experience this iconic ride from the comfort of your own home.

name: Day of Eevee
summary: Day of Eevee is a Commodore 64 game about Eevee's birthday. Play three separate mini-games to earn medals. Each mini-game has a secret alternate solution!

name: Dark Sanctum
summary: Overcome challenges, plan strategies, and collect cards and resources to progress in a procedural world of turn-based auto-combat. Embark on a strategic journey with an initial deck, face diverse enemies, unlock new decks, and strategically build your arsenal.

name: Dark Blood: Beyond the Darkness
summary: Darkblood -Beyond the Darkness- is a turn-based, card-based dungeon-crawler roguelike RPG developed for offline mobile play by Toihaus Games.

name: Dark Blood 2:The Cry of Souls
summary:
DarkBlood2 -The Cry of Souls- is the sequel to DarkBlood -Beyond the Darkness-.

The game adds a story, a central town, stores, and a day/night cycle.

name: Darkness and Flame
summary: A story of a young girl involved in the battle between Darkness and Flame.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - US Creator
summary: The US Creators Pack is a brand new DLC for Monsters & Mortals that adds the popular American YouTube Creator, CoryXKenshin, to the game!

name: Dangerous World
summary: "Dangerous World" is an interactive narrative adventure game where players navigate life's complexities as an ordinary girl, making choices that shape the destiny. Engage in emotional interactions, confront tough decisions, witness the consequences of your actions in this journey of self-discovery.

name: Dark Pact
summary: Manipulate enemy positioning and use the environment to your advantage. Utilize clever combos to defeat overwhelming odds in this tactical turn-based strategy game with a focus on creativity rather than number crunching.

name: Dawnmaker
summary: Dawnmaker is a turn-based city building and deckbuilding game. Raise luminous cities in a dark world, optimize your deck and create powerful combinations between buildings and cards!

name: Dark Passage
summary: Delve. Explore. Discover. But most importantly, get out of the Dark Passage alive. Be the first to discover hundreds of ancient artifacts in this first person treasure hunt inspired by classic early 3D dungeon crawlers.

name: Dawn Raider
summary: Dawn Raider is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up made by Taiwanese developer Softstar Entertainment that was released for DOS in 1990.

name: Dangerous Galaxy
summary: Build your ship abilities in a creative way to destroy the evil foes that await you in the dangerous galaxy. A roguelike experience with physics-based combat, resource management, and freedom to play your way.

name: Dandy Boy Halloween Adventure
summary: Standalone DLC of Dandy Boy adventures where our main characters get stranded without gas during a road trip near an abandoned mansion, deciding to explore it supernatural things start to happen, and it's up to our Dandy boy to help his friends and learn the mysterious past of this mansion

name: Dark Souls: Archthrones
summary: Dark Souls: Archthrones is a fan-made mod for Dark Souls that aims to enhance and expand the original game. It introduces new content, such as additional weapons, armour, spells, and items. The mod also rebalances gameplay elements, updates enemy placements, and adds new areas to explore.

name: Data Rush: La Course Aux Données
summary: Data Rush: The Data Race is an educational 2D adventure video game about the world of DATA. Take control of a customizable avatar and traverse crazy levels packed with original characters and mini-games, to become the master of digital data !

name: Dala and The Cursed Forest
summary: A strategy survival adventure game in Roguelike - Deck Building. Embark on an epic journey as a young Mutant maiden, Dala. Explore to uncover the mysteries of curses, and cleanse them to restore peace and serenity to her cherished forest sanctuary.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - House of Ashes
summary: House of Ashes is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters
summary: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC is a new DLC level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Doors
summary: DOORS is coming to Monsters & Mortals!

name: Day Of The Tank
summary: Day of The Tank is a retro top down shooter where you have to defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing them all. Fight across multiple destructible levels. Experience old school tank gaming from the 1980s, but with a modern save system!

name: Daienkai Buchou
summary:
Become a master of the banquet! "Enkai Buchou" and "Enkai Buchou 2" are now even more powerful!!

"Daienkai Buchou" is a collection of mini-games based on the motif of Japanese salaryman culture "Banquet".

Let's play unique and diverse mini-games to liven up banquets such as year-end parties, New Year's parties, cherry blossom viewing, and barbecues, and improve the skills of the manager!

We are accepting reservations for banquets now~!!

What is the skill of your banquet organizer? The organizers of the banquet are very busy, such as the partition of the place and the care for the boss. As the manager of the banquet, the player will challenge mini-games with various scenes of in-house events as a motif.

A number of mini-games for all seasons! There are a total of 9 mini-games such as "a drink master" who pours beer into a mug and "dish turning" to help with entertainment. Some of them are full of seasonal feelings such as cherry blossom viewing, Nagashi somen noodles, and fireworks display, and they change every season.
In each mini-game, if you get a certain score or higher, a "hard" mode will appear. Let's aim to update the high score with a "hard" with a high difficulty level.

Exciting bingo tournament!!
If you get a high score and get a bingo ticket, let's participate in "Bingo" in the menu! Depending on the degree of collection of bingo prizes and the score of the game, the title as a banquet manager will rise, so please aim for the ultimate title!

name: Dark Snow
summary: Dark Snow was present on the Mebinya! Mebius Fandisc, it is an alternative version of the game Snow, but it tries to be more brutal and unsettling.

name: Day 224
summary:
There is not a day that goes by without tears,

But regardless, I must prepare because...

Today is different.

Today is the day.

name: Dark Sun
summary: Dark Sun is an action game with 2D black and white graphics. Souls game mode. Explore the post-apocalyptic world after a thousand years, collect weapons, armor, battle techniques, magic, and challenge powerful enemies. Advance through repeated deaths to find the truth of the doomsday.

name: Dark Echo
summary: A demake of the game Dark Echo (Steam, iOS, Android) for PICO-8. You are trapped in a world of absolute darkness and can only see via visualized echolocation.

name: Dark Web: Vigilante
summary: You are Vigilantus, a master hacker fighting to fix a rotten society. Immerse yourself in a world ruled by corrupt corporations, politicians, and greedy pharmaceutical companies. Uncover dark political secrets, sabotage systems, redistribute wealth to the poor, and destroy entire corporations.

name: Dark Cellar Death Trial
summary: Dark Cellar Death Trial - 2D action-shooter, where your mission is to destroy all the enemies that lie in wait for you at every turn, and find hidden things lost in the location. Your opponents become stronger and more cunning, so you'll have to use all your tactical skills and strength to survive.

name: Darkest Light
summary: In this Action-Adventure, instead of shooting your enemies, you have to use the environment to survive. As scientist Jack, you travel into the rain forest in search for a legendary machine. What you find is horror, but there is also one kind boy who helps to find a way through it all.

name: Dark Rampage
summary: Dark Rampage is an 2D platformer with action elements where you play as a hero who finds himself in a dark and dangerous world after he falls into a dark well. You have to explore various locations, fight monsters and solve puzzles.

name: Dawn of the Ashen Queen
summary: Dawn of the Ashen Queen is a classic grid-based dungeon crawler. Set out with your party to reveal the legacy of a millennia old curse in a narrative-rich experience. Explore the colorful world of Eshavon, unearth its many secrets and fight dangerous foes sent out to stop you in your mission.

name: Damn Sewer
summary: An indie horror game in which you find yourself in a mysterious abandoned sewer where people disappear. At first there is nothing unusual, but gradually you realize that something terrible lives in the sewer.

name: Days With Ollie
summary: The day has finally come. The day that will determine on whether or not you'll be accepted as a reporter in hololive. And not just any reporter, but the exclusive reporter for Kureiji Ollie! What goes down on in the life of the zombie idol? Find out what it'll be like to spend Days with Ollie!

name: Dadish 3D
summary: Explore an exciting world, face off with fast-food themed foes, and reunite Dadish with his missing children in this challenging 3D platforming adventure.

name: Daugger
summary: A non-combat oriented adventure game about a dog named Olive, exploring, claiming territory, and solving problems to trigger bizarre events. Daugger is a relaxing and casual love letter to pets, suitable for all ages.

name: Dangerous Arena
summary: The arena is not a place for the weak. Choose wisely those who will fight!

name: Dark Spirit
summary: Dark spirit is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements, where you will find yourself in the role of a vengeful ghost imprisoned in an ancient castle. Terrible secrets, dark corners and encounters with enemies - all this awaits you in this exciting adventure.

name: Darkwell: Assassin's Choice
summary: 《DARKWELL:Assassin's Choice》 is a fast-paced, one-hit kill style top-down combat game that uses various methods such as hook, deflect, dash, and skills to end enemies, and finally choose your Assassin's Road in this experience

name: Dark Sword: The Light of Ainn
summary: Dark Sword is a frenetic action game that mixes bullet-hell and hack-n-slash in the midst of a devastating and dark open world with a tragic backstory, where the player must immerse himself in order to defeat the powerful guardians that guard it.

name: Daydreamer
summary: Daydreamer: An action-adventure RPG game where you dream away your classes to explore an action-packed world of adventure made from the topics surrounding you. Your brain is the limit! so go and have fun!

name: Dark Umbra
summary: Fight against the Umbral Horde on your way to take down the sinister sorcerer who doomed the world. Team up with friends or go it alone as you level up your character and collect powerful relics in this action rogue-like.

name: Daydam Knight
summary: Daydam Knight is a roguelike deckbuilder game. You play as a knight who is trying to destroy demons that have attacked his land. Use your Powerful cards and destroy all the enemies.

name: Danmaku Kentei Shiken: DaiOuJou-hen
summary:
Speaking of Cave's shooting game, no matter what you say, it's a barrage!! But how good am I actually?

An app that answers that question is finally here! I will diagnose your shooter level by fighting with a boss who gradually gets stronger every time you defeat it! Let's all compete and aim for the heights! Face off against the bosses from DoDonPachi DaiOuJou!

name: Dandy
summary: Early dungeon crawler Gauntlet style

name: Dash x Survivors
summary: Defeat endless hordes of demonic robots in this hack n slash action roguelike. Use 100+ unique upgrades to create your own game-breaking build and claim victory.

name: Dark Hunting Ground
summary: "Dark Hunting Ground" is a minimalist style of pixel construction brush treasure game. As a new member of the Hunter Association, players will hunt monsters against the void, gain trophies and experience in battles, and challenge the source of void erosion with your unique construction ideas.

name: Dark Investigation
summary: Maybe you like to explore the park up and down, or explore the depths of the underground sea where there is no water, only chrome! Do you want to control huge demons? Or do you want to become a god to the local creatures!CONTROL UNIVERSE, TIME, CREATURES, GODS AND OTHER.

name: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
summary: Navigate office intrigue in Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies! Complete tasks, uncover the carrier of illegal leads, and outsmart coworkers in this strategic multiplayer game set in an early 2000s office.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Grimmstories by datGestruepp
summary: Get 20 beautifull tradtitionally hand drawn Grimmstorie paintings from datGestruepp to puzzle.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: JuVentures
summary: Get 20 beautifully hand drawn JuVentures paintings from JujiBla to puzzle.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Megumi_M Gemstone Zodiacs
summary: 10 beautifully hand drawn Zodiac Gemstones paintings from Megumi_M to puzzle.

name: Darkchaser: Battletide
summary: [Darkchaser: Battletide] is a survivor-like game where players enter a world ravaged by monsters, arming themselves with various skills and relics to engage in fierce battles against countless enemies, becoming stronger through challenges!

name: Dandara
summary: What is the "Dandarasama" passed down in a small village? A horror game in which you wander through the mountains at night and try to escape.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box:: Illumarie's Fantastic Characters
summary: 20 beautifully hand drawn fantasy character paintings from Illumarie to puzzle.

name: Dark Skies 2: Keepers of Nemansk
summary: A whole new Journey in Nemansk awaits you! 5 Years after the Nemansk Incident you enter the Area as a young Mercenary named Dima. Experience a whole new Story set in the fictional Nemansk Region and explore dangerous new environments!

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Kingdoms
summary: Kingdoms is a free standalone campaign game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II. This new game mode challenges players in a desperate race against the clock to find and defeat a monstrous threat before it overwhelms and destroys the Kingdom. Journey across the land to gather resources and battle evil incursions, all while defending a network of safe haven Inns.

name: Daisy The Swimmer
summary: Hunt fish with the iron swimmer Daisy at the beautiful beach of Parang Blue Island. And crush the vile pirates aiming for the caught fish. Daisy's companions each have their own unspeakable stories. Gain their trust and reach the hidden truths of Parang Blue Island.

name: Darksword: Nephilim
summary: This is a single-player dungeon for "Darksword: Battle Eternity". Please use this content after updating to the latest version.

name: Dark Tonic's Blunderbusted: Guns Out, Bluns Out
summary: Blunderbusted is the world's first roguelike lightgun shooter! Arcade action with destructible stages, crazy powerup combos, and just... too many enemies.

name: Dark Slayer
summary:
In a world of chaos, where the balance between good and evil has been lost,
the legendary heroes will embark on a journey to save the world from darkness.

name: Dad Discovers The Internet
summary: Arcade-style comedy with silly characters and a lot of laughs. Complete challenging levels as you make your way through the web. You're an old school badass, and you don't have time for internet shenanigans, but they have your son. It's time dad brought out the big guns.

name: Danmaku Kentei Shiken: Ketsui-hen
summary: How good are you at shooting games? The second entry of the danmaku test series that answers that question is finally available! This time too, you can enjoy a wide range of people from beginners to veterans. Of course, there are also bonus elements unique to the danmaku test trial ...? Face off against the weapons from Ketsui: Kizuna Jikogu Tachi!

name: Dark Card
summary: A game about exploration and experimentation

name: Dark Dive
summary: You're a "willing" employee, that got send down into the lower levels to capture the escaped monsters. Proceed through the random generated levels, gather items and find the monster. Good luck surviving!

name: Datavoid: Catrow
summary: Catrow is an action-platform game with an ambiguous design. The world, once as cute as it used to be, has been corrupted by Idito's intrusion into the files. And remember, this game is not about ponies!

name: Daisy Chain
summary: Daisy Chain is a queer, epistolary interactive fiction game, where the player reads diary entries, documents, and audio transcriptions by the scientist Benjamin Holloway and the perfect duplicate he created based on himself.

name: Dark as Blood
summary:
Dark as Blood is a short, text-based horror game inspired by Slavic folklore by Masha Lepire and Eugene Fasano.

Close the sidebar, put on headphones, and make the game full screen for a more immersive experience.

name: Dangerous Pacche-san Moriya's Journey 4
summary: The latest installment in the Moriya's Journey series! The action game is back, kinder and worse! Can you solve the hidden mystery?

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Oblivion Edition
summary: The Oblivion Edition contains the main game and The Binding Blade DLC. The DLC introduced two new heroes, a special questline, wandering boss, and more.

name: Dark Samurai Avengers
summary: Rumors of the Black Hole Sun Prophecy, an era of endless darkness, spread as several towns and cities are blotted out by an eclipse. Your beloved father, a top shogun, and brother have been slain in battle by General Benki—an evil warlord rumored to dabble in the dark arts.

name: Dances with Destiny
summary: You are a young woman struggling to maintain her family archives and working part-time at a local market. On the night of your debut into society as an adult, you attend the Ball of Indigo Flowers. While there, you encounter a mysterious man who sweeps you off your feet and charms you with his good manners. He disappears before you can talk to him more. Suddenly a man drags you onto the dance floor, and you realize he’s your childhood friend, believed to have died in a war between humans and ghouls. Shocked and overwhelmed, you decide to attend a party at his mansion the following night. Once again, you encounter the mysterious man who noticed your scent, and his enigmatic but handsome brother. While out on the patio, you’re suddenly attacked by a man with glowing red eyes...a ghoul! Your childhood friend saves you, but you find yourself drawn into the world of ghouls, learning more about them and the war. Three handsome men with their own personalities and opinions accompany you, each one vying for your attention. But questions and danger plague you. What is this power you have that quells a ghoul’s violent rage? Who is the person trying to kill you? And who will finally claim your heart?

name: Darkness Myth
summary: You lived an ordinary life. One day, the city you live in is enveloped in flames and someone tries to kill you!

name: Dating Start
summary: After falling to the underground, you find yourself in a bed of golden flowers outside some ruins. This seems familiar, but instead of the usual ruins caretaker greeting you, you're met with an all too well-known grin. Dating Start is an Undertale Dating-Sim where you date the fan-favorite, Sans. Taking place after the last human arrived, This is your story and how you go about it is up to you. Will you find love? Or will you give LOVE?

name: Dare ga Humpty wo Koroshita no?: Lizzie, Futatabi Tantei ni Naru
summary: Baron Humpty, the owner of this mansion, was killed by an axe to the head. You (Lizzie) must search for the culprit with your assistant black cat, Dinah.

name: DarlingHoney!
summary:
Aurora works part-time as a gravedigger and the routine is starting to bore her. One night, however, she - somewhat accidentally - pulls an undead boy named Eden out of his grave. Fascinated by her at first sight, he promises to do anything to turn her life into the thrilling adventure she always dreamed of. From then on, Aurora's desires range from solving mysteries to bringing down the government and of course finding out just who or what in the world her strange friend is...

Episode 1 / Imaginary Motive: Cold Love

Episode 2 / Last stop. All out.

name: Danganronpa: Monokuma Strikes Back
summary: A spinoff where characters from Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc are in various minigames that the player has to beat.

name: Dark Discoveries
summary: In this chilling horror experience, immerse yourself in the eerie confines of a desolate house consumed by anomalies set loose by a devastating virus. Equipped with only a camera and flashlight, your sole objective is to document evidence of these sinister aberrations while navigating the looming threat of their lethal grasp. Prepare for spine-tingling encounters around every corner, where each photograph captured could mark your demise. Will you unravel the origins of the virus before succumbing to its sinister machinations, or will you become yet another casualty swallowed by the abyss? This game combines elements of horror and puzzle-solving, promising a gripping and immersive journey into darkness.

name: Dangerous World
summary: Dangerous World is a single player Half-Life 2: Episode Two mod created by Studio TiiM.

name: Dark Roast Cafe
summary: Summon demons to help you run your business, and work yourself to boost their performance. Decorate the interior, keep the place tidy and pick the best employees to fulfill your customers' needs!

name: Dawn Chorus
summary: Dawn Chorus is a wholesome, non-linear romance furry visual novel set in cold and snow-clad Norway.

name: Dance Eden
summary: Dance Eden is a VR/MR dance game where you can dance alone or with other players, following the lead dance instructor in real-time. Currently, it already supports full-body motion capture, mod.io, LIV, and third-person perspective.

name: DarkStar One: Nintendo Switch Edition
summary:
Commander, welcome aboard the DarkStar One – Nintendo Switch Edition to be released on June 20, 2024

Breach the final frontier and explore the vast expanse of this retro space opera.

name: Dark Deception: Malicious Mall
summary: Fan-game of Dark Deception.

name: Dawntown
summary:
All you can do is survive with all your might against the mysterious monster.
Feel the invisible fear and close survival in Dawntown.

name: Das Teufelswad
summary:
Das Teufelswad is a 3 map pk3 with a hub level. You can play the levels in any order, but the chronological order they were made in is
1. Die Teufelsmaschine (originally released in RAMP2021)
2. Die Teufelsbrücke (originally released in RAMP2022)
3. Der Teufelsturm (Brand new - fresh out of the oven)

name: Dashlab
summary: A 2D time attack game where you dash around rooms and collect buffs and debuffs to complete levels as fast as possible. Featuring an endless mode where you can use your own songs!

name: Damion Shard: Ace Attorney
summary: The CEO of Shard Corporation, Lord Shard, is also a renowned prosecutor, as has been his family's tradition for generations. But after a mysterious incident atop the Shard Corporation building, a cloud of secrets hanging over the past of the Shard family was revealed. Lord Shard's son, Damion, was forever changed by that incident. Soon, Damion decided to become a defense attorney, a decision that astonished his family. However, Lord Shard decided to create a small law firm so that his son could practice as a defense attorney. But with each case he takes, Damion discovers that there is quite a lot that he doesn't know about the Shard family, and eventually uncovers a dark secret about his own past...

name: Dance Junkie
summary: Dance Junkie is a full body Rhythm Smasher game that turns your webcam or smartphone into a motion capture system. Experience full body tracking without expensive equipment while you move your body in an immersive world. Your goal is to pop tune bubbles, and you'll need rhythm to be successful.

name: Dark Throne
summary: Awaken as a knight in this 2D Metroidvania platformer. Explore, unlock abilities, and battle foes to escape a treacherous dungeon.

name: Dangerous Land
summary: Dangerous Land is a first-person strategic game enriched with elements of exploration and action. Assume the role of the ruler of your settlement, manage and develop it in real-time, recruit and upgrade units, take care of resources, and participate in epic battles.

name: Date with Detective Wolf
summary:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choosing your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One decision can change everything!

name: Daily Bread
summary: It's a board game with sword fighting elements that you play with yourself and three other CPUs in a dark atmosphere.

name: Dark Destruction
summary: This is an open world role-playing game with a medieval magical background, requiring players to explore. You can defeat invading enemies or lead followers to defeat evil leaders. Monster camps, wilderness bosses, dungeon dungeons are full of adventure and passion.

name: Dark Daemon
summary: In the dark world where demons rule, a group of warriors who fight against the dark forces stand up, bring a ray of justice to mankind, and start an unprecedented adventure.

name: Dangerous Connections
summary: As a crisis brews in the Soviet Union, all of your skills as special agent Dan Morris are in demand. Explore the dark machinations of your opponents in a gripping story with exciting and unforgettable characters and use weapons and vehicles typical of the time, as well as a series of spy gadgets.

name: Dark Door
summary: "Dark Door" is a reasoning game developed by the Mallet Games, a studio composed of students from Bilibili.

name: Darkfall
summary: Darkfall is a Survival-RPG where you must overcome a death loop to escape a dangerous island before your body withers like the others. Be resourceful by using strategy and stealth to develop survival skills capable of overcoming various aggressive creatures and even other players!

name: Dark Era
summary: "Dark Era" invites you to an alternate timeline of the universe's demise, where "humanity's" desperate survival hinges on controlling black holes. Guide a space colony, manage resources, and advance tech. Explore space's mysteries while uncovering its secrets in an educational journal.

name: Dark & Quispy
summary: A Fantasy Rouge-Like game with Paper thin graphics. Cut through waves of enemies and collect their souls to increase your power! Encounter a variety of enemies and events as you make your way through the DARK.

name: Darknesssssssssssssssss
summary: This game is a medieval survival game. Defeat the enemies hiding in the castle. Actively use your shield and roll to avoid the enemy's attacks and exploit the opponent's loopholes to defeat the enemy.

name: Dark Memories: Investigation
summary: An immersive first-person psychological horror set in a desolate, oppressive, and mysterious police building. Unravel cursed events while searching for your missing coworker.

name: Darkly Darkness
summary: Darkly Darkness is a simple 2D action platformer where you jump and shoot, destroying carefully crafted enemies along the way using pistols, shotguns, and more. It is about a boy trying to discover what has happened to our planet recently. Is it aliens? Something else? He needs to find out.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Mystical Worlds by RiaStarchild
summary: 10 beautifully hand drawn mystical worlds from RiaStarchild to puzzle.

name: Daisy Dangerous
summary: A 2D puzzle and precision platformer based on the 1989's classic, Rick Dangerous.

name: Day of the Hamster
summary:
Day of the Hamster is a point & click graphic adventure game in the style of Day of the Tentacle. It's a short and sweet experience about escaping from a locked vault.
It's a sidequel to Day of the Sandwich.

name: Danger Street
summary:
Danger Street is an arcade game set in New York 2017, a superb city filled with most infamous criminals in the entire galaxy. The highest council of New York has decided to finish it once and for all and massively eliminate these scums. The player is the vigilante of the future, who must rid the city of all these decadent beings. New York is counting on you!

So, the player should shoot the enemies appearing on the screen and shooting at you with an aiming crosshair while scrolling the street from left to right. Once all the enemies are eliminated on the level, the player is transferred to the next level gaining the scores and the bonus. There is no health bar, and it is only one life for the player.

name: Dark Continent: Mist
summary: Dark Continent: Mist is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god… The choice is in your hands…

name: Dah-Varsity
summary:
In this game, you’ll explore different STEAM topics like cars, math, music, books, space, and creating things. It’s a chance for you to learn while playing! When you play Dah-Varsity, you’ll learn about different jobs that match your interests in STEAM!

The game aims to help young adults develop a basic understanding of STEAM and entrepreneurship topics and foster the foundation for advanced STEAM learning and professional careers in the future.

Join the Dah-Varsity community and get ready for an awesome adventure filled with STEAM! Learn, have fun, and show the world what you can do.

name: Danganronpa Mauve
summary: A Korean Danganronpa Fangame, 15 students are trapped in Hope's Peak Academy, with a new cast introduced for this story.

name: Danganronpa Croxx: The Beginning of the Despair Plan
summary: Danganronpa Croxx is a Korean fan game based on the Danganronpa Series.

name: Danganronpa Hope Recreation
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey filled with deception, despair, and unexpected twists, all in a parallel universe with no connection to the original creators of danganronpa.

name: Danganronpa Blowback: The Stage of Repeated Despair and Hope
summary: A cancelled Korean fan game created by a group of Korean Danganronpa fans called Team MonoLab. The game had a prologue and two fully released chapters prior to its cancellation.

name: Danganronpa Weeping Rebellion
summary: A french fangame based on the Danganronpa series, playing with a new cast of characters as Herschel Klosmo, the Ultimate Police Officer, forced into a brand new killing game.

name: Danganronpa: Eternal Endings
summary: After each dying in horrific accidents, 17 people from all across the world and time find themselves trapped in a strange purgatory like realm with only one way to free their trapped souls: spiritual murder.

name: Danganronpa: Abandoned Lights
summary:
14 former students get called back to their school that they used to go.

But as they go there, things escalate pretty quickly.

name: Danganronpa Absolute Vindication
summary: Mearu, The Ultimate Journalist who goes by a pseudonym, suddenly awakes in an empty classroom amongst 14 other Ultimate Students, unsure how she got there. After some investigation, they're all met with an android known as Monorakun, who explains to them that they'll live in that school until the rest of their lives, unless they choose to murder a fellow classmate and get away with it.

name: Danganronpa Dreamland: Hymn of the Sea and Whales
summary: The premise is as usual 15 students trapped in a school, Hope Peak Academy....or is it?

name: Danganronpa Daydream
summary: A fan game of the Danganronpa series made in Korea.

name: Darkwatch
summary: Created by a 4 man team this short FPS puts you in the shoes of a Darkwatch agent fighting against mysterious creatures. With your loyal canine by your side, upgrade weapons, buy perks and fight the forces of darkness!

name: Dark the Dead
summary: Dark the Dead is an exciting game where you take on the role of a hidden wanderer who goes to meet an elder to receive a new task. The elder's magic coins were stolen, and your main goal is to return them.

name: Dart The Dog
summary: A fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum.

name: Dawn of Defiance
summary: You are the Defier, subjected to a mythic plot across ruined isles. In this Greek myth-inspired survival craft, ascend from weak soldier to god-like anti-hero. Build impressive Greek structures, craft and upgrade your gear, and face down the trials of Gods with up to 3 friends.

name: Daxter
summary:
A port of Daxter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The game was originally released in 2006 as a spin-off of the Jak and Daxter series.

name: Dash n Cry
summary: DASH n CRY is a fast-paced, challenging 2D Precision Platformer game for those who want to put their skills to their limits. Jump and dash your way through a young astronaut's training routine inside his spaceship.

name: DanceDanceRevolution World
summary: DanceDanceRevolution World is the 19th installment of the Dance Dance Revolution arcade series in Japan (and the 10th outside of Japan). The game was released as a software upgrade for LCD-based arcade cabinets on June 12, 2024, in Asia, Australasia, and the United States. It is the sequel to Dance Dance Revolution A3, and is currently the most recent release.

name: Dad
summary: "DAD" is a horror game with a bizarre style and story. Inspired by horror and suspense films from the 80s and 90s. With PS1 style graphics.

name: Dashy Dango
summary: Help the Dango survive by fighting waves of enemies. Dash into enemies to eliminate them.

name: Day of Atonement
summary: This game is a puzzle based on the Day of Atonement. The player is the High Priest and must complete all the duties for the Day of Atonement.

name: Darum
summary: A mystery behind the human mind (free game)

name: Dawn in Arctic
summary: In the end you stand on the cliff... silence... after the battle sun has risen... It is the very end...

name: Daggers Cavern
summary: Duke comes across a pirate hide-out in an underground cavern.

name: Danger Stunt Drive: Extreme Racing Simulator
summary: Extreme racing on dangerous tracks on powerful sports cars - prove to everyone who is the King of the Downhill here!

name: Data Download
summary: A map built with no more than 256 brushes. Your mission is to download some data, but there are a couple of enemies who try to prevent that. Fast and frantic non-stop action.

name: Darok
summary: Darok is a simple 2d platformer where you have to navigate Darok back home. There are breakable floors, moving platforms and Geysers to help Darok on his journey home.

name: Datbyel's Nebula
summary: After resigning from the major corporation Conek Energy, Ellie accidentally falls into the mysterious world of Datbyel. In Datbyel, Ellie solves puzzles, engages in battles, and converses, discovering more about herself and Anchita.

name: Dark Symphony
summary: Dark Symphony is a music-based single-player horror game involving a madman's obsession with cult classic "Lincolnshire Posy." Find all six records lost during the man's drunken slumber, or risk the murder of your wife. Exit the cabin if you dare.

name: Darwin
summary: Enter a tough-as-nails retro old school trip, Darwin is a daunting gauntlet of a speedrunning platformer. It requires the player to move fast and be agile, but to also be prepared to die. Again. Again. And again. Can you survive the trials in Slugtopia, defeat the nasty Wormilon, and make it home?

name: Day Off: Moonriver Incident
summary: An atmospheric 2D top-down shooter with an open world and physics. Step into the role of a police officer from an old horror movie. Discover what happened in the town of Moonriver. Use your brain against zombies - create barricades with the furniture, stay quiet, or unleash full-blown action!

name: Data Man
summary: Data Man is a new game for the original 8-bit NES console that brings arcade action to a home console.

name: Day of Invasion: Reloaded
