summary: Day of Invasion: Reloaded is a First Person Zombie-Shooter that takes place within the Horton-Genetics Disaster of Milespring. Find Weapons to fight your way through hordes of Infected!

name: Dark Ascent
summary: Dark Ascent is designed to be a test of skill, patience, and perseverance. Every decision counts, and you must learn from your mistakes to climb higher.

name: Dark 7
summary: Dark 7 (sometimes styled Dark7) is a ZDoom mod created by Bryant Robinson (Gunrock).

name: Date Everything!
summary: Date Everything is a sandbox dating simulator set in the comfort of your own home, featuring 100 fully voice acted datable characters! Let the romance flow between your bed, smoke alarm and… Overwhelming Sense of Existential Dread? Are you ready to Date Everything?

name: Dance Gangnam Style
summary: Dance Gangnam Style is a bootleg NES game developed by an unknown company. The game is a modded version of another NES bootleg titled "Street Dance", which is a clone of DDR, but instead only including the song Gangnam Style. It is bundled into the Play Vision Portable system.

name: Dawn of Defense
summary: Dawn of Defense is a Roguelite Tower Defense game with RTS elements. Surrounded by enemies, your tribe is the last bastion against the Empire. Build towers to fight enemy troops in the trenches, train warriors and retake territory to build on. Reclaim your lands and defeat the baneful Empire!

name: Darkwater
summary: A cooperative survival horror game where you take command of a submarine trapped under the ice of an alien planet.

name: Dark City: Munich
summary: Dark City is HOPA game series by 4Friends Games that allows the player to take on the role of detective to solve some bizarre cases in famous cities that center around monsters. It is the second title of the Dark City series.

name: Dark Era
summary: A Game set in post-apocalyptic world where an alien virus has taken over, kill the infected ones ,Survive their attacks , clear the levels to complete the game. There are currently two game modes one is level based and another is Arcade mode.

name: Dark Stories
summary:
Dark Stories is an easy to play and fun game in which you will need to prove your skills as a detective.

Read a story to the rest of the players and just answer yes/no to their questions until they find out what happened. All the stories are fictional.

It is perfect for birthday parties, camps... and every situation in which you join several friends.

name: DayZ: Frostline
summary: Embark on an unforgiving journey in DayZ's Frostline Expansion, set within the icy Sakhal archipelago, covering 83km² of winter wilderness. Face new challenges, manage the cold, and discover the beauty and peril of Sakhal. Coming Fall 2024. Prepare to survive.

name: Dark Hunter
summary: 《Dark Hunter》 is an easy-to-play Roguelike dungeon exploration game. You will lead a team to defeat enemies in the dungeon. You can switch characters at any time during combat, and with random buffs, each exploration promises a unique gaming experience.

name: Dark Queen of Samobor
summary: Embark on a journey inspired by Slavic mythology and Croatian folklore in this 2.5D action-adventure game inspired by the likes of Song of Iron, Prince of Persia, Inside and Limbo.

name: Dadish Collection
summary:
Three rad games in one!

He's a dad AND a radish! Join Dadish on his quest to rescue his missing kids in three classic platforming adventures. Dadish Collection combines Dadish, Dadish 2 and Dadish 3 in one rad package.

name: Dawn of Survivor
summary: A third-person survivor roguelike game where waves of zombies come at you. By killing them, you get random opportunities to acquire equipment, weapons, and new skills. You can have up to 8 skills, giving you immense power. Come and see how far you can go!

name: Damn Dog
summary: Guess what WikiHow article an illustration belongs to

name: Daemon Bride: Additional Gain
summary: Daemon Bride: Additional Gain is an updated version of the 2009 Examu game, Daemon Bride, a game about people that have made contracts with demons or angels. The game features some of the traditional angel/demon contractor staples, such as a boy with a succubus and alluring female with a magic snake, but also some more oddball and unorthodox characters, like a gang member with an angry squid attached to his arm, and a dog with a bird form of Satan that follows him around. The cast is very balanced and a lot of fun to play with given their unique designs, tools, and play styles.

name: Daydream Mosaics 5: Crimson Veil
summary: Rejoin Juliette and her companions in their quest to find Raven. Solve intricate nonograms, unlock mini-games, rebuild ancient sanctuaries, and lift the sinister curse that has befallen the Crimson World.

name: Darkside Adventures: A Game with a Kitty 2
summary: The arch-chancellor's vacation turns into a nightmarish metroidvania adventure.

name: Daemonologie
summary: A remake of the short folk horror story about the Scottish witch trials in Unreal Engine 5. You play the role of a witchfinder. Speak to the locals and sort their truths from their lies. On the last morning a witch must hang, best you know who by then.

name: Danny Phantom: Ghost Sweep
summary: Explore two huge 3-D levels in this frightfully fun adventure! New "toon-shaded" graphics! Be stealthy--sneak up on ghosts! Go to Phantom mode when attacked!

name: Days of Night: Episode 1
summary:
You're freshly 18 and seeking experience in the work force. You struggle to find work until one day the opportunity of a life time would come your way.

Little to you're knowledge you would be stepping in a world of HORROR!

Experience the HORRORS of working night shift at you're local grocery store.

name: Dark Survival
summary:
Survive from the swarming monsters!
Welcome to 'Dark Survival,' a vampire survival game where a hefty knight battles monsters emerging from the dark. Level up by defeating monsters, choose a variety of skills, and survive as long as possible!

name: Dark Scythe
summary: Dark Scythe is an April Fool's project where mappers were tasked with making a Dead Simple knock-off that's beatable. Apologies to anyone thinking this has anything to do with Scythe.

name: Dark Wraith
summary: Dark Wraith is a first-person grid-based dungeon crawler game, similar to Wizardry or The Bard's Tale. The main character is Zion, a magic user that finds out that a friendly town-person's daughter has been kidnapped by the Dark Wraith as part of a periodic ritual sacrifice. Up to four other characters can accompany Zion as he searches various dungeons in search of the Dark Wraith. As with many Japanese dungeon crawlers, characters are not created by the player. Rather, they are met throughout the story. However, upon leveling up, the player gets to assign points to various skills and attributes. The game features turn-based combat with enemies appearing within the dungeon, similar to Might and Magic games.

name: Dark Legacy
summary: Dark Legacy is a 2d Pixel Art Jump and Run Game! It will be available in the Google Play Store from October 20th, 2024 and it is a mobile game!

name: Dave the Diver: Potion Craft
summary: Dave the Diver: Balatro is a DLC that adds content themed around the management simulation game Potion Craft.

name: Dave the Diver: Balatro
summary: Dave the Diver: Balatro is a DLC that adds content themed around the poker-themed roguelike deck-building game Balatro.

name: Dave the Diver: Mxmtoon
summary: Dave the Diver: Mxmtoon is a DLC that adds content themed around the American singer-songwriter and YouTuber mxmtoon.

name: Dark Communion
summary: Two teenage girls. One abandoned church. ??? survivors.

name: DanceDanceRevolution Kids
summary: In December 2000, Konami released Dance Dance Revolution KIDS, which had a new cabinet and game specifically made for a younger audience. The game was never released outside of Japan. Today, very few of these cabinets are left.

name: Dance Maniax 2ndMIX append JPARADISE
summary: This was the first and only append game in the Dance Maniax series, and the last game in the series altogether.

name: Dance 86.4 Funky Radio Station
summary:
DANCE 86.4 FUNKY RADIO STATION is part of the BEMANI line of arcade music video games. Like the DanceDanceRevolution series, it's a dance simulation game, although it's aimed at younger players. The title is read as "DANCE Yaroyo", which means "Let's DANCE".

DANCE 86.4 has only three foot panels, which are lined up horizontally, and it supports up to two players.

name: Dark Seraphim
summary: Dark Seraphim is an action role-playing game released for the PC-98 in Japan in 1995. The game is based on Christian mythology and you play as Alucard, a seraphim who was sent down to hell.

name: Daisy's Crazy Adventure
summary:
Daisy's Crazy Adventure is a choco-nilla hack with standard - normal difficulty.

The hack is loosely inspired by Super Mario Land.

name: Date with Modeus
summary:
Let me ask you this:
"Do you want to have a lovely date with Modeus? "
Well... In this silly little Visual Novel game, You can do just that :D

name: Dagger Froggy
summary: Dagger Froggy is a small action Roguelike, Where you face hordes of enemies... Cute? With each round you get stronger, But so do the cute creatures. >:)

name: Day at the Office: Prologue
summary: Try to escape from the office, make your decisions carefully, and keep your cool to get home safe and sound... Do you hear that...? The phone is ringing, and it's for you.

name: DanLab's Golf
summary: The most extravagant 3D golf game of the moment!

name: Danger Cliff 2
summary: Danger Cliff 2 is a very open-ended 2D Platformer inspired by Super Mario 63. Run, jump, and drill through huge, interconnected levels with wild themes, unique mechanics, and branching paths. Between being able to hunt down whatever collectibles you want, taking advantage of deep movement mechanics, and three playable characters to choose from, you decide how you tackle this adventure!

name: Darkflow
summary: Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG that chronicles an epic, universe-spanning saga. Fight your way up from the slums to battle rival alien factions, take down cybernetically enhanced enemies, and discover the hidden powers pulling the strings.

name: Darkest Mine
summary: Darkest Mine is a roguelite action-plateformer with built-in co-op. Fight your way through monster-filled shadowy caves, take your pick from a large panel of abilities and weapons, adapt your choices, and create unique expeditions!

name: Dance Break Dance
summary: In Dance Break Dance, it's all about quick reflexes and perfect timing. Spin the crank to make your adorable dancer bust out wild moves, but be sure to stop in time! The faster you crank, the crazier the dance, and the more points you score. Can you keep up with the rhythm and become the cutest dance master?

name: Dark Light: Survivor
summary: In a dying multiverse, the Phantom Train is your last hope. Traverse a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world of nightmarish creatures. Experience dynamic shifts between top-down and third-person views, deep customization, and epic battles across universes in this action roguelike survival game.

name: Dashy Crashy 100
summary: Start your engines and outrun 99 racers in a thrilling knockout race. 100 start. Only 1 survives. Lightning-fast reaction-racing with a 100-racer twist. Party up with friends, master simple tap controls and test your reflexes on choas-filled highways as you try to boost and bash your way to 1st place. Let's DASHY CRASHY!

name: Daisuki: The Her Adonis
summary:
You are the class president.
You are a human being with a strong sense of justice.
While investigating the case of a missing classmate, you came across a girl.
You are going to visit her house to talk to the girl.

name: Dark Souls III: Born From the Ashes
summary: Mod aims is to make game significantly harder by adding a lot of enemies around the dark souls world, providing more build possibilities and balancing NG+7, new weapons and armors with brand new powerful skills and passives, better HUD and many more.

name: Dark Dynasty: The Siege of Londor
summary:
Take control of an ancient warrior from the era of the Three Kingdoms and lead your armies, the dragons, the Abyss Watchers, and the Outrider Knights against the forces of Londor. Join the Shu or Wei dynasty in a conquest for land. Or, take Londor for yourself by joining swords with the Mercenaries. Lore and story is a new twisted end to the Souls series.

This mod is an overhaul of most things in the game. Completely changes the way you play the game with super poise and sweeping attacks. Game progresses in a completely new storyline and map layout. You are an ancient hero, and it's about time you acted the part. You will face a new kind of challenge, unlike any seen in the Souls series. Strategize, and use the new spells and abilities to unleash chaos unto your enemies.

Quick romp through the world of DS3. Utilizing underused areas of the game. Play with your current character if you like, you will only miss the firelink shrine lead up. Armour resistances are much more important in this game. Upgrading the new weapons is integral. Leveling helps a lot more due to weapon scaling. Don't forget: you can retreat from a battle to upgrade.

name: Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight.
summary:
The scenario for Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight. is written by Momono Zappa, who won the 67th Edogawa Ranpo Award for the novel Roukou Zanmu. Character designs, CGs, and original images are handled by U35, who drafted the character designs for the TV anime The Aquatope on White.

An authentic world of mystery depicted by Momono Zappa with transparent characters illustrated by U35 come together in this new visual novel!

Additionally, the theme song is sung by Kanako Itou, who is known for her work on the theme songs for Higurashi When They Cry: Kizuna and STEINS;GATE. With its mysterious vibe and fast pace, paired with Kanako Itou’s vocals, the song is a key constructor of the game’s atmosphere.

name: Dai-chan's Great Adventure: World's End
summary:
Circle Frustration's First!
3D action game!
Run around with Nitori!

name: Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2024
summary: A minimalist golf game that will test your patience.

name: Dazed In Space
summary:
It's the year 1989 and the best evening of the year, Halloween! Three kids go trick or treating in the neighborhood but things take a very strange turn and they end up in a great adventure.

Dazed In Space is an adventure game but with an old school JRPG presentation where the focus is on story and simple puzzle solving.

name: Dark Light
summary: Mio is a young girl surrounded by death, and after an unexpected accident, she finds out where people go after they die. Maybe Heaven, or Hell...or an Underworld full of demons and mysteries.

name: Days In Palis
summary: Days in Palis is an immersive visual novel set in the fictional metropolis of "Palis." Players will experience passionate love stories and complex relationships centered around three female protagonists. By unlocking the plot, you'll gain a deeper understanding of their inner worlds.

name: Darkly Glass
summary: Trade your soul for digital fame in this psychological visual novel. As fallen tech mogul Doran White, navigate a treacherous social media landscape. Your choices shape his fate in this hand-drawn, neuroscience-inspired reimagining of Oscar Wilde's classic.

name: Dagon: Complete Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in the twisted world of H.P. Lovecraft and unearth the horrors that lie within.

name: Daburali
summary: ”Double Lariat” Action GAME Blow away various enemies Wrench-chan's show starts now!

name: Dance Eden
summary: This is a multiplayer XR dance game . Immerse yourself in the music and the joy of dancing, all while getting a great workout. Additionally, you can explore a wide range of stylish outfits and personalized makeup options, and engage in real-time social interactions with others. Let's dance together, live together!

name: Damper/Glooper
summary:
Damper/Glooper is a double games pack that contains the following:

Damper: A city in the jungle is losing it's power due to Leeches on the grid. In this maze game you must move along the grid and damp the dotted lines which turns them solid. As you move around the grid, Leeches also move about and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives.

Glooper: A Pac-Man clone where you have to move about a maze to eat all the dots while avoiding three creatures moving about the maze. If you touch a creature then you lose one of three lives but there are power-pills that can be collected and this allows you to eat the creatures for a short time.

name: Day of the Bobteds
summary: Ball physics game submitted as an entry to Casual Gameplay Design Competition (CGDC) 4 on jayisgames.com

name: Dashpunch
summary: After the Tyrant Hand is stolen by a mysterious figure, an ancient being awakens to return it to its rightful place before it's too late. Dash and Punch your way through corrupted dungeons that fall apart at the seams, meet colorful characters, battle powerful bosses and carve your legacy!

name: Darkgate
summary:
A long time ago, a battle ensued between God and the Demon Lord.
To resist the powerful Demon Lord, God created a human.
Sacrificing his own body to seal the Demon Lord, God assigned the role of guarding that seal to the chosen one.

name: Dawn
summary: WITNESS THE DAWN! A new horror stirs in The American West. It isn’t an ordinary night. The storm outside was just the start. The wind. The rain. An omen of things to come. Attempt to escape and survive the horror as one of two characters, solo, or together with a friend.

name: Dai-chan's Great Adventure: World's End
summary:
Flowing rivers, rushing waterfalls, unexplored towering trees...
Nitori's adventure begins here and now!

name: Damsel: Chapter 1 - Stress on the Tress
Daibouken: Yarinaosu
summary: Daibouken: Yarinaosu is an Action Adventure RPG where players explore vibrant worlds, solve puzzles, clear dungeons, and battle foes within a mysterious time loop. Join Aurora as she navigates a fate intertwined with gods and time itself.

name: Dark Light
summary: Dark Light is a pixel art platformer adventure inspired by NES games of the 80s and 90s. You play as John, who is awakened from a peaceful sleep when a lightning strike shatters the silence of the night. As he looks out the window, he witnesses terrifying monsters emerging from the darkness. Armed with improvised tools and driven by curiosity, John embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the source of this strange anomaly and face the growing threats.

name: Dark Blue Dungeon
summary: Dark Blue Dungeon is an adventure game inspired by D&D-style role-playing games

name: Dark Tank
summary: Multiplayer online catapult game in the style of Warcraft. The game's combat scenarios are rich and varied, and players can use terrain and power-ups to fight and use a variety of unique weapons and skills to defeat their opponents.

name: Days Gone: Challenge Mode
summary: Challenge Mode is a post-launch addition that introduced tweleve challenges focused on combat, survival, and bike skills. Each challenge has unique objectives, requiring players to fend off waves of Freakers, defeat human enemies, or complete bike stunts within specific constraints. Completing challenges awards players with patches, rings, and other rewards that grant gameplay boosts, which can be used in both the Challenge Mode and the main game.

name: Dawn of Fear
summary: Experience an intense survival horror journey as an investigative agent in a dark and cursed village. The quest for a leader has never been so hindered.

name: Dahlia
summary:
Dahlia is a very short sapphic visual novel made in under 36 hours for the Velox Formido game jam, a jam for shortform visual novels. survive being trapped with a lovely little vampire, or don't.

This game is 2.3k words long and has 3 endings. It's playable in English and French.

name: Danball Senki
summary:
Originally released in 2011 for Playstation Portable, Denball senki became more popular and known in the west later in 2015 as "LBX: Little Battlers eXperience".
The original version of the game was announced and planned before the manga and anime adaptations, which came out slightly before the game release.

name: Danchi Days
summary: Laugh, cry, and feel awe in this cute adventure game about inviting characters to a Japanese summer festival! Surf the internet to learn their quirks and desires, then use your senses to uncover the unseen wonders of a Y2K, GBA-inspired world.

name: Dangerous World 2
summary:
Sequel of Dangerous World and events of the HL2: Episode Two. We'll see how Frank Harrison deals with it.

Although, DW2 full version was scheduled to be released in 2011, only a playable demo version was released on October 2010, which contains two maps for DW 2. Players were advised to observe their vicinity carefully - sometimes even a small detail can show them the right direction or tell them what to do.

name: Damashi Game
summary: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.

name: Danger, Bob-omb! Danger!: Handle with Care
Data Doesn't Lie
summary: You study samples under your microscraper. You extract the data. Then -- and only then -- you sleep.

name: Dawn of the Tiberium Age
summary: Dawn of the Tiberium Age (DTA) is a stand-alone mod that combines and enhances Tiberian Dawn and Red Alert using a heavily customized Tiberian Sun engine. Featuring all 4 factions (GDI, Nod, Allies and Soviets) with extremely polished gameplay, DTA allows you to mix and match the factions as you'd like in tons of new multiplayer maps and challenge yourself in dozens of original missions.

name: Dawn of Decay
summary: Dawn of Decay is a 3D low poly multiplayer zombie survival game where players team up to navigate immersive maps, fend off relentless zombie waves, and rely on strategic gameplay to survive.

name: Davie's Quest and The Magic Dress
Dark Farm
summary: Fantasy PvPvE RPG in Norse Mythology Conquer key positions and collect weapons on the battlefield. Use tactics and gear to battle gods, monsters, and other players. Survive, win, and escape the warzone.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Robots by datGestruepp
summary: Get 20 beautifull traditionally hand drawn Robot paintings from datGestruepp to puzzle.

name: Davy's Dreams of Chasing Things
summary: Created for LSDJAM 2020. "Davy's Dreams of Chasing Things" is a game poem about anxiety dreams.

name: Dark Witch Music Episode: Rudymical
summary: The popular minigame "Rudymical" from Dark Witch Story 2 has been renewed and now can be played on your mobile devices!

name: Dark Trip
summary:
Dark Trip is a psychedelic VR escape room where the hero is forced to use drugs investigating a sadomasochistic lab.

The game of Escape Room genre features Lavcraftian setting, Psychedelic Trips gameplay mechanics and the goals to collect and investigate evidences. Some event in the game are inspired by David Lynch's and Terry Gilliam's movies.

- Experiences Psychedelic Trips. Use VR to immerse yourself into psychedelic experiences not possible on any other gaming platform.

- Investigate the Sadomasochistic Laboratory. Solve twisted riddles in surrealistic setting of physical and mental torture.

- Collect the Pieces of Horrible Truth. Search for clues, artifacts and diary pieces in each location to discover the dark story behind the events.

name: Daedalic Turn-Based Bundle
summary: This bundle contains three turn-based games for you to plan and execute your perfect strategies!

name: Dating Killmulator
summary: Step into a world where dating goes beyond your typical choices. In this game, you’ll find yourself navigating a twisted, darkly humorous universe filled with popular guys, nice guys, and serial killers. This isn't your standard dating game; it’s a wild parody that plays with every dating sim trope, flipping it on its head.

name: Dalafri
summary: This title is a physics-based 3D sword fighting game. Players take on the role of a slightly flexible warrior and aim to become a champion in the arena.

name: Daycare Dungeon
summary: Dungeon Crawler is an upcoming roguelite, hack n' slash, platformer puzzle game. Makhoba discusses how Dungeon Crawler's imagination mechanic works, the inspiration behind the game's creation, and more.

name: Data East Arcade 2
summary: Data East Arcade 2 brings players 12 more all-action arcade classics from Data East’s extensive back catalogue. Includes the cinematic action of Edward Randy, the prehistoric platforming of Joe & Mac Returns, the offbeat craziness of Trio The Punch: Never Forget Me… and many more!

name: Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story
summary: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! Strict big sis Keika wants to set a good example by exorcising evil with her priestess powers...

name: Darkbound
summary: Darkbound is a survival horror game where you play as a cat. Avoid the darkness, solve puzzles and help other survivors to escape the hospital.

name: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle
summary: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle is a DLC expansion for Dave the Diver. It introduces a new jungle-themed environment where players can explore for exotic resources and face additional challenges, all while continuing to balance underwater exploration with restaurant management.

name: Darby is Here Forever
summary: Help our little vampire Darby getting out from his eternal prison. Log on into a difficult 2D pixel platformer, find out secret rooms, defeat great bosses and end up discovering why Darby has been imprisoned in his own castle!

name: Darso Roads
summary: A racing game shrouded in mystery was developed for Playstation in 1996, remained unreleased and unfinished, with speculation suggesting its cancellation was due to its eerie basis on a real-life event, marked by the chilling disappearance of one of the competitors.

name: Days of Saturn
summary:
There are sixteen days left until the Days of Saturn. Work hard, acolyte, and you may be chosen to be the Servant of the Mistress during the festivities.

A slightly creepy fantasy visual novel / stat-raising game. Made in four days for Velox Turbo 2.

name: Date Banger
summary: Date Banger is an exhilarating 3D adult dating game where you meet stunning girls by swiping through videos. Engage in rhythm games and fun activities to charm and win over a variety of beautiful girls. Dive into a world of pleasure, unforgettable moments.

name: Date Tseries
summary: You've been called by PewDiePie to take the last stand against TSeries who will take over Youtube in 30 days.

name: D.A.R: Deadly Alien Rogues
summary: DAR is an arcade-style single-screen shoot-em-up inspired by the classics, with some modern rogue-like twists! Pick your character, plot a course through the galaxy, grab upgrades and destroy the enemy! The ultimate goal? Saving the galaxy! Or just getting a really, really high score - your call.

name: Dark Tap RPG
summary:
Embark on an epic journey into the depths of a thrilling dark RPG adventure where heroes are born from the shadows.

"Why are you drawn to darkness over light? Your subconscious has been calling you. Deep within lies your inner hero, once shunned as a demon, waiting to be awakened."

Dive into the darkness and unleash the power of your hidden shadows, leaving behind the pretenders and embracing your destiny as a true hero.

name: Dangerous Line
summary: You are a hero who faces waves of enemies who are trying to get into your kingdom and seize power in it.

name: Dataclysm
summary: Embark on a journey into the heart of a digital kingdom unlike any other. Dataclysm invites you to explore a world where ancient data comes alive, and every line of code tells a story waiting to be unraveled.

name: Da Vinci's Legacy
summary: You are Alessia, Leonardo Da Vinci's new student. Something strange and bad has happened in the palace. A mystery to discover. Your life and that of your teacher is in danger, it is up to you to find a solution. A first-person adventure with many options, inventory for items and paths.

name: Darts Fever
summary: Step Up to the toe line!

name: Dad's Last Fishing Trip
summary: Listen to a man reminisce about past fishing trips with his Dad while fishing at his favourite pond.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Inhuman Bondage
summary: Plunge your stagecoach into the long-forgotten Catacombs beneath the Kingdom and face a corrosive, oozing threat! Uncover powerful items in this new mini-region, and gain access to The Abomination, a fearsome new playable hero with unique battle mechanics.

name: Dating Sim
summary: You play as a guy who is conflicted between fantasy and reality, and tries to get a girlfriend. There are three girls and three endings. Who will you end up with?

name: Dating Sim! Re:Mastered
summary:
After a particularly rough night, the protagonist of Dating Sim crawls into bed to forget his loneliness as yet another day of him being single passes by. When he awakens, the protagonist discovers that it’s actually May 30, 2020, twelve years after his nap!

What’s more, the protagonist finds that he’s still in college and still hasn’t found a girlfriend. While usually a successful student, the protagonist is now struggling to maintain his grades and his luck with the ladies hasn’t improved one bit.

Polishing up his grades may be hard but with your help, finding a girlfriend may not be! Can the protagonist win over his dream girl with this new chance he’s been given?

name: Dating Sim! Luna's Lovely Summer
summary:
Despite getting friend-zoned by Luna in Dating Sim! Re:Mastered, the protagonist decides that he should be “just friends” with her at first. It’s still a win for him, as Luna is among the top students in college and is willing to tutor him for his summer classes. His grades are already terrible and they could really use a boost from her. Not only that, but since Luna’s such a sex freak he feels that she could eventually become his girlfriend. The protagonist thinks it’s all gonna work out – he’ll graduate, AND he’ll finally have a girlfriend!

…Not so fast, though!

The protagonist finds himself having to put up with Luna’s unpredictable antics. She tends to postpone study sessions with him because if she’s not completely drunk, then she’s busy with her cybersex sessions! It’s summer, and Luna just wants to have fun before the next semester starts. Even though he’s tempted to join in with her craziness and lose his virginity to her, the protagonist’s studies come first. He begins to doubt if Luna really is at the top of her class…

With your help, can the protagonist improve his grades over the summer…and finally earn himself a girlfriend?

name: Danger Horizon
summary: Danger Horizon is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using Unreal Engine 5. The game features realistic gunplay, and advanced blood and gore features that everyone can enjoy.

name: Dagga
summary:
Dagga is a 2D MMORPG. Live a great adventure in a magical and enchanting world.​ Discover its secrets and hidden treasures. Become the greatest of adventurers!
Play as one of the many character classes. Each of them has unique spells and specialities, which evolve according to the way you play.

name: Dark War: Survival
summary:
Gear up and brace yourself for the ultimate test of zombie apocalypse survival! Dive into thrilling gameplay and uncover captivating events that await your exploration!

As a sudden and catastrophic zombie virus ravages human society, your once cozy life is shattered. Family and friends turn into the walking dead before your very eyes. Escaping the chaos of your crumbling home, you now face the ultimate challenge: setting up a shelter to survive the zombie apocalyptic world, and reigniting the flames of human civilization.

Can you successfully adapt to the hostile environment teeming with dangers, and lead your fellow survivors in rebuilding civilization? It's time for you to step up!

name: Darth Vader Tamagotchi
summary: The third Star Wars themed Tamagotchi.

name: Dance Dance Revolution: Dear Daniel
summary: Dance Dance Revolution: Dear Daniel is a Bemani Pocket Hello Kitty/Dance Dance Revolution game based on the character of Dear Daniel.

name: Dance Mania
summary: Get your dance team together and let the partying begin!

name: Dangerous Curves
summary: Arcade racing game punished and developed by Taito.

name: Day Zero
summary: Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is a text-based survival game where choices determine fate and ethical and moral decisions matter. Every choice shapes the story. Are you ready to test your limits in a zombie apocalypse?

name: Dancing Pandas: Ranger's Path
summary: Calling all animal lovers! Become the ranger for Summery Islands! Find courage by helping other Pandas. Dancing Pandas: a cozy adventure where bravery blooms beyond your comfort zone.

name: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday
summary: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday is a DLC that adds content themed around the Like a Dragon franchise.

name: Darwin's Paradox!
summary: Dive into the adventure with Darwin, an octopus as endearing as he is ingenious, torn from the ocean and trapped in a vast and mysterious industrial complex. Harness his unique talents and abilities to help him overcome the many dangers and traps in this captivating platformer and adventure game.

name: Days Gone Remastered
summary:
Ride into a desperate, dog-eat-dog world in the definitive Days Gone experience, remastered for the PlayStation5 console.

Fight to survive an environment ravaged by a deadly pandemic as former outlaw biker, Deacon St. John. Risk the threats of the Broken Road on the back of your trusty Drifter bike as you face terrifying hordes of relentless feral Freakers – as well as dangerous gangs of humans.

name: Days Gone: Broken Road
summary: Days Gone – Broken Road DLC is an expansion to Days Gone, an open-world action-adventure game set in a harsh wilderness two years after a devastating global pandemic. Days Gone – Broken Road DLC features all new content and features that will enhance your Days Gone experience as you fight for tomorrow in this brutal relentless world.

name: Dark Elven Legacy
summary: You are Elynar, the strongest archer in the Kingdom, who must face terrible creatures in the Great Dark Forest. Shoot with your bow, use a special power, or obtain power-ups during the game to fight various types of enemies.

name: Dark Age Asunder
summary:
Bullet Heaven Survivor meets Kingdom Builder/Tower Defense

Your village has been burned to the ground
by the evil king and his sorcerer.

Collect resources to rebuild your village.

Build structures to gain abilities and take vengeance on the king and his hordes!

name: Darkend
summary:
Travel to the new island of Pharos, explore detailed environments, fight new enemies and discover an Ancient set of weapons of incredible power.
No quest, no holding hand, heavily inspired by The Demon's/Dark Souls games.

name: Daniel's Jetpack Flight
summary: Jet Hero Daniel is dash up for a crazy jetpack ride in white vans. Damn, Daniel!

name: DayZ: Cool Edition
summary: The DayZ Cool Edition bundle features DayZ with the Livonia map, as well DayZ Frostline. Explore the dense and deadly Livonia. Brave the wintry terrain in the volcanic archipelago of Sakhal. Battle the infected and survivors who are hungrier and more desperate than you.

name: Dating Stories
summary: Dating Stories combines the fun of solving jigsaw puzzles with the spicy excitement of romantic interactions with the sexiest women you can imagine. Piece together well-drawn images of your accidental dates to unlock seductive conversations and deepen your connections. Every choice you make in dialogues shapes your relationships, leading to a tempting ending. With gorgeous artwork and steamy, suggestive content, Dating Stories gives an experience for those seeking both charm and challenge.

name: Darkest Days
summary: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play

name: Dashing Dasher
summary: Dash through the city in your Dashing outfit, get to your goal. Become the ultimate Dasher

name: Dare to Lucid Dream
summary: For the first time in years, Sonny meets a person he knows inside of his lucid dreams and, to his surprise, Sonny discovers that what he says and does in his dreams directly affects the people he dreamed about.

name: Dark Passion: Anime Match Puzzles
summary: Discover Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! Match tiles to reveal stunning anime art and immerse yourself in mystery.

name: Danger Dash
summary:
Are you a real adventurer?

Push your speed to the limit! Run & escape from evil tigers in exotic settings like the jungle, a lost city or a mysterious temple!

name: Dark Horizons: Lore
summary: Set in the year 2155, the game is an online first-person shooter in which players do battle with each other using cybernetically controlled mechs.

name: Damn Daniel Challenge
summary: Play as Damn Daniel, collect gems and run through each stage!

name: Dancing Cats
summary: In Dancing Cats, you can enjoy super amazing and beautiful ""Cat Music""——a mix of cute ""meowing"" sound and pop music. You can experience wonderful feelings beyond your imagination with a perfect blend of beat and music. You can also experience various song styles including both global hit songs and your favorite independent music.

name: Dash N Slash
summary: Evade! Killing! This is a 2.5D, Soulslike, Roguelike, slaying and racing game. During the parkour process on a challenging map, observe the monster's position and instantly plan the shortest slaying path to reach higher rankings and challenge the fastest speed!

name: Dagger Woods VR
summary: Dagger Woods VR is inspired by true stories and local legends, offering players a psychological thriller experience that combines puzzle-solving, clue-finding, mystery, and adventure. Step into the shoes of Maggie Carmichael to find the truth behind the darkness within the snow-covered woods.

name: Dana Cipher: Dead Man's Hand
summary: Dive into a high-stakes investigation in Vincent Marconi Mystery, a hidden object game where you uncover secrets, solve puzzles, and track a cunning killer in a glitzy casino.

name: DAWN: Darkness Awaits Withstand the Night
summary: D.A.W.N: Darkness Awaits Withstand the Night is a fast-paced survival game where players face off against a relentless, evolving threat of zombies and reanimated former teammates in an open-ended simulation.

name: Danganronpa: Antebellum
summary: This Fanganronpa is cancelled, and now has a reboot called Danganronpa Antebellum: Lockdown

name: Danganronpa: Antebellum - Lockdown
summary:
Danganronpa Antebellum: LOCKDOWN is an interactive remake/reimagining of the original Antebellum that attempts to create a more cohesive, thematic and better written experience. It will take the form of a playable Danganronpa Fangame developed in RPGMAKER with the prologue currently in development, if Lockdown is received well then more parts to it will be created- if not, development of the original game will resume!

Alongside completely refreshing the characters and story, the game improves previous daily life and deadly life mechanics to create more enriching experience. Additionally a major part of Danganronpa Antebellum: LOCKDOWN is its Audience Interaction!

Throughout the various releases of the game individual character's crimes will be revealed, post these releases the community will be able to vote on if they believe the character is worthy of Redemption or if they're completely Corrupt! What the majority votes will impact the characters and story going forward so vote wisely!

name: Dark Dungeon Feminized
summary: This FPS game has dark and beautiful art style. A tragic accident turns the strict laboratory into a dark dungeon. You are trying to escape from here with wisdom and strategy, and discover its unknown dark secrets.（Has Customizable female villain with costume damage）

name: Daily Driven Racer
summary: DDR is about racing everyday cars, or sleeper cars, on unique tracks, each offering a fresh experience. Enjoy various game modes in Single Player and Split Screen. The Simcade driving style ensures fun for both casual and hardcore players. Play with 2-4 players in local split-screen for maximum fun!

name: Dan Laser
summary: Dan Laser is an Action game, developed and published by Sachen.

name: Dark Castle
summary: This is the remake of the first Dark Castle for legacy cell phones, featuring color graphics, levels are a mix between Dark Castle and Beyond Dark Castle as well as scaled down difficulty.

name: Dark Receipt
summary: Dark Receipt is a short, intense psychological horror game featuring retro visual styles…

name: Dark Things
summary: Avoid being a cog in the machine. Move yourself from left to right to collect orbs of light and avoid the dark things.

name: David: Dawn of a King
summary: Help David find the Lost Sheep and avoid the rampaging wild animals

name: Days of the Dead
summary: Play Days of The Dead, online killing games on free bloody games, fun kill full blood, Play days of the dead game, survival of the living dead curse for 13 days againts armored zombies, skeleton and undead beast invasion. Use your bow skill, spells, items and barricade to defend your village

name: Danganronpa Minus
summary: A Korean Danganronpa fangame

name: Dawn: Instagram Model
summary: A short story of an Instagram model.

name: Dark Mass
summary: Dark Mass is a fully underwater horror game. Explore the ruins of a sunken manor and flee from a curse trapped within for centuries. Your choices will decide if you escape or join the lost souls of the abyss.

name: Date Nite
summary: Follow the protagonist as they prepare the perfect date night for their partner. Tackle challenges, meet strange characters, and encounter surprises on their journey to express their love. <3

name: Daisy's Garden
summary: Daisy's Garden is a platformer from the DOS era. You play as Daisy and need to pick all fruits and flowers in your garden. But watch out for the enemies on your way.

name: Danger and Deadlier
summary: Danger and Deadlier is a hardcore medieval fantasy dungeon adventure game. Join intense 6v6v6 battles with different classes. Dungeon-style exploration lets you find valuable treasures. What are you waiting for? Join this gold rush now!"

name: Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts
summary: Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts is a now cancelled cancelled Danganronpa fangame. The game had a prologue, one fully released chapter, and half of a second chapter prior to its cancellation.

name: Dachs Hunter
summary: Dachs Hunter is a survivors-like top-down roguelite game where you play as a dachshund wizard battling through hordes of elemental monsters. Discover and collect unique spells, master all elements, and strategize your way to survival.

name: Davy Jones' Deckhand
summary: Unleash outrageous counter-attack chains in this swashbuckling adventure where every voyage is a brutal roguelike deckbuilder. Will you break free from Davy Jones’ Locker?

name: Dark City: Amsterdam - Collector's Edition
summary: Amsterdam is in trouble and only you can help! Get ready to tackle one of the biggest cases of Agatha’s investigative career, when the legendary ghost ship The Flying Dutchman returns to Amsterdam, bringing a crew of ghost sailors that stalk the streets, sowing terror and seeking revenge! However, there are some that don’t believe the tall tales, so Agatha is enlisted to start an independent investigation into these so-called ghosts. Do these salty spirits really hold water, or will the legend prove to be all dried up? There’s only one way to find out! Dive into another haunting mystery in this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Danielle's Plant Game
summary: In this Cozy-style take on a Clicker game, you must grow, harvest, combine, propagate, and sell Danielle's plants to build enough money to save the garden. $100 is all it takes, can you find the best combination of seeds and potions to make it?

name: Dark Castle
summary: C64 port consists of changed graphics due to hardware, lack of music during gameplay

name: Dark Castle
summary: The Amiga, Atari ST, and Apple IIgs ports features colored graphics. The differences between the three are minor color palette changes; the Apple IIgs is the closest to the original game.

name: Dark Castle
summary: The Genesis port of Dark Castle features colored graphics, and music during gameplay.

name: Dark Castle
summary: The DOS port features although limited color graphics, and the use of PC speakers for sound.

name: Dark Castle
summary: The Phillips CD-i port features colored graphics and cd quality music of the intro which loops infinitely during gameplay.

name: DanganRonpa: It's Showtime!
summary: Danganronpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! is an in-progress English fan game created by American developer AquariusBat. The game currently contains a prologue and three completed chapters.

name: Danganronpa Z: Patient Madness Cropper
summary: A Danganronpa fangame that is set in a hospital. 15 students are trapped in a hospital with a psychotic bear named Monokuma, the only way to get out is by getting away with murder. This fangame was completed up to chapter 4 daily life, and has since been cancelled.

name: Dark Confrontation Chapter 1
summary:
Step into a world torn apart by a generations-long war between two powerful clans: the fiery Crimson Wolves and the strategic Azure Falcons. Commanding their forces are Kael, a fearsome warrior driven by loyalty and vengeance, and Lyra, a brilliant strategist determined to protect her people at all costs.

As their armies’ clash on the battlefield, Kael and Lyra are drawn into a fateful encounter that will challenge their perceptions of loyalty, honor, and even hatred itself. Their stories intertwine in ways that could shape the fate of the war—and their own lives—in ways they never anticipated.

name: Dash-Da-Dash DX2: Devil Destroyer
summary:
this game was originally designed with vertically-oriented touchscreen devices in mind. not necessarily phones specifically, but also larger touchscreen displays. over the course of working on it, a second control type was added which expands on the first - one where opposed to clicking to dash, the ship always follows the player's mouse/finger. this one proved to be really fun and twitchy.

eventually, i decided to also add a keyboard-based one more in line with regular shmups. in this one, the player fires automatically, but is required to "mine" the crystals by hitting the boss, and your crystal combo is directly linked to how powerful your fire is. it's a little weird, admittedly, but this whole thing was kind of an experiment.

Squeedge helped out by designing and realizing three awesome characters and a bunch of super cool boss designs, a little inspired by some of the pixel work Joker Jun did for Toaplan.

name: Day 178
summary:
It has been 178 days since we have been forced to confine ourselves to our homes.
I am beginning to lose track of time, seemingly trapped in an endless loop of passing days. The state has yet to release an explanation of the situation, its only public statement the mandate to remain in our homes. Fortunately, all houses are equipped with a pneumatic transport system that allows the sending and receiving of food and other necessities. The problem, as usual, is money. Only those who work remotely are still able to receive a salary. I'm not one of them. The only way that I can make a living is by selling drugs.

name: Danganronpa: Fandom's Calling
summary: Danganronpa: Fandom's Calling is a fan game made with RPG Maker MV. This is a fan game of the Danganronpa series, but it has no affiliation to the official games. The fangame was cancelled after it's prologue released.

name: Danganronpa: Salvation's Fears
summary: Danganronpa: Salvation's Fears is a developing RPG Maker MV fangan with a playable prolouge and fully completed chapter 1. DR: SF has no affiliation with SpikeChunsoft or the official Danganronpa series.

name: Dance To Heck
summary: Play as a funny little demon guy as you look out for funny little lava guys don't touch those they'll burn you silly.

name: Dark Witch Fighting Buster
summary: Introducing the Majin Shoujo Fukitou Buster Prototype for the first time in a while. It's basically a 1 vs 1 game, but this is a "Battle Royale" that can be played by up to 4 people.

name: Dairy of the Dead
summary: Embark on a cozy post-apocalyptic adventure! Join Alex and his snarky feline companion, Missus Whiskus, as they navigate the bizarre landscape of zombified suburbia in search of the ultimate treasure: MILK! Solve puzzles, engage in witty banter, and keep Whiskus happy in this comedy puzzle game.

name: Dark Assassin: Trial Chambers
summary: A quick and exciting action paced game, can you defeat the goblin lord?

name: Dark Goddess of Destruction
summary: This is a unique card battle idle game that we have crafted together with our players. We have developed an in-depth progression system and comprehensive character and monster profiles.

name: Dark Jump: Endless Ascent
summary: In this fast-paced platforming challenge, precision and skill are key. Master 10 unique characters, traverse dynamic worlds, and overcome relentless enemies.

name: Dark Moon Deities
summary: Dark Moon Deities is a deeply strategic auto battler that can be played online vs. other players or offline against bots. Go beyond the grid with forceful spells. Subjugate the Old Gods in order to make their power your own. Bring forth nascent dark moon deities by stealing fragments of their power.

name: DashFire
summary: A fast-paced arena-style shooter with an emphasis on movement, collect various weapons, and other pickups to dominate the competition in a peer-to-peer 8-person free-for-all!

name: Danganronpa: New World Order
summary: Danganronpa New World Order is a fangame created by Alpha Team based on the Danganronpa video game series. The game has a completed prolouge, 2 completed chapters, and is currently on the daily life of chapter 3.

name: Danganronpa: Hope Recration+
summary: This is a fan-made April Fools' Danganronpa game, released on April Fools' Day. This game is a side story to the previous April Fools' game.

name: Darkfallen Survivors
summary: A dark-themed Roguelike survivor game where you must withstand relentless waves of enemies, craft powerful skill builds, unlock new survivors, and take on dark bosses. Claim sacred artifacts and experience an unparalleled thrill of intense combat and ultimate destruction!

name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
summary: Follow a dance instructor's moves in virtual reality, and do battle by popping bubbles.

name: Darkheart: Flight of the Harpies - Collector's Edition
Daisenryaku
summary: Daisenryaku ( 大戦略 ) is a turn-based military strategy game developed by System Soft and published by Hiro for the Game Boy on June 12, 1991.

name: Daikoukai Jidai Gaiden
summary:
Daikoukai Jidai Gaiden is a Strategy game, developed and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1997.

Uncharted Waters is a popular Japanese video game series produced by Koei as part of its rekoeition games. In East Asia, the series has a large cult following, but has not received much recognition outside East Asia. The series has been compared to Sid Meier's Pirates! in gameplay and theme. It is a simulation and CRPG series dealing with sailing and trading.

Daikoukai Jidai Gaiden is a side story released in 1997 on PlayStation and Sega Saturn after New Horizons, the game uses the same engine and focuses on the story of two characters instead, further expounding upon the loose plot that ties the series together.

name: Daddy's Long Milk Run
summary: You are a father on a quest for 8 milk cartons. Observe your surroundings carefully to pick up and check out your milk before returning to your family at last.

name: Davis Haunted House
summary: Davis Haunted House is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a haunted house that was built during the 1970s, haunted by demons and other evil spirits.

name: Danganronpa: Survivor's Guilt
summary: Danganronpa: Survivor's Guilt is an in-progress Fangan (a Danganronpa fan game that follows the DR formula with original cast and story) made in RPG Maker MV by Aru & Raven. It is a sequel to Danganronpa: LIVe or Die , but is a standalone game and can be played without any knowledge of the prequel. The game up to chapter 3 (of 6) is available for download.

name: Dapithapon
summary: Dapithapon is an interactive story-driven game where the player follows the story of a doctor, the new public hospital head struggling to keep the hospital in a functional state. Frazzled over the sad realities happening within the hospital, he is forced to go against his beliefs and question the integrity of his sworn oath. Solve puzzles to help the Doctor hold the hospital together in his pursuit to give its patients a better life.

name: Danganronpa: Hope Restoration
summary: Danganronpa: Hope Restoration is a fan-made Danganronpa game being created using RPG Maker MV. Completely unaffiliated with the official Danganronpa brand, games, or Spike Chunsoft.

name: Danganronpa: Gods at Gunpoint
summary: A Danganronpa fangame with a demo build of the prologue currently out. The demo build currently has many placeholder backgrounds/non-finalized dialogue which will be updated for the full version.

name: Dad Hungry!
summary: You're stuck on the island of hunger, and you need to find all the food to escape. However, you come to realize that you're not the only one who's hungry…

name: Dawn of Ages
summary:
At the dawn of medieval history, build your castle and evolve your army using real weapons and armor from ages past. March against hostile civilizations as you re-trace the steps of history. Engage your rivals and crush their empires in battle!

️No Dragons, No Magic, Not Now, Not Ever.

Dawn of Ages is a game that’s grounded in historical accuracy. No fantasy creatures, no mystical spells, just real, historical empires and war strategy games like no other. Every weapon, armor, and tactic you use is based on the reality of ancient battlefields.

name: Dash
summary: Race through a plethora of levels, customize your characters, and unlock new abilities.

name: Dark Soul.Ace 2
summary: A RPG Maker Game. Mortis Ghost said of it " it’s maybe the best game I ever worked on".

name: Day After Day
summary: Build your skillset, break your curse, and befriend or betray townspeople in this otome narrative RPG.

name: Date with a Psycho Killer Girl: A Love Story & Horror Show Series
Date with a Serial Killer: A Love Story from a Horror Show Series
summary: Twelve prisoners. One single goal: seduce you, possess you… and break you.Unless you make them fall in love with you first.

name: Date The Dude
summary: You're blessed with the power to travel through dimensions to look for your perfect boyfriend. He's smelly, he's a ginger, and he's addicted to "health pipes". You only have one chance to win him over (or multiple if you just replay the game) so make it count!

name: Dandelions and Me
summary: Dandelions and Me is a short psychological horror game about searching for your lost dog in an abandoned dungeon.

name: DanDeLion: Starchild Journey
summary: Doujin bullet hell game.

name: Darkflame Survivors
summary: A cute action rogue-lite with a focus on incremental meta progression and coop. Set in a fantasy world and played in top-down perspective.

name: Dark Origins
summary: In the dark and fractured world of Dark Origins, your adventure begins with a mysterious magical box. In Dark Origins, only the most skilled and resourceful will rise to the top. Will you dominate the chaos and become the ultimate ruler of this fractured land?

name: Dark Mine
summary: Trapped underground after a collapse, you are the sole survivor of a deadly attack. Armed only with a night vision camera, navigate the darkness, avoid the creature, and find a way out in this retro-style survival horror game.

name: Dad Left Me in the Car
summary: Survival horror game about a girl trapped in a car

name: Dark Zodiac
summary: Mystictronaut is traveling alone in search all lost constellations. His costume, boots, gun and grenade give him special abilities so he is up to the task. Hunting aliens and robots, searching for the path through this universe of planets and stars.

name: Dandelion Void
summary: Explore the jungle choked corridors of a derelict ark, adrift between the stars. Construct shelters and loot powerful artifacts from the skeletal remains of your starfaring ancestors. But never let your guard down, because the jungle is alive and hostile…

name: Date Z: Welcome to Massville High
summary: Navigate high school life in this dating sim meets mystery adventure. Date girls, uncover secrets, and prepare for a Friday Date no one fully understands. With whispers of an old virus outbreak and the past creeping into the present, every choice shapes your fate at Massville High.

name: Daily Sudoku Together
summary: A Discord activity offering daily sudoku puzzles, as well as a number of unlockable puzzles of various difficulty levels.

name: Data Drift
summary: Fight through a neon cyberpunk city action in this fast-paced top-down action game! Hack, upgrade, and battle high-tech enemies with a stylish cartoon look and an electrifying synthwave soundtrack.Indie game shooter top down cyberpunk.

name: Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors
summary: This is a top-down, auto-shooting roguelike that can be played entirely one-handed. Players take on the role of Pinocchio, fallen into a twisted dreamworld, collecting forbidden Dream Eggs that grant ever-changing offensive and survival abilities. Slaughter mutated fairy tale characters in endless nightmares!

name: DarkRanger
summary: "Dark Ranger" is a light Rogue RPG. Veterans who have retired from the human battlefield have regained their glory in the secondary battlefield against monsters.

name: Davy X Jones
summary: Ascend to the highest fathom of a pirate underworld with the infamous Davy Jones on this action-packed, revenge-driven journey. Control the captain's headless body, stay on pace with his autonomous skull and keep his legend alive.

name: DarkSwitch
summary:
The Tree provides, the Tree protects, the Tree Prevails!

Dark Switch is a vertical city builder set in the boughs of a gigantic tree. Defend your leafy home against the perils of the creeping fog by managing light and flame.

Gather resources, research technologies, and send pioneers to explore the ruins of those who came before: discover their secrets and doom.

Set in a world of folk horror and creeping dread, DarkSwitch blends vertical city-building, tower defense, and exploration into a unique strategic experience.

Navigate a stunning, dangerous, dark fantasy world enriched by cinematic cutscenes and an atmospheric soundtrack from Silent Hill composer Akira Yamaoka!

name: Dating Under the Comet
summary: Try to delay the comet impact for as many generations as you can! Spend your time and money resources wisely to find a partner and level up your skills for now and in future generations.

name: Dark Quest 4
summary: A turn based dungeon crawler where you create a party of heroes to go on epic quests.

name: Date Everything!: Lavish DLC
summary: Is 100 just simply not enough dateable objects? Are you unsatisfied with lower-priced goods? Do you literally want to fall in love with a micro-transaction?

name: Day of Drift
summary: DAY OF DRIFT is an arcade - style drifting racing game!

name: Dawn of the Abyss
summary: 《Dawn of the Abyss》 is an action adventure game based around deep sea exploration. A lone girl dives through the ocean, discovering fragments of civilization, giant creatures, and a strange pulse rising from the abyss. Despite these dangers duty urges the girl to dive deeper down.

name: Danger World
summary: Explore an epic fantasy world alongside three heroes on a quest to recover a stolen jewel. Guide your party to victory in turn-based battles, make decisions that will determine the events of the story, and uncover the ancient secrets of Eldora as you race to catch the mechanical thief.

name: Date with Devils
summary: Being the Lord of Hell is hard. One minute you're judging souls, the next you're speed-dating devils and writing love poems to angels.

name: DanceMela
summary:
Get danceMELA, India's first Multiplayer Online Dancing Game. Dance with people from all over India while enjoying the latest Bollywood hits. Create your very own character, choose what they wear right from the hairstyle to the type of shoes. Meet, greet and chat with other players using the in-game Chat tool.

danceMELA is easy to learn, fun to play and the best way to make new friends online. Get In, Get Dancing!

name: Dark Erosion: Endless Siege
summary: blends classic RPG progression with roguelike survival mechanics, drawing inspiration from iconic games like Diablo and Path of Exile. Level up, collect gems to enhance your stats, and grow stronger to face escalating challenges. The journey of redemption awaits!

name: Dad's Monster House 2: Medal
summary: Remember the dad's monster house that haunted your dreams? You're back, in a way you'd never expect! A mysterious ■■ leaves you trapped in a creepy, run-down house...

name: Danger in Pompeii
summary: Danger in Pompeii is an adventure puzzle game where you relive the city’s final day. Explore its streets, help its people, and solve the mystery of Mercury. Can you escape the eruption of Mount Vesuvius and save your friends?

name: Dark Vampires: The Shadows of Dust
summary: Dark Vampires: The Shadows of Dust is a singleplayer first-person FPS game developed by Wolfgroup and published by IncaGold

name: Days with My Lonely Teacher
summary: Study Miss Si’s routine and create "chance" encounters with her! As a student failing in all subjects and having rent and credit card bills due every week, you have to do everything you can to win over the beautiful teacher before graduation, making her leave her boyfriend and become your lover!

name: Dark Cards of Candlewood
summary: Candlewood is a solo collectible card game with the soul of a classic JRPG. Embark on replayable dungeon runs with deceptively deep, two-choice card combat. Draft items for your backpack, master chain attacks, and even crack a few card packs...then save the world from eternal darkness!

name: Dark Angels
summary: Control a shadowy, winged angel in Dark Angels as you ram through rocks, crystals, and cursed barriers, absorbing dark energy along the way. With a blend of dark fantasy and arcade action, each level challenges you to clear obstacles and harness the power of darkness.

name: Dark PGT
summary: Dark PGT – A Souls-like game in an alternate universe of future USSR on Unreal Engine 5. You will play the role of alcoholic-schizophrenic experiencing psychological disorders and hallucinations. Travel to a village in 2030 to unravel all its secrets and solve all its problems.

name: Dancing Wings: The Aerobatic Simulator
summary: Team aerobatics flight simulator - do it solo. Fly, save the replay, fly in overlay mode, save the new replay, and repeat it up to six aircrafts. Realistic aerodynamics and landscape. Step-by-step training. Share your replay online.

name: Dartmour: Tablets of the Ancients
summary: Dartmour is an open-world RPG in a vast medieval fantasy world of warring kingdoms and magic. As a wanderer in Dartmour, forge your path amid factions and mysteries. Wield unpredictable magic, sharp sword, or sharper tongue, trade or smuggle, fight mythic foes, and uncover deep lore.

name: Dark Labyrinth
summary: You have stumbled into a world shrouded in darkness, where your body has transformed into that of a strange creature. Using your ability to dispel the darkness, you must explore and learn within this mysterious realm, uncovering the truth of this world while seeking a way to return to your own.

name: Dark Fairy Tale
summary: 《Dark Fairy Tale》 is a role-playing game blending light Rogue elements, deconstructing classic fairy tales into a shattered world of dark fantasy. Build powerful characters through weapons, talents, and runes. Gradually uncover the truth and save this world corrupted by evil thoughts!

name: Dancing Bones
summary: Wild West, ancient magic, non-linear plot, puzzles and colorful characters are all waiting for you in “The Dancing Bones”! Deep drama and humor intertwine in a unique world where every choice you make changes the story. Are you ready to uncover secrets, break curses, and change your destiny?

name: Dawn Break
summary: In 2039, tsunamis of varying degrees occurred all over the world, and multiple small black holes inexplicably appeared in the sky, ruthlessly devouring the world. At first, scientists believed that this phenomenon was a common natural disaster, until one day, a test report shocked the world.

name: DarkBlood: Reverse
summary: A turn-based RPG with simple rules for building card decks, a dark fantasy with beautiful dot-drawings. Nearly 20 characters can be selected by solving various quests. Customize your fighting style and armor to suit your personality and challenge unexplored dungeons where vicious monsters lurk.

name: Date or Destiny: Kiss or Miss
summary: In Date or Destiny: Kiss or Miss, guide Kaan through his love-filled adventure. Meet different girls, make your choices, and shape the course of the story. The right decisions may lead you to a happy ending, but every wrong step brings you closer to a bitter fate.

name: Dark Investigation: Experiment
summary: Play as a private detective sent on the trail of a missing person. What seemed like a simple case quickly turns into a nightmare. Will you be the one to solve the case... or just another victim of this mystery?

name: Dashy No Buttstomp
summary: Dashy has been sent into an incomplete game dimension without her broom or powers - 'but' she's not completely unarmed. Jump and perform a powerful butt stomp to hit enemies and break special panels. If you touch a special panel, it will tell you how much butt stomp power you need to break it. You might not want to break every panel you find?

name: Dating of the Future
summary: Rise to fame as an adult star in the world of the post-post-apocalypse. Make friends, help your fellow machines discover their inner freedom, and make, um, “industry connections”.

name: Daytona USA 2: Power Edition
summary:
Daytona USA 2: Power Edition is a updated re-release of Daytona USA 2: Battle on the Edge, which is the original game with a few changes:

It changes the look of the beginners track back to a classic "Oval racetrack", and adds a new "Challenge" track that combines the previous four tracks into a long sprint. It also adds a secret "Specialist Only" Hornet car with a code, which allows players to customize the original Daytona USA Hornet to their specifications.

The game saw no home ports, only appearing in "Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name" as "Sega Racing Classic 2".

name: Dark Prison 7th
summary: You are trapped alone in a mysterious prison. After carefully examining your surroundings, you must take the elevator to reach the 7th floor of the prison. However, if you notice any anomalies, take the elevator down. Escape from the prison filled with strange phenomena!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Digital Deluxe Edition
Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Super Digital Deluxe Edition
Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Special Equipment Set
summary: Dive into the world of Daemon X Machina with this collection of special equipment!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Special SFX Weapon Set
summary: Spice up your battles with these special weapons with original sound effects!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Arsenal Skin Set
summary: Customize your Arsenal's look with these unique skins!

name: Day of the Rising Dead
summary: Step into a gritty, analog film-style world where three survivors must battle their way through a planet overrun by the undead. From the dark alleys of a crumbling city to eerie forests, an abandoned military outpost, and a blood-soaked shopping mall, every step is a fight for survival.

name: Dark Cross
summary: A third-person survival horror game where players navigate a dark, nonlinear facility, using light, sound, and limited tools to avoid deadly threats and uncover hidden experimental data.

name: Dark Adelita
summary: Dark Adelita is a brutal, 2D action platformer rooted in Mexican folklore. As Angela, a fearless Adelita, fight your way through mythic horrors, dodge deadly traps, and face legendary bosses from Mexico’s past—all while uncovering a supernatural threat born from revolution.

name: Dark Dolls
summary: Many slightly dark and troubled, yet cute idols appear! An easy puzzle game anyone can play!

name: Davids Funtime
summary: Have fun with david

name: Daikoukai Jidai IV: Porto Estado - Power Up Kit
Daikoukai Jidai IV: Porto Estado - Shokai Gentei-ban
Damon and Baby
summary: An exciting new style of action adventure fusing shooting action with exploration.

name: Dating and Dragons: A Love Quest
summary: Dating & Dragons – A Love Quest is a narrative RPG dating sim packed with every fantasy trope you love. Sneak out with the thief, wreak havoc with the warrior, or flirt with the bard. Explore branching adventures with multiple endings and hidden secrets. Roll those dice and watch out for dragons!

name: DayZ: Badlands
summary: DayZ Badlands throws you into the troubled territories of Nasdara Province—267km² of arid expanse. Uncover its secrets, battle for control, forge fragile alliances and rebuild from the ashes of past wars. Survival here isn't just measured in drops of water saved, but in bullets spared.

name: Dark Neighbors
summary: Overview: a mischievously fun action game where you're one of the kids from the "Darkien Crew" on a mission to turn a picture-perfect suburban neighborhood into your personal splash zone. Armed with beautiful red water balloons and other cool items.

name: Dance Central 3: Carly Rae Jepsen - "Call Me Maybe"
Dance Central 3: LMFAO - "Sorry for Party Rocking"
Dance Central Spotlight: Gotye ft. Kimbra - "Somebody That I Used to Know"
Dance Central Spotlight: David Guetta ft. Nicki Minaj - "Turn Me On"
Dance Central Spotlight: Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - "Uptown Funk"
Dance Central Spotlight: The Pussycat Dolls ft. Busta Rhymes - "Don't Cha"
Daniel Linssen's Typing Challenge
summary: Learn to type quickly under pressure

name: Dark Souls: Remastered Seamless Co-op
summary:
Mod which removes all multiplayer boundaries and allows for connections to persist after death.

Play with friends from the tutorial to the very end of the game, with synchronised progress, and no resummoning or interruptions. Invasions are optional and active by default.

You can adjust the multiplayer scaling of the enemies to your liking.

name: Day D: Through Time - Collector's Edition
summary: Brian, a gifted and eccentric scientist, has finished his time machine and traveled into the past to visit the dinosaurs. Unfortunately for Brian, a former friend, Doctor Terrible, completed his time machine first and is already there and he’s installed all kinds of machines in the dinosaur era. Embark on an incredible prehistoric time management adventure and stop Doctor Terrible before the timeline is ruined.

name: Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Surudoi Tsume
Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Norowareta Taiketsu
Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Gyakuten no Ichigeki
Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Kuzusenu Jishin
Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Owari Naki Tatakai
Dai-2-dan: Pokémon Battle Card e+ - Yuruginai Chikara
Darkway: Murder of King Mere
summary: The King Mere is dead. Once the leader of diplomacy in the Dog Empyre, now a bloodstain on snow. You are the Apprentice, sent by the Master Detective to the City of Ink, to uncover who really murdered the King at the edge of the world.

name: DarkShine
summary: DarkShine is an open-world game with a classic graphical style, where you as a former soldier have to save the inhabitants of your village from the white queen and her army, going a long way from nobody to the savior of the world.

name: Darkest Cube
summary: Darkest Cube fuses card games, roguelikes, and RPG elements – adapt your starting deck with cards gained from quests, and adjust your strategies to seal the mysterious Dark Cubes.

name: Darkroom
summary: A short, experimental horror game about developing increasingly disturbing photographs in a darkroom.

name: Dark Room
summary: DARK ROOM is a photography development sim where you develop your patrons’ erotic material. Some will bring in photos of nature, parties or art, others spicy shoots, kinky snapshots or decadent moments.

name: Dark Magic
summary: You grew up in an ordinary family with an ordinary life, except for the fact, you're the only man alive in the world!

name: Day Trading Simulator
summary: Experience a realistic stock market simulator! Buy and sell virtual stocks, respond to dynamic market news, and manage your assets wisely to become a successful investor.

name: Daydream Mosaics: Juliette's Collection
summary: A beautiful collection of six-color nonogram puzzles from the Daydream Mosaics series. Play in classic picross style or the enhanced Mosaic mode with power-ups and mistake tracking. Packed with vibrant logic challenges—perfect for puzzle fans of all kinds.

name: Darkness Takeover
summary: Darkness Takeover is a short psychological horror game that places you in the mind of Karim a man trapped inside a haunted maze, pursued by an unrelenting force known as The Stalker Master.

name: Dark Sea
summary: When the research team from the classified Soviet organization known as O.D.I.S.E.A. went radio silent during an expedition deep beneath the Earth, you - a simple mechanic - were called upon to pilot an old prototype submarine and search for any trace of what happened and where they might have gone.

name: DACHstudio Puzzle Box: Falkis Potpourri
summary: Enjoy beautifully drawn variety art by Traumfalke. Falkis Potpourri takes you on a fantastic journey.

name: DACHstudio Puzzle Box: Sanguinik's hidden object tour in Görlitz/Zgorzelec
summary: Go on a hidden object puzzle adventure in Görlitz/Zgorzelec with Sanguinik’s beautifully hand drawn cartoon city.

name: DACHstudio Puzzle Box: Nebbi's Animal Photos
summary: Animals , the Final frontier. These are the amazing real life photos from NEBBIGRAPHY. Seeking out majestic animals to boldly photograph what nobody photographed before. Coming to a jigsaw puzzle game near you.

name: DACHstudio Puzzle Box: Melextis' Unicorns
summary: Melextis brings you ALL the unicorns! Enjoy all the beautifully drawn unicorns as a relaxing jigsaw puzzle.

name: DACHstudio Puzzle Box: JujiBla Landscapes
summary: Get 10 beautiful landscape paintings hand drawn by JujiBla to puzzle.

name: Dark Resolve
summary: Immerse yourself in a chilling nightmare where the darkest corners of the past come to life to haunt you. This is a tense first-person psychological horror game that transports you to the heart of an abandoned police station. .

name: Date Plus
summary: A game born from memes, featuring the “World’s Richest Person” sending you $50, a chaotic skewer vendor, and a quirky dog-shaped backpack. Dive into a whimsical yet heartfelt dating adventure full of unexpected twists and pure hilarity!

name: Darugarami Haigorei
summary: Become the trending star exorcist and save the cursed haunted house! The worst spirit in history is about to awaken.

name: Darksiders 4
summary: The legendary saga of the Four Horsemen continues in Darksiders 4, an all-new action-adventure set in an apocalyptic version of earth and continues where the original Darksiders game left off.

name: Danger Zone
summary:
Danger Zone is an action/puzzle game developed by JungleTac for their generic multi-game systems, including plug and plays and handhelds. It pits the player against a machine which throws a never-ending barrage of blocks. These blocks must be arranged to form lines, while avoiding being hit by them.

The game was originally developed for consoles using the VT03 enhanced single-chip Famiclone. The original revision of this version of the game features a title screen, which reads Zone Danger. This specific revision of the game is known to have been included on the Vs Maxx 17 in 1 plug and play and the two-player capable Silverlit 35 in 1 Super Twins plug and play console, the latter having a copyright year of 2005 printed on its battery cover.

name: Darkhaven
summary: An upcoming ARPG featuring procedurally generated and fully dynamic worlds. In development by Moon Beast Productions

name: Daisen
summary: Forget about ammo. Forget about reloading. Don’t let your weapon overheat. Daisen is a fast-paced shooter. Step into the role of a girl plunging into chaos to unravel the anomalous influence spreading across the land.

name: Danmaku Unlimited 4 Wyver Ultra
summary: Arise Wyver and fly against overwhelming odds in this modern labor of love tribute to classic shoot'em ups!

name: Dark 4799
summary: Dark 4799

name: Dad's Office 1998
summary: A liminal office horror roguelike in an endless procedurally-generated building.

name: Darklord's Tower
summary: Darklord’s Tower is a 2D pixel-art game combining tower-defense, action-platformer, and roguelike elements. Each night, lay traps throughout the Tower, and by day, use your traps and weapons to crush the invading hordes. Only you—the Darklord’s daughter—can reclaim the crown stolen from your father.

name: Daemon
summary: Wander the remains of a lost outpost of a dying civilization. Persist or perish. It is of little consequence.

name: Dancing with Ghosts
summary: A cozy wholesome narrative about a young teen girl who befriends a ghost that only she can see. Weighed down by the death of her parents, the girl finds healing through friendship, dance, and helping others. Created to share the message of joy and appreciation for the gift of life.

name: Daggerheart
summary: Daggerheart is a TTRPG system where GMs and players share in narrative worldbuilding, and every choice matters as the adventure hangs in the balance between hope and fear!

name: DA-VI-NC1
summary: DA-VI-NC1 is a Turing-machine-based coding puzzle game. You must complete the puzzles, pass the Turing test, and discover the philosophical world of DA-VI-NC1 with the Mona Lisa.

name: Danganronpa Delusion: The Front Line of Despair and Hope Reinterpreted
summary: Rei Yukine enters a new world as an ordinary person into a school full of ultimate talent students.

name: Day of the Undead
summary: Fight endless waves of zombies across 9 unique maps! Collect powerful, unique guns, unlock game-changing perks, and survive as long as you can in this fast-paced arcade shooter. How long can you last against the undead?

name: Darkodai
summary: The land was absolved, it fell to an ancient darkness, a spell cast by a mysterious force. Two beings from a pure realm of light are the only hope for this consumed land. Many adventures against the darkness await you in this small, RPG adventure known as Darkodai!

name: Daikatana
summary:
