An original adaptation of John Romero's Daikatana with unique gameplay differences, developed by Kemco for the Nintendo 64.

Daikatana is similar to the PC version in terms of gameplay, but the game itself is very different. It plays one repeating music track per era, weapons can be carried through different eras, and it had a lot of fogging and low framerate along with low resolutions to make up for performance in its large areas, despite the expansion pak.

This was due to the game being on a Nintendo system, to prevent pointless slaughter, despite the game already being rated M.

name: Dash Dash Dead
summary: Dash Dash Dead is a fast paced turn based roguelike. In a televised bloodsport of the future, you are a death row inmate competing for a shot at freedom. Each episode, you're thrown into a new and deadly world, forced to hunt down targets and survive with the help of powerful, unpredictable items.

name: Daemon
summary: Daemon is an action-packed first-person shooter with expressive and customizable gameplay that can be built for tactical assistance, controlling space, or dealing oppressive damage. Combine a wide variety of weapons and abilities to out-strategize your opponents and claim victory.

name: Dark Knight
summary: Can you restore the honor of the fallen knight—or be consumed by the shadows you once served?

name: Daimon Blades
summary: Daimon Blades is a brutal first person slasher that combines the depth of action RPGs and replayability of roguelites. Launch expeditions solo or up to 4 players, and survive the many horrors of the Daimon Realm.

name: Dark City: Barcelona - Collector's Edition
summary: Something stalks the construction site of Barcelona’s newest high-rise hotel!

name: Daybreak Slam
summary: Colorful characters clash in this beginner friendly 2D Fighter. Family friendly themes and aesthetics with simple combat mechanics make Daybreak Slam a welcoming experience for new players to the genre, and allow each character to stand out in their own unique ways that veterans will appreciate.

name: Darling, Darling... Dead?
summary: Yandere x yandere x yandere: one must go. Yandere x yandere, a vampire-themed Visual Novel.

name: Darkwing Duck R
summary: Fan remake of Darkwing Duck NES, Black Cloak with Dandy.

name: Dark Return
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark journey filled with secrets and horror, as John returns home after receiving a mysterious letter from a family member stating that he must return home after traveling for treatment. Discover terrifying facts and uncover buried secrets in an exciting and fun experience.

name: Daimu
summary: Daimu is a bite-sized visual novel utilizing minimal assets to tell a unique, narrative-driven story. This short game features roughly 2,200 words, three endings, an original soundtrack, and a single illustration.

name: Dance of the Stereomancer
summary: Create a loop of magical powers to find the funkiest and deadliest synergies. Face waves of enemies and awaken the Party God in a fast-paced and chaotic survivors-like.

name: Darn Guy Adventures
summary: Darn Guy Adventures (AKA DGA) is a ~ 4 hour RPG adventure based around attempting to find news about a certain videogame

name: Dave a Nice Guy
summary: fast paced action game

name: Dating App Simulator
summary: Dating App Simulator is a quirky little game about matching with people, talking to them, and trying to make them fall for you. You can date anyone you like; men, women, or both.

name: Dark Slayer
summary: You, an ordinary high school student, are suddenly pursued by dragon clans and saved by the dark mage Violet. Violet sees your pendant and believes you to be the reincarnation of the legendary hero Myers, taking you to another world.

name: Dacha
summary: Immerse yourself in the peaceful atmosphere of a Russian summer cottage: take care of the vegetable garden and flower beds, pick ripe apples, cook fragrant compote, roast kebabs and enjoy nature.

name: Dawn After Dusk
summary: Asylum simulator. An interactive fiction about schizophrenia and finding meaning after near-death, with Disco Elysium-style mechanics.

name: Dark Place
summary: In the darkness, they are approaching. The protagonist is a detective who has come to the location to search for a person who has disappeared at a haunted spot. A horror game played from a first-person perspective. Can you safely escape from the terrifying abandoned house?

name: Daedalic Multiplayer Bundle
summary: Three games bundled up for multiplayer fun - together or against each other!

name: Danganronpa 2x2
summary:
A new killing game begins in the same setting and with the same characters as Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair. A brand-new scenario with different victims, culprits, and tricks! Reveal the truth by shooting down contradictions in a Class Trial and uncover the culprit of a murder.

The original scenario from Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair, with revamped visuals and presentation for modern consoles, is also included.

name: Dark Cage1: Reincarnation For Salvation
summary: This is a short, slightly terrifying, suspenseful and bizarre visual novel game. Players will take on the role of student Mo Lan, who loses all memories and joins a school of social monsters to rescue bullied classmates and uncover the truth behind campus bullying.

name: Daenerys Doesn’t Want Hentai
summary: Daenerys does not want Hentai! but John Sand does not agree. Collect chests filled with gold to make war on him! And save Daenerys!

name: Dark December
summary: Engage in fierce battles against powerful enemies and create your own combat style through unique combinations of weapons and skills Each character comes equipped with distinct abilities and weapons, and by strategically allocating bonus stat points, you can take on even the most formidable monsters

name: Dawn vs Dusk
summary: An over the shoulder arena battle multiplayer game. Battle as either the Dawn or Dusk teams for supremacy of the arena by holding capture points with your team mates. Last team standing at 20 minutes wins the game!

name: Dataclysm
summary: A tech-themed artillery game where players take turns launching computer components at opponents across destructible terrain. Aim carefully, manage your jetpack fuel, and master physics-based projectiles to be the last techie standing in this modern tribute to classics like Worms.

name: Dark Ill
summary: This card adventure game combines elements of darkness, card and roguelike. Upgrading the cards will bring random attributes, creating various and unique adventure experiences. Design your custom card sets to defeat the decaying monsters, face the darkness and break the curse!

name: DanceGirl: Swimwear
summary: This game picture is exquisite, little sister super beautiful, music beautiful! Come in and watch the girls dance.

name: Dash Connect 2
summary: Dash Connect 2 is a deceptivly simple puzzle game in which you have to connect all the dots. But don't be fooled by the simple appearance, difficulty ramps up quickly, as new mechanics are introduced.

name: Dark Nest: Snake Contract
summary: A gijinka snake-girl raising RPG. In Nidus, where Serphids—Serpent men and women—live, you are the only human. Meet snake girls with unique personalities and looks, become their instructor, and help them chase their dreams while uncovering the truth behind Nidus.

name: Dark Lady
summary: Dark Lady is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Dance Loop
summary: Dance loop VR is a rhythm VR game where you travel fantastic realms and break moving data cells to the energetic soundtrack by Yandex Music.

name: Date With a Girl: Mahjong
summary: In this mahjong connect game you have to go on a date with a beautiful girl. Match pairs of the same goodies to please her and achieve something more than just communication.

name: Dark Continent
summary: A fast-paced action MMORPG where every strike is aimed and every dodge matters. Take on epic bosses, experience responsive real-time combat, and enjoy full control—no tab-targeting, no auto-play, and no Pay2Win.

name: DangerousPath
summary: Think quickly, plan wisely, and victory will be yours!

name: Dale & Dawson: Stationary Supplies
summary: In "Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies," play as a Manager, Specialist, or Slacker in an office setting. Slackers blend in, mimicking Specialists to avoid the Manager's suspicion. Uncover or cause deception to win.

name: Dark Ties
summary: Experience the brand-new tale of Yoshitaka Mine from Yakuza 3 in an included separate game. Having once led a succesful startup company, he plunged himself into the dark world of the yakuza by choice after losing everything. Left with an empty heart, the pursuit to find true bonds drives him forward once again in a dramatic journey colored by exhilarating boxing-based combat, and a variety of engaging side experiences.

name: Darwins Trash
summary: A rougelite puzzle game where you must defeat the many creatures and beasts that live within these caves, shoot pentagonal shapes to make combos and eradicate all that stands in your mission to destroy Darwins Trash

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Hero Origin Pack
summary: Come face to face with your past! This free pack includes Origin hero skins for each hero in Darkest Dungeon II

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Infernal Supporter Pack
summary: Show your love for Darkest Dungeon II by adopting this Infernal Supporter Pack! The pack is a collection of cosmetic items for players who want to help bolster the work we've done to add many free updates to the game. (Such as Kingdoms!)

name: Da Tutu
summary: "Da Tutu" is a minimalist leisure game, waving a stick to let the rabbit take off.

name: Dark Times
summary: Dark Times is a turn-based tactical RPG in the dark fantasy genre. Build a team of heroes, battle an army of skeletons and bosses, upgrade your characters, and plan fights to defeat the Lord of Darkness. Explore locations and an epic story.

name: Darkest Descent
summary: Fight for your life in the endless halls of a primordial stronghold to escape an endless cycle. You and up to 7 of your friends can coordinate, strategize and conqueror the dungeon together, or you can face the horrors alone.

name: Dark Silence
summary: A Big Scary fan which uses the Gorilla Tag Movement. Made by Nik Daig

name: Daibadestructor
summary: Become a minion of a nefarious corporation and jump into the sea from Odaiba to destroy an underwater base in this easy-to-play retro-style FPS.

name: Dawn Car
summary: “Pixel art” is too soft a word! This is the story of the Pre-Pixel Age… A dazzling world built entirely from 8×8 character graphics— the vibrant construction set of a Digital Tangram World.

name: Dark Compass
summary: In narrowing tunnels, rolling dice, and the ticking of fate, you measure each breath, each prayer, and your dwindling will to survive.

name: Darkspy
summary: Darkspy is a hardcore first-person stealth shooter with tactical mission planning, reactive AI, and rogue-lite structure. Infiltrate enemy strongholds, choose your loadout and insertion point, and shape the world through your decisions.

name: Damn Gravity!
summary: Parkour, bounce, & flail your way sky-high because the only way is up! There is no saving. There is no loading. There is only gravity. Collect your parachute. You only get one. Your eyes will lie & your depth perception will betray you! Can you reach the top of this hardcore vertical 3D platformer?

name: David: Rise of the Shepherd
summary: An epic biblical action-adventure RPG set in ancient Israel. Control David in third-person combat, slay beasts and giants, explore vast deserts and villages, complete quests, and face cinematic boss battles in a story of faith, courage, and destiny.

name: Dark Steel Legends
summary:
Enter the world of Fight Legends, a fast-paced, action-packed medieval combat game where your skills and strategy will decide your fate.
Face hordes of challengers, hone your abilities, and hunt down enemies worldwide in epic duels.

name: Dark Grid
summary: You wake up with only a luminous tower beside you, its warm light enveloping you. Besides, looking around, there is only endless darkness. Survival, exploration, utilizing all resources around to survive, searching for the reasons why the world is plunged into darkness.

name: Darko
summary: Immerse yourself in Darko, a short psychological horror game where the scars of the past come to life. Explore the house, avoid hallucinations, and find your pills before it’s too late.

name: Daimon Comics: Herofrenia
summary:
Daimon Comics: Herofrenia follows Marco, a boy who dares to enter the former children's asylum of Aguscello, a place shrouded in mystery and legend for decades.
What begins as a game of courage quickly turns into a descent into horror, as Marco discovers that the line between reality and madness is thinner than he imagined.
His only goal: find the exit before being lost forever in the silence of the asylum.

name: Dark Stories Bundle
summary: Three Journeys Into Darkness

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Sovereign Axiom Outfit Set
summary: Know your enemy by wearing their clothes with this outfit set!

name: Dang Darn Island
summary: Dang Darn Island is a 1-4 player co-op roguelike adventure. Explore the procedurally generated island, delve deep into the temple, smash pots, dodge traps, and see if you can escape with the Gold Idol!

name: Day In
summary: Today is your day off! What will you do with this time? One of your numerous chores you've been neglecting, or will you find something else to do?

name: Dangerous Mountain Together
summary: Team up in this chaotic 2-4 player co-op RC car adventure! Navigate dangerous mountain roads while tethered together, pulling each other back from disaster. Climb steep hills, survive wild weather, and reach the top without tumbling into the abyss!

name: Danmo Three Kingdoms: Battle of Wits
summary: A Three Kingdoms-themed tactical chess game with light strategy and easy controls. Step into the era as a strategist, use over 200 historical figures—each with unique traits and counters—to form teams, revisit key battles, and shape outcomes with your tactics.

name: Days Without Incident
summary:
It has been ___ days without incident. Working off no more than an old newspaper clipping, your investigation has brought you to an old metalworks factory, abandoned after a series of mysterious deaths. The people of Ebenflow live in the shadow of this awful tragedy; they may want to forget, but you've come to find the truth of what happened to the factory and its workers. Why did they get sick? Why doesn't anyone drink the water? And what’s been growing in the quiet?

Days Without Incident is a short, never-before-seen horror experience from We Create Stuff. This lost prototype from 2017 reveals the creative roots of indie horror smash hit In Sound Mind, illustrating the studio’s growth from their Half-Life 2 modding projects of the late 2000s and early 2010s.

name: Dartmouth Championship Football
summary: An early computer simulation of American Football, written in BASIC. Players have a choice of offensive plays, and the game also incorporates many official rules, including penalties and the safety rule. Sometimes a dog will run on the field, interrupting play.

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Into the Abyss
summary: Expand your adventure with never-before-seen bosses, a new map area, and new equipment!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Free Formal Suit Outfit
summary:
Change up your look with this outfit!

This DLC set includes:

Outfit - Formal Suit

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Free Axiom Researcher Outfit
summary: Change up your look with this outfit!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Free Iris Outfit
summary: Change up your look to match your Reclaimer comrades with this outfit!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Reclaimers Outfit Set
summary:
This set contains the following downloadable content:

Outfit - Raven
Outfit - Iris
Outfit - Ash
Outfit - Angel
Outfit - Zanki
Outfit - Forge
Outfit - Blossom

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Free Reclaimer Outfit
summary: Change up your look with this outfit!

name: Data: Corruption
summary: App-based cyberpunk TTRPG released on iOS and Android in 2025 by One Shaka Media.

name: Dark History
summary: This is a 2D action game with only boss rush. Choose from 36 playable characters and win the boss rush of 36 battles!

name: Dami and Secret Library
summary: A healing 3D adventure featuring color-absorb puzzles, emotional cutscenes, and exploration across 50 handcrafted levels. Join Dami on her journey through the Secret Library to reunite with her mother.

name: Darkwood II
summary: Roam freely around the scorched deserts of a dying sea as you secure resources and explore the mysteries of Darkwood. But beware nightfall – seek shelter, shore up your defenses, and pray for the morning light as the horrors of the world hunt the ill-prepared.

name: Dark Ride: The Feline Fix
summary: Dark Ride: The Feline Fix is a small, self-contained VR experience set inside an atmospheric potion shop. It’s a relaxed scavenger hunt where you interact with objects, search for ingredients, and piece together a cure for a curious village-wide transformation.

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion - Vehicle Set
summary:
Travel in style with these new rides!

This DLC set includes:

Additional Vehicle - Cruiser Vehicle
Additional Vehicle - VH8-G2500
Additional Vehicle - Nightmare

name: Dancing of Cho Aniki
summary:
Dancing of Cho Aniki is a free-to-play rhythm action game developed by LIG, a Japanese web development company, and is a mobile spin-off of the long-running Cho Aniki shoot 'em up series.
In the game, players tap music notes in a four-lane rhythm game system synchronized with iconic tracks from the original Cho Aniki series. The game features the franchise's most recognizable characters (Samson, Adon, Idaten, Benten, Uminin) rendered in 3D, performing increasingly complex dance choreography as stage difficulty increases.

name: Days with Girlfriends: Kello & Cammy
summary: By moving and matching these colorful gems, reaching 3 or more to form a straight line to eliminate them, each successful elimination will bring gorgeous special effects and satisfying sound effects, as well as beautiful illustrations unlocked after completing the level

name: DarkFactory
summary: Run a shady factory with your friends in this online co-op management game! Balance profits and risk by producing both legal and illegal goods— bribe inspectors, cover your tracks, and outsmart the system to stay in business!

name: Dante's Purgatorio
summary: Dante's Purgatorio was the planned sequel to Visceral Games' 2010 action-adventure game Dante's Inferno. The game would have seen protagonist Dante ascending Mount Purgatory to reunite with Beatrice and reach the Garden of Eden, inverting the descent structure of the original game. Each terrace of the mountain represented one of the Seven Deadly Sins, which Dante would have to purge from himself through "Vision Caves" - playable memory sequences where he relived his past sins. Inspired by Uncharted 2's approach, Purgatorio aimed to replace cutscenes and quick-time events with scripted gameplay sequences maintaining player control. The game would have concluded with Lucifer tricking Dante and murdering him through Beatrice's form, setting up a third installment, Paradiso.

name: Darius the Janitor: A Christmas Story
Darkzan Adventure
summary: Darkzan Adventure is a Medieval Arcade RPG full of humor, fast-paced action, and unusual characters. Explore mysterious lands, face the cult of Darkzan, and uncover bizarre events while playing solo, in co-op, or even in idle mode

name: Dark City: London
summary:
Dark City: London is the first installment of Dark City Series by 4Friends Games.

The Bonus Game has Charles Dickens as the protagonist as he unveils the true story of "A Christmas Carol".

name: Dark City: Munich - Collector's Edition
summary:
Dark City: Munich is the second installment of Dark City series by 4Friends Games.

- Rescue Hansel and Gretel in the bonus game!
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games!
- Find all the morphs, collectibles, and gain achievements!
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screensavers, music, videos, and more!
- Never get lost with the strategy guide!

name: DateBoy
summary: DateBoy involves playing on a Ga retro handheld video game console while you're on a DATE! Hence, DateBoy. DATE. BOY. Get it? DateBoy.

name: Data Rot
summary: A chilling, stylized VR horror game. Collect scattered Data Fragments while avoiding an insidious entity that is corrupting your system. Simple gameplay. Dynamic AI opponent. 20-45 min playthrough. Room-scale or Seated.

name: Dadish 4
summary: Dadish 4 keeps the series' signature platforming style but introduces new twists. Players will navigate through 3D environments, making the most of Dadish's upgraded abilities like double jumps, dash attacks, and wall running. Each level contains multiple paths, rewarding exploration and offering a fresh experience every time. The game features traditional platforming mechanics alongside puzzle elements that require players to think strategically about their next move.

name: Daughter of the Rift
summary: Daughter of the Rift is story-rich card-battling adventure with a unique deck-building progression system.

name: Dark Front
summary: Dark Front is a story-driven first-person shooter that takes players to the fiercest fronts of World War II. Fight on different battlefields with various armies. Experience the darkest era of history brought to life with the power of Unreal Engine 5's stunning graphics.

name: DazOS_
summary: An idle clicker where you manage emails, grow your team, and upgrade to handle even more messages.

name: Darkward
summary: Dark, surreal point-and-click text adventure inspired by the poetics of Dark Souls. Guide the Wanderer through ruins and tombs in a purgatorial world.

name: Dark Craft
summary: Dark Craft is the first MMORPG in the Souls-like genre! Explore an open world filled with ruined castles, forgotten temples, and enemies waiting for their prey. Play solo or with friends, hunt bosses, join guilds, fight other players, and prove your right to reign supreme.

name: Dark Flowers: Tiny Starlight
summary: New history, fractured future, regret-steeped past—brewing madness. Dark Flowers: Tiny Starlight tells a girl's tale. Sleeping in the present, waking from the past, she bears tomorrow toward history's choice.

name: Dark
summary: Dark is an intense horror FPS set in a destroyed world shrouded in eternal darkness. Humanity has gone extinct, and among the ruins roam merciless creatures. As one of the last survivors, you must fight for survival, exploring forgotten complexes, tunnels, and abandoned city called Forsaken Place...

name: Dark Door
summary: "Dark Door" is an online survival horror game for 1-4 players. Players explore an alternate dimension, collect information, avoid monsters and search for the way back home.

name: Dark Reflection
summary: In Dark reflection you'll have to make your way through a combination of challenges. Ranging from taking down enemies and boss fights with the game's hack n slash combat to platforming your way across dangerous areas and strange rooms that might surprise you with a sudden gameplay shift.

name: Dating App Simulator
summary: Test your dating skills against the most advanced AI possible.

name: Data Center
summary: Build, cable, and automate. Assemble racks, servers, and switches, connect enough capacity for each app, earn money from processed data, and unlock gear and bigger customers with XP and reputation. Follow colored data packets as your center comes to life.

name: DashBall
summary: DashBall is a fast-paced competitive game that blends reflexes, strategy, and powerful spells. Face off in intense duels and climb the leaderboards! 🚀

name: Daydream
summary: Daydream is a surreal first-person co-op horror game where nostalgic childhood places become eerie and twisted. Explore detailed dreamlike spaces, solve environmental puzzles, and survive entities that react to your actions.

name: Daybreak
summary: Daybreak is an Action Roguelike game where you fight on a procedurally generated planet and try to survive for 5 minutes every day.

name: Dawn
summary: Dawn is a dark fantasy post-apocalyptic survival horror game set in the ruins of a magical industrial revolution. Explore a surreal world overtaken by nature, where the horrors of the apocalypse emerge during the day and lie dormant by nightfall.

name: Daycare Of Happy Children
summary: A character named "James" goes to a strange daycare center to find a mysterious artifact that could perform scientific miracles. But James won't be alone in this daycare; he'll encounter creatures ready to do anything to kill him.

name: Dain Squares
summary: Clear a line, hear a line!

name: Dark Alliances
summary: An epic module taking place in the Moonsea area of the Forgotten Realms.

name: Dark Wizardry: The Road to Gargath
summary: Our heroes, having been pulled from their own world now face a harsh and brutal reality as they are hunted by forces of the enemy. Can they reach the safety of the Gargath Outpost in time? This mod is a sequel to the author's "Dark Alliances".

name: Dark Souls 2: Mad Warrior Edition
summary:
Restores cut content, adds new spells, rings and attacks.
Increases player prowess while also increasing the difficulty in thoughtful ways.

name: D.A.D.S.
summary: Use your special ops units to construct base facilities and towers to protect them from the ever-increasing threat of alien invaders in this Tower Defense game with a city-building element! Research their weaknesses and develop defenses before mankind runs out of time.

name: Dave's Word Game
summary: Dave's Word Game (known as DWG by fans) is a new daily word game, where you must strategically use your best words to maximise your score every day.

name: Darkfall Shadows
summary: Darkfall Shadows is a 2D puzzle-adventure where you, a detective, explore the eerie Darkfall Manor to uncover its sinister past. Use shadow manipulation and dimension-shifting abilities to solve puzzles and reveal the tragic tale of Dr. Grimshaw and his daughter, in this noir-inspired mystery.

name: Dark Dreams on Diverging Roads
summary: Drive through the world as a famous author in this upcoming free narrative game. Manage your fuel (coffee) and figure out how to navigate with no GPS and a broken radio. Meet a host of interesting characters and don’t forget to LOOK BEHIND YOU.

name: Dark Farts: Parody Smell Edition
summary: The most absurd Souls-like parody ever! You’re a blacksmith with bean-powered dragon abilities, taking on evil corporations with maximum gasitude! Fart-dash, demolish bosses, and break the fourth wall in this hilarious action RPG. Smell the legend!

name: Day of Light
summary: Day of Light is a hand-drawn platformer about facing inner struggles. Use powerful masks to unlock temporary abilities and bring light back into a dark world!

name: Daddy's Christmas
summary: Coming home for the holidays is always eventful. This year more than most. It is the family's first Christmas since Daddy's accident. Your mother hasn't seen him so excited in ages. Apparently, he has planned a BIG surprise for the WHOLE family...

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Resolute Edition
summary: Get Darkest Dungeon II, all DLC, and the superlative original soundtrack by Stuart Chatwood (over 2 hours of music!) together for a tidy discount.

name: Dark Watching: Chapter 1
summary: Dark Watching: Chapter 1 – The Bunker is a gripping first-person horror adventure. You play as Jacob, searching for your missing sister. Your path leads through an abandoned bunker full of secrets, puzzles, and deadly dangers. Explore rooms, collect clues and items.

name: Dance Dance Detective
summary: Grab your dance shoes, and Dance, Dance, Detective! Go undercover as a dance teacher on a cruise ship full of wacky suspects. Create choreographies to uncover their dark secrets, follow the leads, and connect clues to find who killed the chief science officer of Bolero Chocolate Company.

name: Dawg Game
summary: DAWG GAME is a comedy adventure that will tell you what Maxim is doing outside of streams and why there are so few streams. Get into the shoes of your favorite streamer: do your chores, take care of your body, and do whatever it takes to get a stream going!

name: Dawnrazor
summary: Step into the decaying world of Kagenovia in Dawnrazor, a story-driven 8-bit action adventure! Take control of Zedekiah, a betrayed knight reborn through parasitic vampirism, as he fights through blood-soaked ruins and biomechanical horrors.

name: Daydream Mosaics 6: Empire - Collector's Edition
summary: Raven and Juliette are getting married—and while they build six magical cities to unite their peoples, Lucas and Reya set out to find the perfect wedding gift. Enjoy 204 colorful nonogram levels plus jigsaw, clutter, hidden object, match 3, and more in this charming Collector’s Edition!

name: Dark Solitaire: Search for a Cure
Dangerous Heaven: The Legend of the Ark
summary:
The year is 2011. A secret sect has discovered the biblical Noah's Ark and a sarcophagus with the remains of the first man, Adam. The sect aims to manipulate Adam's sacred relics to correct what, in its opinion, God had been doing wrong over the centuries.

As a young scientist and adventurer, you team with a friend to prevent this sect to succeed. The story starts in the fictional town of Popac City in Italy, but before, be sure to train to understand the controls: arrow keys and ok button. Then you are ready to explore and solve puzzles in this action/adventure game which the developer and/or editor calls a DVG (Digital Video Game)

name: Darkrite: The Blight of Love
summary: Old school, rich with lore, and made with love. Experience a linear gothic story with carefully handwritten prose. Play either as an action RPG or visual novel. Your Weaver journey starts here.

name: Day and Night
summary: It's Day versus Night as you stack and combine themed puzzle blocks, battling against your opponent and the clock as time changes and flips all the rules!

name: Dadum The Dice
summary: Plan, roll and outsmart your enemies in this turn-based tactical puzzle adventure. Show a higher number to defeat foes, discover new mechanics in every world, and face challenging bosses that twist the rules. Think ahead, take your time… and master the Great Die.

name: Day Trader Tycoon
summary: Play as a day trader gambling on people's pension money and try to beat the stock market. Engage in a comedic story with multiple endings. Meet different characters and get insider info to use for your own advantage. Gamble on cryptocurrency and quickly react to market events.

name: Dark Descent
summary: Dark Descent is a 4 player multiplayer cooperative horror game where you and your friends venture into an old elevator, aiming to reach the deepest levels. However, the journey won't be without it's challenges.

name: Danger Zone
summary: A war combat game that is set in a desert. Helicopters, fighters and bombers enter the area swooping down over the mountains. Watch your radar screen and protect your base.

name: Darkhand
summary: Enter The Devil's casino, meet dozens of other charming gamblers, and fight your way out for a fortune. Will you ever be able to pay off your debt?
